column5:
Super good, don't get me wrong. But I came for the caramel and brownies, not the sweet cream. The packaging made it seem like brownies were packed and bountiful *crying frowny emoji* I'd say the taste of this was amazing, but the ratio of brownie to sweet cream was disappointing. Liked it regardless but probably won't buy again simply because it didn't live up to its promising package. I'll find another one that has a better ratio and wayyy more yummy chewy brownies.
Overall, good flavor, texture, idea, and brownies. Not so great caramel/sweet cream/ brownie RATIO. Just add more brownies. Please.

I decided to try it out although I’m not a huge caramel fan, and the first buy was ok, didn’t like the caramel too much and for some reason that specific pint barely had any brownies! Like there were some on top but from the middle to the bottom? Zilch. Nada. Nothing! It was disappointing. But for some reason, I bought it again and I really do believe it was just that point bcuz the second one was glorious!! I had a big brownie chunk in EVERY bite. Plus the caramel didn’t bother me as much and I took a liking to it. Conclusion: I’m on my fifth pint, of the week and I’m going back to get my daily pint cus I’m kinda sick and need some happiness.

My caramel core begins to disappear about half way through. I only buy this for the caramel core. The first time I purchased this I was not even aware that there were blonde bits in there. You had me a salted caramel core, well this is the fourth pint that I have purchased and the caramel is plentiful at the top then it begins to get sparse about half way down at 3/4s of the way down its gone. It works out in my husbands favor because he doesn't care for the caramel so he gets to finish my pint while having a full pint of his choice. Please please please, its called salted caramel core for a reason. Let the caramel flow through the core. P.S. You could put a little extra in there, I totally would not mind.

Why are people complaining about the blonde brownies? If you don’t like blonde brownies, get ice cream with fudge brownies! I LOVE the blonde brownies and cannot get enough of them. This ice cream is by far my favorite. I have driven to multiple stores to try and find it... and when I do, I stock up! I’ve tried other flavors when I can’t find this one, and none of them even come close to making me as happy as this does! I’d say sometimes the caramel to brownie ratio is a little off at times (more brownies please!), but I’ll still always enjoy it nevertheless!

This ice cream is worst ice cream I’ve ever tasted. I was beyond excited when I picked it up today and couldn’t wait to get home and try it. First the sweet cream ice cream has no flavour. But that’s fine I could get past that, but the salted caramel core is what’s really wrong. It’s disgusting and so salty it’s actually inedible. I’ve had ice cream before that I have really enjoyed but never to the point where I physically can not stomach it. I love salted caramel but this is just another level. I actually came here to read the reviews and see how others thought of it just in case mine was a bad batch. Never again!

I bought this last night to go with Louisiana Crunch cake because I was craving that salty and sweet flavor. Unfortunately, I was not thrilled with the salted caramel core of this ice cream. Usually, when you have salted caramel, the salt enhances the flavor of the caramel. The salt in this core OVERWHELMED everything, even the cake. It was disappointing to not enjoy my dessert and I doubt I'll be finishing this pint of ice cream, which is a shame because you should never have to throw away ice cream.

This is definitely my favorite flavor, but recently, it does not have enough blonde brownie chunks. I'll go through at least half of the pint with just 1 or 2 chunks. It looks like plain ice cream with a salted caramel core. This has happened a lot lately, and it's so dissapointing. I've gotten to the point where I simply stopped buying it. Today, purchased two because they were on sale. It started the way it should be, with plenty of yummy chunks. Before I even got halfway as I was serving myself, no more chunks. After some digging around, I found 3 more way at the bottom. Please fix this! I love this ice cream, but it's pointless without the chunks.

I am not a chocolate person at all, and this was my very first time trying Ben & Jerry's, (Shame on me I'm 23 lol) so I was so excited to find a Caramel Ice Cream with BLONDE Brownie chunks instead of fudge. I really wanted to like this ice cream but I just couldn't. The Salted Caramel is a little too salty, In fact, I couldn't even eat the core, I just ate around it. I didn't really like the Sweet Cream Ice Cream, it didn't really have a taste to me, (Maybe Vanilla would be better). The only thing I loved about this Ice Cream were the Blonde Brownie Chunks, They were so delicious! I would love for this Ice Cream Recipe to be worked on, maybe I'll give it a try again in the future.

I LOVE caramel, so much so that I could eat it off a spoon, which was exactly what I was planning to do when I bought this ice cream. Unfortunately this caramel core is way too salty. I actually eat around it! I'm not a fan of the sweet cream ice cream flavor either; vanilla would've worked better. The blondie pieces were delicious but overall I'm disappointed. I really wanted to love this since I love Ben & Jerry's but this was not up to par with their other flavors!

column4: Salted Caramel core had NO CARAMEL
column5: I love all the Ben & Jerry’s flavor. But recently I been so disappointed of my favorite flavor salted core caramel. It has no core
The ice cream really didn’t taste like anything significant and then the caramel which carried the whole dessert ended half way through the cup :( very disappointed!

column4: Core went about an inch into the pint
column5: The core was absolutely delicious for about a scoop of icecream. Then there was no core for the entire rest of the pint. Huge disappointment.

column4: good on top...not so good the further down you get
column5: I've seen this flavor multiple times at the grocery store the past few months and been tempted, finally pulled the trigger last week.

I feel like a dork writing a review for ice cream, but usually a pint only lasts us 3-5 days in our home and we were so disappointed with this one and it's still in the freezer a month later untouched. In addition, I love anything caramel but the salted caramel core was so overbearing, I honestly don't know how this made it on to be a final flavor after the taste testers tried it. It's just too salty. We scooped the caramel into the sink, but then the rest was just a little boring. I will still be a loyal B&J fan, but will be super hesitant when it comes to their caramel line.

column4: Why aren’t the brownie bits chewy?
column5: Hello. I just bought my 4th and 5th pints of salted caramel core while awaiting Hurricane Dorian to arrive. I will have to say that my son and I greatly enjoyed the first 3. Plenty of salty caramel (yum) and plenty of brownie bits that were chewy to the bite. However these last 2 pints that I just purchased do have plenty of caramel and brownie bits but they aren’t chewy. They are more crumbly to the bite. I’m not sure if the first 3 were a fluke or these last 2 weren’t right. Is the brownie supposed to be chewy or crumbly? These last 2 were disappointing for us and makes me question whether we should buy this kind again.

So it's the middle of June and I made an impromptu decision to get a small thing of ice cream during my shopping trip. I initially was thinking of going for a strawberry or peach flavor, but then I saw this pint and had a double take. I'd never try this flavor prior and man, I do not regret it. I love this pint. I love sweet cream and blonde brownie so this was a win-win. I like how to salted caramel is in the center so I have the ability to control how much I want in each bite. I do agree that the salted caramel is a bit on the salty side, but like I said, I have the control to put as little as I want in my scoop.

I'll be completely honest, I'm not generally a fan of caramel (it's just too sweet for me) but I gave this flavor a shot because of the sweet cream ice cream. As it turns out, the saltiness of the caramel core perfectly balances out the sweetness! I was pleasantly surprised by how much I enjoyed the salted caramel core. The blonde brownie chunks were also a nice touch and not too overwhelming. I feel like the ratio of mix ins to chunks was nicely balanced.

Okay I was expecting an almost too salty weirdly over sweet ice cream but man was I wrong!!! No seriously!!! I started eating this ice cream and was transported to the first time I had gooey caramel pop corn... the ice cream was like eating sweet corn creamy and smooth and the chewy bits supposed to be brownie tasted like caramel pop corn that had gotten chewy and sweet soaked in ice cream.. then the salty caramel center was too good to even say but together the best caramel pop corn ice cream I have ever had.. even though I don’t know if that’s what they were going for lol.. my favorite flavor so far

This was my 1st pint of Salted Caramel Core but not my first Ben and Jerry’s Core pint. My first impression was that my core was HUGE! It was literally overflowing when I opened the pint! Wow! And the caramel itself was delicious; salty sweet and gooey! The sweet cream ice cream was very rich and cut through the sweet of the core nicely. My only issue was the blonde brownie bits. It’s not that they weren’t plentiful, I just really didn’t like the taste of them, which is sad because the rest of the pint was KILLER! The chocolate brownies in the other flavors are amazingly good so I was disappointed that these blonde ones weren’t very good and I ate around them. So, all in all, it was a good pint with amazing caramel, good ice cream and funky brownies.

This is my all time favorite flavor. For me it's the perfect combination of sweet and salty and its upsetting to see so many people hate on it. I think vanilla would be too over powering but everyone's taste buds are different. I do agree the blonde brownie bits have been lacking... but I'm an eat the entire pint kinda gal.. oops..sit down to a good movie and this is my go to snack to grab (wish it came in a dairy free option, but I live in WI so I suffer through being lactose intolerant all the time)
So in short, it is sweet and salty flavor. I always have a partial scoop of ice cream to core spoonful I eat and I guess I'm the weirdo that runs outta caramel before ice cream... oops xD

I love carmel so much and as soon as I saw carmel core I grabbed it off the shelf. The carmel tastes great and I love the ice cream and blonde brownie pieces in it!!! The only thing that is wrong with it is how much carmel they gave me. It was 3/4 carmel and 1/4 ice cream. It wasn’t a good balance and I probably won’t get it again.

column4: My Favorite Flavor- One of a Kind
column5: I always wanted a flavor of ice cream that was tailored to the way my taste buds worked. Most ice cream flavors from other companies that have cookie dough in it is chocolate based, but Ben & Jerry’s has cornered the market: this cookie dough is caramel and butter and cookie based (or blondie if that’s the correct term)! I’ve been buying it almost every weekend at college for a year! Please keep this flavor, it makes me so happy. The fact that there’s a cookie dough flavor that is chocolate free is one of a kind and not many ice companies make that!

I was so excited to try the “core” pints. The picture they show online makes it look like a decent size and width. The reality: the core of my salted caramel pint was the width of a pencil eraser tip. Incredibly disappointing and 100% not as advertised. I feel duped.

I bought this on sale and was excited to try it. While the ice cream is light and blondies are a nice treat, I wish there was more of a salted caramel core. Mine did not go down even halfway, which is a pity because I love salted caramel.
I had to buy this to since they were all out of mint at the store...lots of Carmel Core which was a plus but no blondie chunks!!! Any were so tiny...very disappointed because Ben and jerrys rocks!!
I love this but where did my core go??????????????

I know sweet cream ice cream probably wouldn't be a big seller but I wish B&J would make more flavors with a sweet cream base or just a plain sweet cream ice cream. When the flavor was 1st introduced I used to get this regularly but it got to a point I was throwing away most of the caramel because it was too salty. I will still occasionally purchase as there are no other flavors with sweet cream.

Bought this recently because my local target has stopped carrying Blondie Ambition, which was my favorite. I love the sweet-cream ice cream; my container didn't seem to have very many blondie chunks (which was disappointing, see previous) and the salted caramel core was overly salty. It was okay. I might buy it again but would rather have Blondie Ambition.

I really wanted to like this flavor but it was quite disappointing. Halfway into the pint, the core pretty much disappeared. There was way too much at the top and it wasn't dispersed evenly throughout the ice cream. The caramel was also way too salty for my tastes. Also wished there were more brownie pieces, only found a few in the entire pint.
Couldn't find any in my pint. But the rest is fabulous, don't change a thing!

I had a major craving for ice cream so of course I had to go to the store for some Ben and Jerry's! I was really excited about this flavor, but after a few bites I was gagging. It was too salty and there were barely any brownie chunks :/ I'm really sad this ice cream is going to go waste, but I'm not happy with my purchase at all.

Just bought this last night and like some of the other reviews there were only a few flecks of blondie. Mine was nothing like the photos. And so the combination of just ice cream and such salty caramel was disappointing and unbalanced. I don't know if the core extended to the bottom since I didn't eat enough to find out.

I never thought I would not like a Ben & Jerry's flavor, but it's happened :( When my store didn't have my favorite flavor, I thought I would try the Salted Caramel Core - the description sounded great. Unfortunately, the caramel was *way* too salty - I ended up scooping it all out. The vanilla ice cream was good, but the brownie pieces had no flavor. I've never been disappointed by Ben & Jerry's before, but I guess there's a first for everything :(

column4: They sure meant it when it said salted
column5: The salted caramel core tastes like someone went a little too salt happy. There was just too much core in ratio with the ice cream an in addition to the bad core to ice cream ratio, the core was just too salty to handle. Please fix the core because the ice cream itself with the blonde brownie bits are delicious.

I was excited for this ice cream because I love blondies and caramel, but it was the one flavor I've tried that I strongly dislike. The core didn't go deep at all and it was SO salty that it made me feel kind of sick. The brownies were dry and sparce and I barely could taste them. The base was alright, I guess. Really dissapointed. I think this flavor needs to be fixed or just stopped being made.

I've been hooked on this flavor for more than 2 weeks now. I wish I'd have known about it sooner lol! The Salted Caramel Core is very good and the Blonde Brownies make this product over the top. I do have one complaint though. I buy maybe 4 pints or more a week and everytime I open one and start eating them they are all different as far as how many brownie peices there are or the caramel. Sometimes there's a ton of salted caramel at the top which can be overwhelming and then it's gone half way down. Other times it's normal until you get about halfway and there nothing but the sweet cream ice cream with no caramel or brownies. It's always different, however I'm still in love with this flavor and I highly recommend it! Please B&J see if y'all can get them all the same lol

I always wanted a flavor of ice cream that was taylored to the way my taste buds worked. Most ice cream flavors from other companies that have cookie dough in it is chocolate based, but this cookie dough is caramel and butter and cookie based (or boo die if that’s the correct term) I’ve been buying it almost every weekend at college for a year!
Please keep this flavor, it makes me so happy. The fact that there’s a cookie dough flavor that is chocolate free is one of a kind and not many ice companies make that!

The blondie mix ins and sweet cream ice cream were nice, but I really wasn't a fan of the caramel core, because it was far too salty. You've got multiple reviews saying that it's too salty, please don't skim over those reviews. Please consider tweaking the recipe on this one so it's less salty.

I usually love salted caramel foods, and I adore Ben & Jerry's decadent ice creams. The ice cream was excellent, the brownie pieces were yummy, but the caramel tasted way too salty! The salt is supposed to compliment the caramel, not overpower it. I'm pretty disappointed.

I love anything caramel. I was super excited when I saw the whole core was salted caramel. However it was way too salty, I even tried mixing it with the sweet cream ice cream and it was still too salty. It could also use more of the brownie, which was certainly delicious.

column4: My all time favorite ice cream!!!
column5: I.JUST.LOVE this ice cream!!! if I eat ice cream, it must always be B&J salted caramel core! I think I'm addicted. It's a perfect combination between sweet and salty, plus delicious caramel and chewy chunks. I noticed that some pints don't have that much chunks but the vanilla ice cream itself is pretty yummy and honestly, I cannot stay mad for long haha! If B&J's ever discontinue this flavor, I think it could be the end of my world!

I bought this ice cream simply based on the fact that I was craving caramel. But with this wonderful ice cream, you get so much more. Not only is the Ice cream and blonde Brownies perfect...but the caramel is just so good. You almost want to save the caramel as long as you can because how perfect the flavor is. It's the perfect amounts of sweet and salty.

There must have been some sort of mistake with the amount of salt mixed into the caramel. Nobody would but that much saint into a desert. The pint it's still on our freezer. On a side note, Cherry Garcia is the best ice cream ever made.

Tried this flavor for the first time about two weeks ago it was delicious; But today I’m extremely disappointed. The core is so salty in this pint. I had other people try and they also agreed it was too salty. Don’t think I’m buying again.

I am a lover of all things caramel, and while the ice cream and the blonde bites were delicious, I found myself eating around the core because it was just too salty. Tasted like caramel flavored salt. Very disappointed in this flavor.

column4: I love it I love it.
column5: Salted caramel core is in my top three. My eating tactic is to scoop the ice cream from the outside and then smash the back of the spoon into the core so when I take a bite the first thing I'm hit with is salty and then it's sweet.

My daughter picked up this flavor for me to try because I love Carmel. I have to say, this is the worst flavor I have ever had. The blonde fudge was bland but the salted Carmel was the worst. It was so salty that I couldn't eat it.

I love Ben & Jerry and was excited about the Salted Caramel Core, BUT the caramel is WAY to salty. I even tried to eat it with more ice cream But the salty flavor is too powerful. Disappointed, I know Ben & Jerry could do better !

column4: Caramel core was WAY to salty.
column5:
Tried this for the very first time today. The caramel core was extremely salty. Way to salty to actually enjoy the caramel. Left a bad after taste.
On a positive note, the core was gooey and easy to scoop out with a spoon.

column4: Not a fan of brownie chunks
column5: I really can't stand the flavors with chunks of cookie/brownie. It seems like I'm eating something stale. I'm in the minority but I stopped going to a convenience store near me because all they carried were those types.

I had high hopes for this flavor, but the carmel core was way too salty. I was hoping for a sweeter kraft caramel taste. The blonde brownie bites were just okay...not much traditional brownie flavor. Won’t buy again.

I absolutely love Ben and Jerrys ice cream but this one was horrible. The picture looks like there will be tons and brownies and there were only 5 tiny bites in the whole pint. The caramel core was overly salty too.

So this used to be one of my favourite flavours! The Caramel is very salty and the blondie bits are very chewy but i love that!
The disappointment comes in the fact that the first few times i got this the core went right through to the very bottom! A thick gooey caramel all they way to the last bite. Each time I have gotten this since I have found the caramel to end sooner and sooner in the pint. This last container the caramel went about half way through .
Please bring back the core!!

I enjoyed the of flavor of the ice cream. But I was expecting much more caramel. When the label reads "Salted Caramel Core", I expected the caramel to be from the top to the bottom. At least that's what I think of the core to be. Like an apple core, it's in the middle from top to bottom. The core is the center of things.

column4: the worst thing to ever be in my mouth
column5: the caramel tastes like salty death. I think I have sodium poisoning from one bite. Gross as heck like why would you do this to people. Who let this pass the taste test??? Fr fr are y’alls tongues blind?

I found the salted caramel core shortly after discovering Karamel Sutra. Needless to say I fell in love! The flavors were amazing and the gooey salted caramel and blondie chunks went perfect together. Until the last 12, yes I said 12! Pints I bought, all fell short. They either had very few brownie chunks, the core stopped halfway through, or there was a pocket of air at the bottom where caramel should have been. I give up! I want my salted caramel, but not at 4.50/pt to be left unhappy.
I tried this ice cream when it first came out, didn't care for it. It seemed as though it was missing something and I really didn't like the salted caramel. I like the Karamel Sutra much better.
The sweet cream and blondie chunks were delicious, but the core was almost too salty to eat. The taste of salt was completely overpowering the caramel flavor. Good overall, just needs less salt.
The core just tastes like salt with no caramel flavour. The ice-cream was floury & the blonde brownie pieces had no taste. Worst flavour I’ve ever had. Very disappointed. :(

I purchase this flavor A LOT. Probably too much honestly. I have lived this for a while. Recently the punts seem to be lacking be caramel core to the bottom of the pint and the blondies are missing. There’s like 2 spoons of the caramel and 3 pieces of blondie.
Like I said before, I live this flavor. I just hope the manufacturing can go back to when I first found this flavor and fell in love!
The ice-cream is disappointingly tasteless...why not use vanilla. The caramel us too salty and intense...why not swirled? The brownie bites were few and far between.

column4: Brownies good, Caramel not so much
column5: I love Ben and Jerrys! The brownies and ice cream were very good! The caramel was just overwhelmingly salty. I couldn't even eat it. Maybe it's just not for me. :(
I had looked forward to trying this flavor but found the core saltier than the ocean. As someone who loves caramel this is the worst caramel I have ever tried. I

Typically I love salted caramel desserts (or caramel in general), so when I saw this ice cream I was eager to try it. That caramel core nearly knocked me over with its saltiness!! For me, it overpowered the combined flavor of sweet cream, brownies and caramel. I agree with the other reviewers, vanilla ice cream might have been a better balance. However, I do like the blondies. So close!! :-(

the flavors are great and they work well together. Unfortunately, they do not work well with the core concept. The caramel would be much better if it were evenly distributed throughout the ice cream, rather than isolated in one huge pool. The blondies could pack a bit more flavor as well. So far, I have yet to have a variety of Ben & Jerry's core flavors that would not taste better if the flavors were evenly distributed. They almost taste like a cheap Ben & Jerry's knockoff.

column4: Great but really salty in the caramel core...
column5: I bought this favor couple of days ago and thought what could be bad about a salted caramel core. Everything was great except the core was so salty that it drowned out the other favors. I do mean salty the 180 mg are in the caramel core. It left a nasty taste in my mouth. Anybody who needs to watch there salt intake shouldn't eat this ice cream favor.

I bought this the other day and was so excited, but when I tried it, the core was way too salty. I love salted caramel, and all the other reviews rave about the core so I'm pretty confused.. Maybe I got a bad pint but it was like salt with an essence of caramel. Sooo overpoweringly salty; first time I've avoided a swirl or core :(

I don't even understand how anyone could have anything bad to say about this ice cream. The sweat cream base is just the right about of sweet. The salted caramel core is almost bitter on it's own but when paired together they are such a great couple, plus the blondie bites! I am a digger and I never run out of these delicious gems. I will cry If they discontinue this one. For someone that doesn't want an overly sweet ice cream this is perfect.

Honestly have no idea why people are complaining about this. There couldn’t have been a better pairing of delicious succulent sweet cream ice cream paired with blonde brownies and topped off with savoring salted caramel to make your taste buds smile with such joy. I’ve been buying a pint every week for the past 3 months and haven’t had the urge to try a different flavor. Please don’t ever discontinue this flavor it makes belly very happy

My husband was away for the evening, and I felt like a little R&R so I headed to the store for some trusty B&J. I decided to go for a flavor I'd never tried. The description sounded so delicious. And delicious it was! Until, I discovered the core was no more than a dollop on top. At about an inch deep it just vanished, leaving me with nothing but the ice cream and blondies... pretty good stuff, but I'm disappointed at the lack of core.

That Salted Carmel Core is WAY WAY too Salty. I tired this when it firs came out and I hate it because it was too salty, but I decided to give it another try to see if the formula had been tweaked.. and nope, it has not. So So SO salty. Like others below, I scooped out the core and ate around what I could.

This flavor is magnificent. The sweet cream ice cream works perfectly with the caramel and blondies. And the blondies are particularly great - soft and flavorful. I'm always scared that this flavor will go to the graveyard. Please, Ben and Jerry's, don't discontinue salted caramel core!

I wanted to try something new and thought this looked delicious. It was REALLY good, but less than half way down the “core” literally disappeared. I mean, the ice cream and blonde chi class were good. But I really bought it for the caramel core and kind of feel like I got jipped.

I LOVE this flavor!!!
I have been addicted to this since 2016!!!
It surpasses anything like it!
I love salted caramel ice cream. However it’s hard finding one WITHOUT chocolate!!!
Chocolate overwhelms the salted caramel for me!
However, salted caramel core gets it right!!!
The blondie bites are the cherry on top!
Please don’t ever discontinue this flavor!!!
If I could afford to purchase every pint, I would!!!

I really wanted to like this ice cream because I'm a die hard B&J's fan! However it just wasn't that great. The ice cream base was very yummy, it wasn't an overpowering flavor and the blondie chucks were very good! But the center, tasted like pure table salt and sugar mixed. It really was over the top salts to the point where I just ended up eating around it...I wish I would have gotten another flavor if I had known.

column4: What happened to the blondes bites?
column5: This was my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor. I still love the sweet cream ice-cream and I adore the caramel core, but something happened to the blonde brownie pieces. They used to be soft and chewy, perfect texture and delicious. The texture has changed now they are hard and crumbly very disappointing. Thought it was a fluke but the last maybe 5 pints I've had from different stores have all had the same issue.

column4: Delicious brownies but caramel is disgusting
column5: I bought this last night and was very excited to try. Brownie was great but caramel was so salty that I couldn't even eat it. It was like someone poured a salt shaker's worth of salt into it. Did anyone else have this experience?

I've already told my husband that I just might cry if this flavor is ever discontinued. And we would need another freezer so I can stock up on pints. To the reviewers saying this mix would be better with vanilla ice cream, you need to check your taste buds! The sweet cream complements the salted caramel core so wonderfully. Although I will agree with others - more blonde brownie chunks please!

This is truly my favorite ice cream flavor! I have introduced several friends to it, and they love it just as much! I introduced my husband to it when we were dating, and we actually had salted caramel core pints at our wedding instead of cake. The salted caramel is perfect for salted caramel lovers, and the blonde brownies are the best addition! I would 10/10 recommend this goodness.

column4: The best thing I’ve ever put in my mouth
column5: This was the best ice cream I’ve ever tasted. The salted Carmel mixed with the sweet cream ice cream is Devine. When you hit a blonde piece it’s the most delicious mouth watering bite. I would recommend this ice cream to everyone I know. I could live off of this for the rest of my life and be content. I stalked up on these pints during quarantine. Ben and Jerry please sponsor me.

column4: Salted caramel with emphasis on the SALTED
column5: The core concept is great because you get a lot of one key component. I normally love salted caramel. However, the caramel core in this ice cream is so salty I can't eat it. It isn't even a matter of mixing it together with the other ingredients to maybe make it taste better than it does in isolation. The salt just overpowers everything!
I’m tempted to give a bad review to see if they “reach out to me to make it right” by giving free ice cream...

I got a pint of this ice cream and i had to throw it out. It had an awful taste and the brownies were really gross and chewy; I spit it out and it left an awful after-taste. I checked the date on the carton and it’s good until 2019, so I’m not sure what happened but the ice cream was the worst I’ve ever eaten. Won’t get that again.

I'm very surprised by the low reviews on this flavor. It is absolutely delicious. The caramel core is what makes this one so special. You can enjoy it all the way down to the end of the pint. It could use more blondie chunks (bigger ones, too) but this didn't detract enough for me to take away any stars. I LOVE this flavor.

I love the flavor combo of this ice cream but I just wanted more brownie pieces. I found myself trying to dig out what few pieces were in middle of my pint. Just a little disappointed. I just wanted more :( The overall taste of the ice cream was on point. I don't think a little more brownie chunks will mess that up. Thanks!

Ok so this was my first 'core' Ben and Jerry's. It was awesome. I love the experience of mixing the ice cream with the caramel. But where were the blondies? They were few and far between each bite. I was very excited about it everytime I managed to find a small piece. Also, are the blondies made by Greyston Bakery?

column4: Best ice cream in the history of cream!
column5: My husband brought it home a few months ago and now im addicted! It's so good i as in hospital having brain surgery and it's all I wanted! I give up meals so i can eat it. I don't like chocolate so it's so hard to find blonde brownies and salted carmel without chocolate. If I had a last meal it would be it!

This one is my favorite out of the cores! I'm a lover of caramel and a lover of blondie brownies so of course this is a win! I can't see how the average rating is only 3.5. I don't get it. I don't know what people are tasting, because this is delicious. PLEASE don't get rid of this flavor!! I NEED it!

Been buying this since it came out and lately the core has been less and less each time I buy it. The core only goes 1/2 inch and then none. Wish the core would go to the bottom of the container. Please keep the same ingredient but more core caramel!
Would give it five stars with more caramel!

I LOVE this flavour. Salted caramel and blonde brownies are my favourite thing, and to find them in ice cream was a dream come true. The only thing I wish was different: I know "Salted" Caramel is the name of the flavour, but it really was too salty - so much so that I found it kind of off-putting.

column4: Great potential, but lacking in brownies.
column5: Tastes great and has so much potential, but the 6 pints of ice cream that I bought-all had a core of caramel with a couple of blonde brownies but nothing like I expected. It fell short of my expectations and I can't justify spending $5 a pint for ice cream that isn't chock-full of gooey goodness.

This was a dream come true when I found it in stores. I was so excited!! I barely made it home. BUT... disappointment hit me in the face when I almost died at how salty the caramel is. Wow. Not enough brownies. I guess I'll keep searching for my perfect flavor. I wish you could Exchange icecream.

My favorite flavour from ben&jerry’s! The salted caramel tastes amazing with the cream ice cream and i love the blondie brownies too. I live in europe and they do not have this flavour in finland, which makes me so sad :(
But every time i come to the states i buy it, because it tastes so good.

We have been buying this ice cream since it first debuted. It was our family favorite, hoewever, the last 6 pints we’ve bought have had hard, crunchy blondie bits instead of the soft, chewy pieces we knew and loved. This is such a disappointment and sadly, will make us stop buying this.

Truly. I’m in recovery from anorexia nervosa and you better believe that I’ve inhaled a pint of this ice cream every single day!!! The perfect ratio of salted caramel to smooth vanilla ice cream, and the brownie bits provide a nice touch of goodness.
Ben and Jerry’s: 1
Anorexia: 0

column4: Tastes Great but Caramel is too Salty
column5: I got this a few days ago just to try. I really loved it!! The blondie brownies are so yummy. I really enjoyed the ice cream overall. However the salted caramel core was a little too salty for the ice cream. I couldn’t really eat all the caramel with the ice cream like I wanted too

column4: Can’t get enough of this ice cream
column5: This ice cream. Y’all. This ice cream. The perfectly salted gooey caramel, the chewy chunks of blondie... ermahgerd. The worst part of this is we can barely find it anymore. BEN AND JERRY I swear to you if you get rid of this in the middle of a pandemic... I will never forgive you.

I am writing this review as I enjoy a pint of this very ice cream. It is delicious and the flavors go very well together. The only problem was, though, that the caramel was waaay too salty, so I ended up eating around it. Nontheless, it was really good and I hope to buy it again.

column4: good but can use a little help
column5: I think the sweet cream and caramel are great but I have bought this a couple times and the brownies just are off on taste. I feel like choc brownies would be better or to even leave them out. Far from gross but not as good as other ice cream which is a bummer with the price.

By far my favorite pint ever! Not to mention, SUPER addicting!!! The blond brownies are the beeeeessst, and with caramel? Truly my only companion in this quarantine, so i stocked up. World War IV could break out and as long as I have my daily B&J pints I’d survive just fine.

I bought this for the caramel core the first time and it was great. The second time with was a dollop of caramel on top. The third time an even smaller dollop. If you like just vanillia ice cream a little bit of caramel this is the ice cream for you. I am very disappointed.

I bought this about a month ago and have gotten two more containers since. I would not say it’s a flavor for everyone but I love it. I love salted Carmel. The salt pairs nicely with the sweet ice cream and blondies! But if you don’t like salty sweetness this is not for you.

I am allergic to coco beans so finding a tasty ice cream with out any chocolate can become quite the hassle. When I, thankfully, came across this ice cream I was over the moon. The only problem I have with it is that I can't find it in any stores when I go search for it.

First time buying a pint of salted caramel core. I was so excited! I immediately noticed a lack of blonde brownies and about half way through the pint, the caramel core disappeared. It looks nothing like the picture! There was a total of maybe 5 or 6 blondie pieces.

Salted caramel + blonde brownies + B&J ice cream = what I plan to replace my blood with.
If you LOVE sweet & salty this was made for you. If you haven't tried salted caramel with blondies, Do. It. Now. You have not lived & I weep for you, you poor unfortunate soul!

column4: First time wasn't love, second time was love!
column5: The first time I tried this I thought it was wayyy too salty. I gave it another try a few weeks later and I love it now. The trick is to have a tiny bite of caramel with the ice cream since sometimes the core has a lot of caramel and sometimes it just has a little.

I usually get salted caramel core when none of my favorite flavors are available. Even though it's a last resort for me, I still enjoy the sweetness of the vanilla, the chewiness of the blonde brownies, and the incredibly rich caramel. It blend together perfectly.

I really love salted caramel and blondes. I think in this pint, though, that the caramel is wayyyyy too overpowering and there are too few blondies to enjoy. I ate around the caramel, but as the core spread through the rest, it ruined the ice cream in my opinion.

I think it should be a little more brownies and Carmel all the way to the bottom so you can have a little bit of caramels and brownie with each bite after a few scoops mine didn’t have any more brownies like it was only brownies in the top layer of ice cream

I bought this for the first time tonight 1/23/19 and was super excited because I love salted caramel ice cream. Upon opening the product I noticed that the ice cream had no caramel in it whatsoever. Highly disappointed especially for the price of a pint.

column4: A Caramel Lover's Dream (With A Catch)
column5: This ice cream is very tasty with the caramel core. However, my core only went halfway through and then stopped. I also wish the chewy bits were a little more flavorful and thicker. Other than being cheated on the core, I really enjoyed this ice cream.

I have been obsessed with this flavor since the first time i had it! It's all about balancing the sweet cream and the caramel! Too much caramel might be too salty but too much cream might be too sweet. It a balance and extraordinary once you find it!

This is one of my favorite ice cream flavors of all time. The caramel is yes, salted! But I personally love the saltier caramel with the sweet creamy ice cream. And the blondie brownies are so YUM! I will be sad if they ever stopped making this one.

column4: Barely any blonde chunks and core stopped
column5: I was so excited to try this but I had barely any blond or chuncks in my ice cream and the core stopped half way through!! I thought the core was supposed to to all the way to the bottom. Very upset and this was my first time trying Ben and Jerry’s

I love this flavor, it is now my go to! It is the perfect mix of sweet and salty, only sometimes issue is that the core occasionally stops before the end of the carton. It doesn't matter to me though because I still love the brownies in it!

This is the absolute best flavor!!!! I love how creamy the ice cream is. The brownies are absolutely amazing full of flavor and very soft!! The caramel is super salty and sweet it's SOO GOOD I'm obsessed. Don't ever change the ingredients!!

As somebody who grew up on Ben & Jerry's I have been spoiled by so many delicious blends. However, this one was very tasty, but disappointing because the core kept getting smaller until disappearing halfway through and so did the brownies.

I just actually finished a pint of this and while I like the idea and the flavors, it was very off balanced flavor wise. I can't tell if it was just my pint or what but it was overwhelmingly salty with little to none blonde chunks );

I have loved b&j for many years. My favorite of course which is gone was Wavy Gravy. I bought this flavor because Karmal Sutra wasn't available, this is nothing like it, gagged on the first bite of Karmel SSSOOO salty!!!!!! Yuch

column4: Great flavor but not much of a core
column5: Unlike other reviewers, I enjoyed the flavor of the salted caramel. I didn’t find it too overpowering. I just wish the core made it all the way to the bottom of the pint. The pint I ate only had caramel at the very top

column4: Amazing icecream but needs a little more brownie
column5: I brought this so manny times I love it really but the thing about it is that it needs a little more brownie dough in there and honestly I love the Carmel center but it’s just the brownies that need a little bit more

column4: Where's the rest of the core??
column5: I loved this ice cream when I stared the pint but not even halfway through, the caramel core just stopped! I had to be a bad batch because no way that's how it's supposed to be. Sad because that was my favorite part!

Bought this last night and while the flavor was great there were literally only 5 chunks of blondies throughout the whole pint. I wish there were a lot more as it would have make the eating experience more enjoyable

This is becoming my favorite ice cream, and one that I have come to crave. The only thing that would make it better would be more of the caramel - Ben and Jerry's makes the best caramel in ice cream I've ever had!

I love anything caramel. Tried this flavor years ago - core was like creamy salt. ! Gave it another try recently thinking it may have just been a bad batch, but again, nothing caramel about it. Will not buy again!

This is one of the main Ice Creams that I purchase from Ben & Jerry's!! Absolutely the BEST is you like Salted Carmel. I do not understand why the rating is not higher??? But PLEASE DO NOT REMOVE this flavor. <3
I buy this all the time because it's so delicious. The salted caramel and blondies create a tasty melange of awesome flavors. It's my favorite! I highly recommend it!!

I bought this last night, the "core" barely even went halfway down the pint and there were only a couple chunks of brownie. Didn't even finish it, lacked excitement as all i was left with was vanilla ice cream.

this is the best flavor of Ben & Jerry’s by far. If you’re complaining I don’t trust you; this is seriously the most addicting flavor. If they stop making this flavor I’ll cry. Soooooooooooo goooooooodddddddd

I'm a big salty/sweet fan so this ice cream is perfect for me. I see people complaining about how salty the caramel is, but that's honestly my favorite part about it! Devouring a pint as I type this review.

column4: Not so good for the first try
column5: Today was my first time trying it and I’m a little disappointed I thought this would be “ salty “ but NOT THAT EXTREME SALTY. I wish it was less salty don’t get me wrong I love caramel but this was to much !
Due to health issues, I cannot eat chocolate, so this ice cream is a lifesaver! It's sweet, the caramel is outrageously soft and delicious, and the brownies offer a great bit of texture. I love it!
I think this is my first time writing a review for ice cream. But this flavor is just amazing. The chewy brownies are delicious and I love salted caramel. Perfect amount of salt in my opinion.
If you like Baskin & Robbins' "Pralines & Cream" ice cream flavor, you will LOVE Ben & Jerry's Salted Caramel Core! However, be careful: It will add the weight on you -- it is just THAT good!
I love this flavor so much! I just wish the caramel core went all the way to the bottom. About half way down the pint the caramel goes away! It's so sad because this flavor is delicious!
I'm not sure how this flavor is rated so low! It is life changing.
I love vanilla ice cream based flavors and this one is the best. Blond brownies, ice cream and caramel are a great flavor combination. It is hard to stop eating it once I have started!
I bought this a less then a month ago and I can't stop thinking about it ahhhhhh soooo gooood but another one I really recommend is "the tonight dough" I rate that a 12/10 sooooo good
Absolutely wonderful use of the core to have a luscious slug of salted caramel drilled down the center!!! Awesomeness!!! I will buy this flavor forever as long as it is available!
Please never stop making this flavor! The salted core is perfect if you get a small amount of core on each spoonful along with a chunk of blonde with the ice cream it is to die for!
I buy this ice cream maybe twice a week but the last two purchases haven't had caramel completely to the bottom and not enough blonde bits.....I don't know why but I still love it
I bought it accidentally for my Birthday - I wanted something else - but, it is not that bad what I expected about the taste of caramel! More than likely I would buy it again.
This has the perfect example of what salted caramel should be. Smooth and silky with a salt/sweet balance that's downright addictive. Had to force myself away from the carton.
I wish I had something bad to say about this flavor just so I can get coupons for MORE!! LOL I've never run across a bad batch. It's always DeLiCiOuS!! Thank you so much!!
The salted caramel core reaches my soul. The addition of sweet cream ice cream and blonde brownie bits complement the salted caramel as a perfect masterpiece of flavors.
I am so in love with this ice cream. Must always have some with me. The sweet cream ice cream combined with the blondie pieces and caramel are a match made in heaven!
This one is by far in my top five. I once had a flavor with honey bun pieces and caramel and was obsessed with it but this one by far blows that one out of the water

column4: Bummed about lack of swirl and blondie
column5: Ben and Jerry’s has never let me down until now! Huge fan of the other flavors, but this was lacking with the burst of mix ins we all have come to know and love.
This is hands down my favorite flavor! I'm not a chocolate fan, so I appreciate every aspect of this. Each ingredient shines, but I love a good blondie chunk!
After trying dozens of flavors this is the one I keep going back to. The caramel core is divine and there's enough to go with every bite. I LOVE THIS FLAVOR
Very little caramel in the core. There wasn't any caramel until half way down. I've wanted to try the core flavors for a long time now. Won't buy again.
What’s not to love? I’m completely addicted to this ice cream. I fight with my husband when I feel he’s eating more than his fair share of the core.
This is hands down my favorite flavor of ice cream! Please don’t ever get rid of this! I would sell my souls for a pint of Salted Caramel Core!

column4: too salty and not enough brownie
column5: I love the sweet cream and the blonde but the caramel is too salty and there isn’t enough brownie bits in it! Other than that it is DELICIOUS!

column4: Y'all are crazy, this is great
column5: I love this flavor. The intense saltiness of the caramel is my favorite feature, and the blondie bits are divine. I eat it all the time.
this is the perfect ice cream if you are a caramel lover - that's it!
I love salted carmel, sometimes it doesn't have a lot of brownies and caramel. If they could make that more consitant would be awesome.

column4: My favorite, love alllll the caramel
column5: I love the salted caramel core. It’s the best part. Hard to find ice cream with no chocolate but I finally have and it’s the best.
This is by far my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor! Love the caramel core, perfectly gooey and the blonde brownies are sooo good!

It's the second time in a row that I buy this ice cream, and I dont seem to get tired of it :)
Just ate it a minute ago :))))
This flavor is my absolute favorite ice cream! It's so amazing! Sadly however, they stopped selling it in my local stores RIP
I tried this for the first time last week, and now I'm hooked. The ice cream alone is great, and the caramel core is amazing!
My mom and I always get this one every time we go to the store. There's a lot of caramel, but it doesn't overpower you.
Caramel “core” completely ended less than half way through. What a joke! Apparently no quality control being done.
This is the best ice cream ever. I am a fan. 10 out 10. Everyone should get it. Please let me sponsor this flavor.
I try new flavors, but always get this one too. It is the best flavor in my opinion. The caramel is delicious!!!
I am giving it a full 5 because it is the best of this line. That said, I do wish there was more brownie bits!
This is my absolute favorite flavor.. please don’t ever take this away! I love the caramel core. The best!!!
BEST ICE CREAM , IT IS DEFINITELY MY FAVORITE. ONLY THING THAT WOULD MAKE IT PERFECT WAS DOUBLE THE CARAMEL.
I bought this yesterday after some convincing and I'm disappointed I had maybe 4 brownie chunks in mine :(
I love the sweet and salt combination! Need more quart containers in you inventory besides Cherry Garcia!
It has a delicious flavor and It is so creamy and good The only word I can think of to describe it is YUM
If you love salted caramel this is the way to go! And I love the blonde brownie bits in the ice cream

column4: Perfect except for lack of core
column5: I thought the core would go all the way through. It was only about an inch deep. Delicious otherwise.
I've had this multiple times at our school store, and it's delicious. I could eat everyday, honestly.
Got this as a surprise and loved it! The salted Carmel core with the blondies was my favorite part
My husband and I had this on our vacation in Myrtle Beach a couple of days ago and it was awesome!
This is one of my top three favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor and definitely my favorite core flavor
The flavor and idea is amazing but it wasn't enough brownies for me won't plan on buying again
The pieces in the ice cream are very dry and crusty. Not good. The core is pretty good tho!
This flavor was exceptional imo, the salty caramel in the center was generous and so good!

column4: Extra creamy, perfect amount of caramel
column5: Extra creamy, perfect amount of caramel, not too sweet. This one is my absolute favorite.
Love all the caramel down the middle of the pint! Great flavor without being too rich.
Really good ice cream. Highly recommend it. The caramel core really tops it off. 9/10.
Love everything about this caramel core!!! I am a caramel lover and this hits the spot
This is one of my top 3 favorites!!!!! Love the blonde brownie with caramel!!!!!!!!
It has all the good stuff! The flavors and gobs of blonde brownie are the best!!!

column4: Core doesn't go down to bottom
column5: Core doesn't go down to bottom and isn't in the center also caramel is too salty
OMG, I have tried this by mistake & it is now my fave!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
MY NEW FAVORITE FLAVOR. this was the most amazing ice cream i have ever tasted!
The most perfect caramel ice cream flavor on the market. I’m forever obsessed!
Just the right blend of salty and sweet with silky smooth vanilla ice cream!
This was my first time trying this brand and I am in love with this flavor!
Caramel was lacking, brownies had no flavor, mostly vanilla ice cream only
I thought the Carmel tasted burnt. There wasn’t enough other flavor.

column4: Best ice cream in the world!!
column5: I just ate this and did not want it to end. Must try before you die
I’ve been obsessed with this flavor for Months . It’s amazing
I can't find it in Houston anywhere for the last 6 months
The gooey caramel makes this pint my personal favorite!
Addictive!!! Love this flavor! True Caramel fans only!

column4: Anyone who says it’s bad is a liar.
column5: It’s amazing, the best ice cream possibly of all time.
Can’t get enough! Best ice cream I have ever tasted❤️
My favorite ice cream of all time! I’m in love! Truly!
This ice cream is amazing. My whole family is obsessed
THE BEST ICE CREAM EVER!
I will buy amost anything with salted caramel in it
Amazing smooth caramel .... great job on this one!
My all time favorite I go out of my way to find it

Ben and Jerry's took the peanut butter/chocolate flavor and knocked it out the park yet again. The peanut butter ice cream is great as always, but combined with the pretzel swirls, the flavor is heightened to an amazing degree. A nice little crunch to the pretzels as well for texture. The brownies aren't quite as good as in other flavors but definitely plentiful and still tasty. Put em all together and you get a salty/sweet peanut butter and chocolate combination that just works. A great flavor.

column4: THIS IS THE BEST ICE CREAM IVE EVER HAD
column5: The actual peanut butter ice cream is amazing, the brownie chunks taste like they were just cooked. The pretzel bits are the most amazing thing I have eaten, they are not too salty. They are not crunchy or too soft, evert time I get a bite with the pretzel in it I have to just stop and savor it. So far I have only found these at Target I have shared about eight pints in a couple weeks with my husband. Honestly it's the best ice cream I've ever had. Hard, soft, homemade, vegan or non, it's the best.

I will start by saying that I'm not a peanut butter flavored ice cream fan(I'm an urban bourbon addict)the only reason I tried this flavor was I couldn't find my flavor. Boy did this flavor SURPRISE me. It's a must try.

My top two favorites of all time are Tonight Dough and Chubby Hubby (tied for first place) and a close second place is Netflix & Chill’d! The brownie pieces were HUGE and the salty sweet combo was just perfection.
This is EVERYTHING I want in ice cream! Peanut butter, sweet, salty & just enough chocolate. I hope it becomes a regular flavor.

I love the PB ice cream rather than another flavour with gobs of actual peanut butter* throughout the pint**. The saltiness of the pretzel and chewy bits of fudge make tis quite possibly my new fave-flave. But...Everytime I look at the red couch on the label i can't help but think of tomatoes and thats not a flavour combo I wanna try anytime soon.*** Yuck!
* Don't get me wrong, I loves me some PB gobs but we got enough of those.
** I know that its not a pint here in Canada. But it sounds better than "2 cup tub o' B & J's"
*** If there IS a Tomato ice cream with chunks of marzipan and marshmallow swirl flavour in the works I'd beg you good folks to reconsider.
I am in love with this flavor. I'm a big pb fan and it is very prominent.

This is just simply amazing. I am not one for ice cream but this has changed my perspective, so many perfect flavors wrapped into one. Sweet yet salty, enough toppings in every bite. WOW! I look forward to this every night!

The peanut butter flavor is good and the ice cream is creamy, but the balance of salty to sweet is way off. This tastes like peanut butter ice cream with pure salt swirled through it. The brownies are soft but flavorless, so they do nothing to help balance the flavors. I normally love salty sweet combinations, but this missed the mark.

column4: All the best flavors in one
column5: The peanut butter, the brownies and the pretzels all together!! So good, perfect amount of sweet and salty. I need more!!!!!
This flavor was AMAZING. I would not change anything about it! I never thought I would find anything better than Half Baked and Tonight Dough, but this flavor definitely made it up there with them.
I was really disappointed in this one. Flavors were blah. The peanut butter icecream tasted more like vanilla and hardly any pretzel flavor. Chubby Hubby is a much better choice with similar concept
Salty and sweet, but could use more brownie chunks and pretzel swirls to achieve sheer perfection! The concept is there but my pint had paltry mix-ins.
Honestly the best ice cream I have ever had. I was expecting good, but this is a game changer. B&J ya'll never let me down!

column4: Reminds me of my fave Candy Bar Pie!
column5: I've be consistently buying this wherever I can! Please don't get rid of this!
Please don’t take this away from me. It is the perfect ice cream.

column4: Great taste and worth every penny
column5: Best Ice Cream ever been buying and loving Ben & Jerry's Ice cream since 2013 thanks keep up the good work

column4: Best flavor ever ( please make permanent )
column5: The first time I tried this I was in love, it's the perfect peanut butter flavor with the perfect amount of sweet and salty, it's amazing & the chocolate brownies add just the right amount of chocolate. I've bought probably 16 pints so far, maybe more. I'm in love!! I look forward to my treat at night and I dont know what I'd do without this flavor. Please please please #Ben&Jerry's dont ever take this one away, Netflix & chill'd needs to become a permanent option. I'll be so sad if y'all stop making this one.

Great pb flavor! Love the salty pretzel swirl! But the brownie pieces were too big and chewy, like a dog eating pb. I think I’d prefer it with a fudge swirl and larger pretzel pieces. Will try it again, maybe it will have smaller brownie chunks. Peanut Butter World is still my favorite.

column4: New Favorite for Ice Cream Addict
column5: I bought a pint of this when it first came out and I ate the whole thing in one sitting. And another the next day. And another the next... this is my FAVORITE flavor, even better than any I've had from any specialty ice cream parlor. It's the epitome of sweet and salty. The pretzels are almost more like sprinkles of salt with a bit of texture, the fudge brownie is dark and rich enough to break up any monotony. I don't want this to ever go away (even if it's responsible for 90% of my quarentine weight gain) :P
I got the chocolate fudge brownie and yes there is a great amount of brownie but I think the ice cream to brownie ratio should be more brownie less ice cream!

B&J did it again. The creamy smooth texture of the peanut ice cream contrasted with the swirl of salty pretzel goodness engaged with nice healthy chunks of brownies. Perfect combination of flavor and texture. Thank you B&J for making another wonderful creation. You guys rock!

I finally got around to trying this flavor and I’m so glad that I did! I’ve been buying Ben & Jerry’s for the past 15+ years and this is one of the best flavors I’ve ever had. The flavor of the peanut butter ice cream itself is incredible. I’m thoroughly impressed.
Honestly I think maybe I just got a bad one from the grocery store. The flavors were good but it was just SOOOO salty. I will probably try it again though, hopefully it was just a goofed pint

This was the worst ice cream I’ve ever had. Peanut butter flavor mixed with pretzel is way too salty. There is almost no brownie, and the brownie pieces have no flavor. This would have been better if it was chocolate ice cream or chocolate fudge mixed in.

Peanut flavor is exceptionally bold and delicious, however the saltiness is oddly mixed in, I’ve had bites of mild salty pretzel and really really salty bites. Could do a little better in that regard.
I bought this 3 days ago and just bought a second tub! Its absolutely perfect. I love the salty swirls and the brownies are soft and delicious. Please keep this flavour!

The peanut butter ice cream was chalky and salty. The brownies were made with a very bitter chocolate. The pretzels were in a mushy mass and did not look appetizing. This was probably the only B&J ice cream I have not liked.

I am a fan of peanut butter cup and cookie dough, and birthday cake. But I think this one is too much. A simple peanut butter flavor with brownies and why not bananas would have been enough. Why the "pretzels"? It tasted like uncooked dough. at least put real pieces of mini crunchy pretzel. I'm even surprised netflix associated their name to this ice cream :(
Just tried this flavor and it’s officially my favorite! Perfect balance of sweet, salty and savory. The little bits of fudge are also SOOOOOOO GOOD! Can’t get enough

Not a fan of this flavor at all. Seemed to have the makings of an awesome icecream with all sweet and salty components, however, the pretzel swirls were so salty it made me gag. 0/10 would not recommend

column4: One of the worst tastes ever
column5: I really enjoy different ice cream flavors, but this is just disgusting.

Looked high and low for the new flavor and was excited to try (peanut butter is my favorite). The flavor of the peanut butter ice cream was not overpowering as I was concerned, but pleasant. I was disturbed by the texture of the ice cream. It felt gritty and the brownie batter swirl had a taste like chocolate, but was the consistency of taffy. Not my favorite flavor.

I’m eating this now, and it’s getting harder and harder to eat. The pretzel swirls are strangely too salty and the brownie pieces are too mushy. The peanut butter ice cream is okay. The combination of everything together just doesn’t work for me. Maybe it needs some texture? Some crunch? I still love you, Ben & Jerry’s!! I’ll stick to Phish Food and Gimme S’more.
Amazing flavors and amazing taste. One of my top 3.

If you, like a horse, enjoy licking salt... than this is the ice cream for you. I really wish that the brownie parts were bigger and more brownie like. Also the pretzel dough bites are more like bits of playdough when it comes to flavor, and the added saltiness. Good Idea on paper, not so much in taste.
How did Netflix approve this flavour? It’s been in my freezer for days, which never happens :/

I bought this for the first time a few months ago, and wow. I was floored. This icecream is the most perfect balance of flavours ive ever experienced in a BJ pint. It is salty and sweet, but not too sweet as I find many BJ flavors, and not too salty.

I was excited to buy this flavor but was quickly disappointed. To me the brownies tasted of rye bread, the ice cream was gritty (not in a good way, either). There was flavor of pretzel but I saw no pieces. I will probably go back to Phish Food next time.

column4: Great concept that needs some tweaking in the lab
column5: I wanted to love this flavor. What’s not to like? Peanut butter ice cream with pretzel swirls and brownie pieces—should be a hit. It is not. First, the peanut butter ice cream is WAY too salty. I agree some salt is needed to offset what could otherwise be a cloyingly sweet peanut butter flavor, but this kills any semblance of peanut butter flavor and is unnecessary given the pretzel swirls. Second, why pretzel swirls and not pieces or chunks? The swirls are weirdly soft and barely evoke the sense of eating a pretzel. Finally, the brownie chunks were just weird. They are the same ones as in Half Baked, where they work beautifully. Here, I respect the need to bring in a chocolate component with a peanut butter base, that’s a no-brainer. But why not go with fudge chunks or chips? The brownies brought no flavor to this pint and certainly did not help on texture. A slight re-tooling of the flavors and components would probably make this the ice cream dream the description promised.
Tried it for the 1st time wont ever buy agian way to salty.
This is probably one of the worst Ben and Jerry ice cream I’ve ever had. I love Ben and Jerry I’ve cream, but this one is just plain bad.

column4: I am building a shrine to this flavor
column5: Okay, so when I saw this flavor first advertised I was out of my mind excited. I love peanut butter. I love brownies. And I love pretzels. But when I finally tracked it down in stores, I was disappointed because it wasn’t what I was expecting it to be. (Also, it melted a lot on the way home that day.)

This flavor has such a fun name and sounded amazing, so I recently purchased it. It's not bad by any means, but I found myself wishing there was more sweetness and/or chocolate throughout it. I found the peanut butter and pretzel combo made it a bit on the saltier side, and it would have been nice to have some additional sweetness (like a caramel swirl or chocolate ice cream mixed in) to balance it out a bit more.
I love the peanut butter ice cream base. Very delicious and unexpected.
Probably the worst B&J’s flavor I’ve ever tried. What a waste of calories

column4: This ice cream is the chip!
column5: Bought this as soon as I saw it in store last week. If you don't like sweet and salty stuff, this is not for you. As other reviewers said: I enjoy the milk chocolate, lighter, ice cream with chocolate chunks. The "chips" come in little balls and are surprisingly cripsy and chip tasting. I hope they add these as a permanent flavor! The people who don't like it probably also don't like pineapple on pizza ..

The peanut butter flavor was overwhelming to me and the salty pretzel swirl just layered on the intensity. However, i feel if there were more brownies throughout it would balance out. They all seemed to be clumped into the bottom of mine.

This has been my go-to flavor for the past month. The flavors go together really well, finding a perfect balance between the peanut butter, the pretzels and the fudge brownies. Another great thing about this flavor is the texture that it has which is pretty unique. Every bite you'll find a juxtaposition of the grainy pretzels and soft fudge swirls,. A truly delightful experience for the tastebuds!

column4: Netflix and Chill’d is my new favorite flavor
column5: It’s so good. The brownies are legitimately delicious as brownies, not brown blobs like other brands. The peanut butter ice cream and pretzel streak compliment each other. So good. I might give in and have it for breakfast today...

Everything about this ice cream is amazing...except the brownies. They remind me of the cheap cosmic brownies you can get at the grocery store. The pretzel swirls are so tasty with them PB ice cream though!
Hard to go wrong with ice cream, peanut butter, pretzel and cookies. Somehow this does!

This... is so good! I think its a perfect combo of salty and sweet; Didn't think I was too much of a peanut butter fan but this tastes so good honestly. I think it might beat Baked Alaska as my new favourite! PLS PLS PLS don't get rid of this flavour I know it's probably a limited edition or something but just rename it to something else without the Netflix.
I am a life long fan of Ben & Jerry's and love most so flavors. This is the only one that I could not eat. I had to throw it out. The main problem was that it was way too salty.
The flavors and textures work beautifully together. This is an extremely satisfying ice cream for my palette.

column4: What the heck were they thinking!?
column5: This is a terrible "ice cream" - I opened the pint, ate the bit stuck to the top of the lid and gagged so hard. How do you make peanut butter ice cream tasted like crushed hopes and dreams!? I'm so irrationally angry at this pint of ice cream I may never buy B&J's again... The only flavor I ever loved anyway was the creme brulee...

I do KETO and this was my treat for my carb load day and I have to agree with another review that the pretzel pieces reminded me of eating sand...or KETO almond flour. Lol Alzo the brownie portion was sticky so it kept sticking to my teeth in am awkward way. Def not my fav flavor, sorry.
I only had one piece of fudge and no pretzel bits! It was just pretzel crumbs & salt chunks in the middle. Sooooo dissappointed. :(
Salt poured onto gross flavorless ice cream ... seriously not much else to say. Waste of money. Please go with other flavors.

Can we take a moment to appreciate the delicious pretzel swirl in this, I need that in all my ice cream now! Such a great combination of flavors, the peanut butter ice cream is spot on and how Ben and Jerry's keeps their brownies so soft and fudgy is a miracle in itself. Love this flavor, so happy it looks like it will be a permanent flavor to the line!
About every few bites, there is a clump of salt that tastes disgusting and feel likes you're biting sand.
I think I have a new favorite flavor. If they continue to make this flavor, I'm sure to get more!

column4: BEST ICE CREAM I HAVE EVER HAD
column5: I am writing this while eating my favorite ice-cream ever ! Honestly, i've discovered it during quarantine because i could not find my flavor at the grocery store. Sweet and yet salty; mix of texture really i am obessed and you should definitely trying ! This is my first time writing a review for something but really it is so wooooorthy !

I LOVE anything with peanut butter and pretzels, and this point delivers that in an excellent way. I don't care for the brownien pieces, however. They're too big and don't taste very good. I think small pieces of chocolate fudge would work a lot better. This will not stop me from buying more of this flavor, though, that is for sure!

I don't know if it was just my pint, but the chunks of pretzels were so small it was like eating sand that stuck to my teeth. I got this pint because I couldn't find my original pint Justice remixed anywhere, and I really regret it.
Was so excited about thia flavor. The peanut butter ice cream and pretzel swirl is bomb but my pint had 0 brownies!!! They need to rethink the final product. Its lack lust.

I’m not a big peanut butter and chocolate fan BUT The peanut butter is so subtle in this icecream and with the pretzels it creates a dream and balances out the brownies. It’s amazing, I thought the tonight dough is my favourite but this is giving it a run for its money in my favourites

I bought this to complement some chocolate cake. The peanut butter flavor is fabulous. The salt from the pretzel enhances the flavor. I'm on the fence about the brownie because I found it a bit gooey. Brownies are a good idea but maybe make them smaller and more chewy.

I've seen a few people complain about the saltiness. Pretzels are salty and it might not be the flavor for you. However, to those of us who love pretzels, peanut butter, and brownies: This is a GREAT flavor for those of us who like the sweet and salty mix of flavors!

I loved the flavors of this (one of my favorites so far) ... my only suggestion ... (I understand that it says a pretzel swirl) but some extra chunks of pretzel pieces would be nice... unless I just got a
dud... but still loved and can’t wait to purchase again.

THIS IS THE BEST FLAVOR EVER!!!! this flavor has been available for less than a week and my roommates and I have already bought 5 (yes you heard that right, 5!) pints!! The perfect blend of flavors. I hope this is a flavor for as long as I live! By far the best!

column4: Gave my husband a sweet tooth.
column5: Delicious sweet-salty flavour is our household favourite. My husband doesn’t usually eat dessert and the first tub we bought, I had a single, humble scoop, only to find out the next evening that he had finished the pot. I wish I had a bigger freezer.

Peanut butter and then the juxtaposition of the salt in the pretzels. So...read the review title and that's pretty much all. I watch movies with it, usually documentaries, dark comedies, or something uber tacky and sentimental like "Dumb and Dumber."

This ice cream is the perfect balance of different flavors all in one! I just can not get enough. Just when I think I have had enough I gotta keep going back to get more of that flavor explosion! Great job, please please don’t ever stop making it!!

If they get rid of this flavor I’ll literally sob! It’s the best one they’ve ever made! I’m not an ice cream person but bought one out of sheer curiosity and I can’t stop. It’s perfectly salty and sweet! Hands down the best ice cream I’ve ever had!

The peanut butter ice cream is deliciously rich and creamy. The brownie swirls are gooey and proportional with every bite, which pairs so well with the ice cream. The pretzels add an awesome touch to a balanced sweetness, salty and not too crunchy.

Absolutely love it, the peanut butter ice cream is amazing- such great flavour and texture and the rich brownie just cuts through the thick peanut butter taste SO WELL. Absolutely love this flavour, they have again delivered a master piece

The Peanut Butter flavor is very good although the fudge seems out of place and rubbery. The salted pretzel is a nice compliment to the PB but the overall blend of flavors reminds me of a PB&J sandwich. OK but not amazing.

column4: MY MOST FAVORITE ICE CREAM IN THE WORLD
column5: I love this ice cream and the pretzel swirl is my favorite thing. I've been waiting for B&Js to come back with this flavor. I like how salty it is. I've bought many to make sure I am stocked up. Please keep this flavor!

This ice cream is so delicious. As soon as I tasted it I knew it would be a regular in my ice cream rotation. It’s the perfect mixture of salty and sweet and the flavors are just balanced really well. Highly recommend.

Sunday cheat night arrived and I already knew exactly what I was gonna do with it. This ice cream is delicious - the only reason I gave it four stars instead of five is because I wish it had more pretzels/saltiness.

Love the peanut butter flavour and the sweet and salty preztel swirls. Great for peanut butter lovers! However, I was disappointed that my pint did not have a single brownie bit, as mentioned in the description.

I truly haven’t ever had an ice cream I like as much as this one. It’s creamy and has hunks of fudgey brownie with the salty peanut butter and pretzel pieces. I’m obsessed and I request a lifetime supply.
I got a pint a few weeks ago and was blown away. For the first time, I found an ice cream with a decent peanut butter flavor. The salty pretzel swirl adds a nice little flavor boost. I need more!
I didn’t think I would even like peanut butter ice cream and now this is one of my all time favorites!! I love the bit of saltiness and the brownie chunks are so soft. Oh man, it’s so dang gooooood.
This is the best ice cream I have ever tasted. It is the perfect blend of salty and sweet. Please please please Misters Ben and Jerry make it a full-time product instead of a limited flavor.
This ice cream is heavenly. I have never written a review for ice cream before but this particular flavor was LIFE ALTERING..PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE send more up to the Central Maine area.

column4: A bit too salty and not enough brownies
column5: I would’ve loved more brownies and crunch pretzels. I liked the swirls but it was a bit salty. I’d choose chubby hubby over this one. I did enjoy the peanut butter ice cream.

column4: Wow just wow - pretzels where u at
column5: Delicious. Tastes like a peanut butter party on my tongue. Lots of brownie came through but the pretzels didn’t get the memo. Hopefully they come round in the next bowl
I looked EVERYWHERE for this and it was totally worth it!! So so so good. Keep your eyes peeling in the freezer sections and don’t miss out!!
I love it. Please keep it around! I've tried both the vegan variety and the regular. Both delicious. That salty pretzel swirl. Wow. I also love the peanut butter base.

column4: My Favorite... made me an ice cream person
column5: I’m not one to choose ice cream over other sweets but this has changed that. By far the best flavor. I’ve bought a pint every week for the last 4 weeks. Delicious!
I absolutely love the taste the combination between sweet and salty is perfect it’s sooooo good I literally finished the whole ice cream by myself in one day
My girl on TikTok names baddiebx recommended this flavour to me and my friends so we all brought it and it’s amazing I’m so greatful she told me about it
My husband picked this up for me to make up for eating all of the Glampfire Trail Mix. And I'm so glad he did! Favorite flavor to date! Thank you! :)
Delicious combination peanut butter, gooey brownie, and salty pretzel. Love the texture and balance of flavors, please make this a permanent flavor!

column4: Please never stop making this flavor!
column5: This is my favorite ice cream. We've been buying this regularly. The mix of salty and sweet is perfect. Please always make this flavor!
I'm in loooove, the peanut butter ice cream isn't too sweet like many others are, and the salty pretzel swirl is *chef's kiss* perfect.
Bought this because I'm trying to try all the Ben and Jerry's flavors and was really happy with how great it is! Would buy again!
Some bites are magical and some are HORRIBLE. I ended up tossing this day 2 because it was way too salty. Super disappointed.
Not usually an ice cream person but this flavour is absolutely amazing and I can’t get enough of it!Very bad for my diet!
I was skeptical at first but this is my new favorite ice cream! Found it in Durham, NC - haven't yet found it home in AL.
I think this is my favorite! My bus and and I hide them in the freezer from each other because we don’t want to share.
This Ice Cream is the best! It is salty, it is sweet! The taste is heavenly please do not stop making this flavour!
The salty pretzel swirl sets this flavor apart. It's dangerous for me to keep this in my house--I just can't stop.

column4: PB ice cream- what could be wrong?
column5: If you love peanut butter, you’ll love this. There is more fudge than pretzel- or at least there was in mine.
Absolutely perfect combination!!! Creamy, peanut buttery, and slightly salty from the pretzels. Perfection
I like the peanut butter ice cream and the salty pretzel (my wife didn’t) but I’m not a fan of the brownie
My favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor and one of my favorite ice creams ever. Salty pretzels, chewy brownies.
This is by far my favorite! I keep my freezer stocked when I can find them!! This flavor is a keeper!
Soooo delicious! Spoonfuls of happy in this paininthebackside pandemic! Well done, Ben & Jerry's!

I loved the amazing combination of flavors from this ice cream!
I found my favorite Ice Cream!
This ice cream is literally my favorite thing in the whole world. It's perfect in every way
I LOVE this flavor. I bought one pint and have since bought 25 pints in (2 or 3 months).
Bought this yesterday and ate it outside on the porch. Best ice cream i’ve had in a while!
I bought this a few weeks ago, it needs more fudge brownie. Will go back to phish food.

column4: Best ice cream flavor I’ve ever had
column5: I eat ice cream nightly, this one beats every other flavor. Please never stop making it

column4: Please keep this forever. I love it
column5: Oh my lord. Best I’ve cream I have ever had!!! I go out of my way to find this.
