this is by far my favorite flavor, i'm going tomorrow to get about 4 more lol
This is the best ice cream I've ever had. Please never stop production.

column4: And the Nominee for best ice cream flavor!
column5: I am a Ben &Jerry's fanatic. Netflix and Chilled is soooooo bomb.
This flavor better not go away. I mean like EVER!!! So tasty!
Bought this ice cream three times now and I’m obsessed. 10/10
The brownie pieces are awful but everything else is great
This is by far the best B&J flavor ever. I devoured it.
I didnt saw any pieces of pretzel when i was eating It.
Wait... Maybe with some white chocolate pieces????

During quarantine I was living off of Half Baked...but when I went to the store all that was left was Chip Happens. Having been heartbroken by another brand's "Milkshake and Fries" I reluctantly bought Chip Happens. I am happy to report Ben & Jerry's NAILED this flavor. The lighter chocolate, chocolate chunks and the perfectly CRUNCHY salty potato chip swirl is EXACTLY what every sweet/salty craving is made of. I put on my quarantine mask and went back to the store and bought the 4 pints left. I need another freezer to stock this flavor. Hope it remains a regular flavor because it says "limited botched edition". Break quarantine and RUN to get Chip Happens!

column4: Please, never get rid of this potato chip flavor!
column5: My favorite flavor used to be Late Night Snack because of the amazing innovation of the salty potato chip balls they used in combination with the sweet ice cream. The combo is heavenly. I've been waiting for years for Ben and Jerry's to bring back the potato chip ingredient and lo and behold yesterday at the store I found this flavor. It's even better than I remember late night snack being; the potato chip swirl provides a perfect salty and sweet combo in almost every bite. Please make this a permanent flavor; or at least release something else that uses this potato chip ingredient because I'll be SO sad if I have to wait years for it to appear again.

Please keep this as a permanent flavor as I've introduced this to others and we all LOVE it! Just like as a kid putting chips in my peanut butter and jelly sandwiches, this ice cream is the best thing since then! Love the chocolate ice cream with the chips!! Would love if you kept it around!!! Was bummed when I saw it was a 'limited botch'
Thank you!!!

I tried this for the first time a few days ago and the pint is already gone. This is a perfect flavor for someone that likes the sweet and salty combo (e.g. chocolate covered pretzels). The chip pieces add a nice twist to the chocolate, and the texture/consistency is not weird. There are some bites that I feel the chip chunks are a little too big,but overall it is great!

I am a lover of all things sweet and salty, so when I saw this in my grocery freezer I just knew I had to try it. Ben & Jerry's did NOT disappoint with this flavor! I've searched for and bought this flavor countless times since I first found it a few months back, and I enjoy it a little more each time. The sweet & salty balance in this one is perfect. The only downside I can say is that the consistency of the potato chips are often in botches and not evenly distributed throughout, but that's nothing some scoop controlling can't fix. Please keep this one permanently!

I was so excited when I saw this flavor! I am usually picky with different ice cream flavors. Ben and Jerry’s used to have a flavor that was called The Kitchen Sink...I believe, which was vanilla ice cream with chunks of potato chips mixed in! It was my absolute favorite! I was so upset when it was discontinued! When I found this ice cream I was SO EXCITED! I’m hoping this will become a permanent flavor!

This achieved what Late Night Snack could not--it is a FANTASTIC flavor. The chip swirls have the perfect salt content and potato taste. They stay crispy, which is a great complement to the thin crunch of the chocolate chips and that smooth, almost milk chocolate ice cream. THIS SHOULD BE A PERMANENT FLAVOR. IT'S SO GOOD.

Fresh off the taste test, I'd say this was a great addition to the flavor line-up! It's simple but different enough from the usual B&J's components (although those are great too!). I appreciate that the base is a bit of a lighter, milkier chocolate-- more like in Chocolate Shake It than Fudge Brownie. The potato chip swirl is fantastically crunchy and salty. I'd love a real mish-mosh with a split between chocolate and vanilla (or peanut butter), and BOTH the chip and pretzel swirl (like in Glampfire Trail Mix)... what botch heaven that would be.

I am not usually the type that likes a lot of mix-in’s in my ice cream, in fact, it would be accurate to call me a plain Jane. However, I just recently happened to go on to your website and saw that this was a new flavor so after a trip to the grocery store......my palette my most pleased. It was such a wonderful combination both with the velvety chocolate ice cream and then the salty crunch of the potato chips!! Well done———-you most definitely nailed it!!!!!

column4: Can NEVER compare to Late Night Snack
column5:
I have no idea why this has so many good reviews. This is a HORRIBLE flavor!! Bring back Late Night Snack before you bring back this GARBAGE. Late Night Snack was the PERFECT balance of salty and sweet. The chocolate covered potato chip balls and caramel were so so good!!
I love chips, but these are WAY too salty. The chocolate ice cream was a horrible choice, vanilla would have been better.
I have no idea how this even got made or why people like it. I am so so disappointed in you Ben and Jerry's. DO BETTER!!!

Can I express how excited I was to see this on the shelves? I was beyond excited since I was a HUGE fan of Late Night Snack. Upon opening the lid, I noticed chocolate ice cream with giant chunks of chocolate chips and potato chips.On my first bite, I tasted molasses and then bits of chocolates and potato chips. I wasn't a fan of the strong taste of molasses.. Perhaps I was expecting something similar to the discontinued Late Night Snack. Chips Happen wasn't bad but it wasn't great.

column4: Please keep this as a permanent flavor!!
column5: Simple and delicious flavors with great texture! The potato chip stays crispy, and it works great with the size of the chocolate chips. If I were to change anything, I’d add some more potato chip swirls. Maybe even keep the potato chip swirls but then include chocolate covered potato chips instead of the chocolate chips? I really hope this isn’t a fleeting “limited botch”

column4: For all the people who dip their fries in a frosty
column5: Absolutely delicious. Sweet, salty, creamy and crunchy. This is a pint of oxymorons and I love it.

column4: PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE KEEP THIS FLAVOR!!!!!!
column5: I’m obsessed with this flavor since I tried it. I can not believe how amazing it is. And the potato chips have the perfect crisp (don’t understand how) but it’s delicious. Please please please keep this flavor :(

When i saw this i thought it would be gross because chips and ice cream seems just gross together but when my sister convinced me to try it i felt fireworks. the chips are perfectly salty and the chocolate isn't to chocolaty! Its perfect for people who eat dip their french fries in chocolate ice cream and its a fun and unique flavor to try out! would highly recommend!! :D

When I first came upon this early June I tried the pint and within 5 minutes it was gone. The rich, velvety milk chocolate ice cream blends well with the contrasting textures of chocolate chunks and salty potato chips. I find a reason to drive 10 minutes 3 times a week just to stock up on this flavor exclusively. I am willing to lead the charge to make this flavor permanent. It's genius! I was disappointed that imy local store had sold out. I hope you consider this as a Fan Favorite!
In the beginning my favorite was Coffee Toffee Bar crunch. Rich coffee, with satisfyingly semi-salted toffee. Salty-sweet taste combo stage-one unlocked.

Whilst I still hold a candle for 'Chubby Hubby' and my all-time fave here in Australia...'Clusterfluff' (was soooo good!), I must say that Ben & Jrry's nailed it (!) for sure with this new netflix inspired flavour. Far superior to their earlier 'Netflix and Chilled' option I certainly hope this 'limited botch' ice-cream becomesa mainstay as it is delicious and perhaps the best ice-cream that B&J has in Australia atm!

I was so excited to find this special pint - unfortunately, mine barely had the potato chip swirl I was looking forward to! Ben and Jerry’s are known for their ample mix ins, and this didn’t make the cut. Really bummed!
I’m a sucker for chocolate covered potato chips. This ice cream is my major weakness. The chocolate ice cream is the best (and I don’t care for chocolate ice cream). I hope this flavor stays.
You guys nailed this one! It is perfection, the sweetness of the ice cream with a hint of saltiness of chips. I’d buy it every time I went shopping if it was a permanent flavor!

column4: Don’t want to ever eat this again
column5: I’ve had ice cream with chips before and enjoyed it so was excited for this one. But this flavor is truly terrible. My boyfriend and i each ate a scoop & decided to throw the rest away - a choice we’ve never made before.
I bought this in substitute of Americone Dream and I have got to say, I love this ice cream!! It tastes so good!

column4: Wonderful creation that makes the day better!
column5: I didn't buy it when I first saw this flavor at the store because potato chips aren't the usual ingredient in ice cream. But then I was convinced by my sister to try it, whether I like it or not, at least I will actually know how I feel. And oh boy, was I delighted!!! It's truly beautiful creation..!!! It tasted like eating potato chips and drinking chocolate shake at the same time (it doesn't sound weird anymore.) The potato chip swirls are, in fact, CRUNCHY, and salty! So yummy! I am happy that I decided to give this flavor a chance.
Potato chips are dark tasting, like the crunchy burnt ends in kettle chips. First time I’ve gotten a flavor that I just couldn’t finish.
Regular flavor made worse with potato chips. The combination of potato chips with chocolate ice cream is too strange for me. If you can't tell, I don't dip my fries in my milkshakes.

Perfect chocolate ice cream! I love the lighter, less intense chocolate ice cream that’s similar to one of my other faves (chocolate milk and cookies). It really tastes more like chocolate milk. The potato chip swirls are a perfect salty complement to the mild sweet. Im a huge fan of chocolate covered chips so this is right up my wheel house. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!!

After Trader Joe’s discontinued their chocolate covered potato’s chips I’ve been in search for something close. This nailed the same flavor and was so much better. Great mix of sweet and salty. It’s like in n out fries dipped in their chocolate milkshake. Turned my whole family onto this flavor and we bought out the two stores that carried it. Please Please continue the flavor!
Ew, not good at all. The chip swirl is like chewing sand and it disrupts the rest of ice cream. This was not pleasant. Icky stuff. Wish I’d never tried it.

I’ve never felt moved to write an ice cream review before - a friend recommended this flavor, which has been hard to find so when I came across a pint buried in the freezer at a store I don’t usually go to, I was excited to try it. Honestly this is one of the best combos I’ve ever had and I’m not usually a big fan of chocolate ice cream. The potato chips are insanely good and the mix is perfect for salty/sweet lovers like me. PLEASE consider expanding this beyond a “limited botch”!

I remember when A flavor called “Late Night Snack” was released a few years back and it was the first and only ice cream I’d ever tried with potato chips in it. I was put off by the idea of someone ruining ice cream with such an absurd idea but trust me people, potato chips and ice cream belong together!!!! I was bummed when Late Night Snack never appeared again but was ecstatic when this flavor released!!! Please don’t get rid of this flavor!!! My local store cannot keep it stocked because it is THAT good!!!!
I love Ben&Jerry's but this flavor was a disaster. The chocolate doesn't mix with the saltiness of the chips and it just tastes so wrong.

this is my new favorite flavor. this chocolate base is better than any of their others and this potato chip swirl is incredible. i don't buy ben and jerry's that often because of the price point but i would for this pint! this is an incredible sweet and salty blend and i can't get enugh!

column4: My absolute favorite: please keep permanently!
column5: Oh my goodness—this combination of salty and sweet is everything I need in life. I could never have another flavor of ice cream in my life and be just fine.

I do not write reviews very often at all, but I really wish this was a permanent flavor and I am hoping if they get enough great reviews it will be. I was skeptical of course that it would just be soggy chips in a pile of icecream, but it is in fact crisp af. It is a must try flavor I wish I could find anywhere, but unfortunately I have to drive to one specific Target to get my hands on it. Thanks to Ben and Jerry's for all of their hands on support in the community.

My roommate brought this glorious flavor home for our late night binge and my life will never be the same. I have a huge sweet tooth so I have a lot of experience when it comes to ice cream. This flavor is the perfect mixture of sweet and chocolaty with a sprinkle of salty. It honestly reminds me of dipping a french fry in my Wendy's frosty, dare I say it. I am seriously in love, I can't find it in my local store anymore so really hoping it becomes a permanent flavor.
I got this a number of days ago and it’s absolutely delicious. The chip swirl makes sure you get it throughout the ice cream. I really hope this stays in the collection!!
Half Baked has been my favorite ice cream, but this beat it. I wish the whole potato chip, sweet salty thing was more popular because this is amazing.
This ice cream is my newest addiction. I have been buying as much as I Can before it’s gone. I’m begging for this to become a permanent flavor.
Chip happens is my absolute new favorite ice cream! The chocolate and salty mix BEAUTIFULLY! Please keep it around!!
Wayyyy to salty I couldn’t even finish it. but I did enjoy the chocolate.

Love trying new Ben and Jerry’s flavors, so I immediately grabs this when I saw it on the shelf. Overall it takes like dipping fries into a Wendy’s Frosty. The chocolate flavor is AMAZING! However, I wasn’t a big fan of the chip “swirls”. It’s soft and doughy, but salty like a chip. The texture threw me off, and reminded me of salt dough. I wasn’t able to enjoy it. If they made just the chocolate flavor separately I would definitely buy it! Tastes just like a frosty.

column4: One of the few good things to happen in 2020
column5: What a great combination of flavors, I truly hope this will be around for awhile.

column4: If you get rid of this, I will cry.
column5:
This is the best ice cream flavor ever. I'm someone who gets fries and dips them in a chocolate shake, and this ice cream is like that but with less mess, more texture, and more flavor. I love the sweet and salty combo, and I feel that the addition of the chocolate chunks are really what make this ice cream so unbelievably fantastic. And the chips -- they're in a swirl, they stay crunchy, and there's the perfect amount! The combination of textures and flavors is just amazing.
My only complaint is that this is a limited botch. Like the title of this review says, there will be tears from me if you get rid of this. This NEEDS to be a regular flavor, and I really hope this opens up the door for more sweet and salty flavors. Please don't get rid of this flavor! If you do, I will hoard as many pints as possible and eat them for years.

column4: if you ever dipped your french fries in a frosty..
column5: i’m always a fan of the sweet and salty combination, especially chocolate and salt. i also love chocolate covered potato chips, AND i’m a fan of the show so this was a no brainer. it’s rich, the flavors work really well together and it’s equitably distributed throughout. i can’t express how much i love this flavor, how many pints my partner and i go through, and how much i hope it stays in permanent rotation. NAILED IT!
Cherry Garcia used to be my favorite. I cannot get enough of Chip Happens. Please make this flavor a regular and not a limited addition. It will bring happiness across the world.

Best new Ben & Jerry’s flavor since Tonight Dough! I almost ate an entire pint in one sitting, it was so good. It has all my favorite things in one ice cream! I certainly hope that you keep this flavor around, it’s too good to be a limited batch only.

I have always been a huge fan of chocolate covered potato chips, so when I saw Ben and Jerry’s had come out with a flavor including both of these flavors, I had to try it. I do not know how they did it, but getting the chips into the ice cream without the chips becoming soggy is a dream come true, and absolute magic as far as I’m concerned. I have found my favorite ever ice cream. Thank you!

column4: Perfect Mix of Sweet and Salty
column5: This flavor is freaking amazing! After falling in love with another limited batch flavor, I told myself I wouldn't try any others in case they disappear forever. Well when I saw Chip Happens at the grocery store I couldn't resist... and have bought a dozen pints since! The chocolate flavor is rich but somehow still light, the chocolate chunks add to the sweetness perfectly, and the chip crumbles are heavenly. 5 stars.

column4: I came here to write a review, didnt I?
column5: This ice cream is my favorite. It’s salty and sweet at the perfect combination of happiness on a spoon. I want to stockpile it because I can’t imagine a world where I can’t grab this guilty please out of the fridge. It’s getting me through social distancing and COVID19 and the woes of the world. I beseech you, please make this a permanent addition. I’m begging. I’m pleading.

column4: Nailed my all time favorite snack!!!
column5: i love love love this flavor!!!! i was so upset when you got rid of the “late night snack” flavor a few years ago but this one is perfect!! please make it forever and ever ❤️

column4: Please make this a permanent flavor!
column5: Real truth, I’ve never been a huge fan of Ben & Jerry’s. Most flavors sound amazing but they end up being a let down. This is an exception. The chocolate base is just right and the potato chip ribbons contrast the sweet with just enough salty. It’s perfection.
My girlfriend was moved to tears of joy after her first bite, it’s that good. How on earth are the chips still crunchy? Amazing

Honestly it's my favorite ice cream of all time and I'm super stressed that I can't find it anywhere. I guess on the bright side, my wife and I are no longer fighting over who gets to eat it and our marriage counseling bills have lessened.
Taste dreadful. I don't know whos idea it was to make this flavour but they are

column4: FAVE FLAVOR EVER!! PLEASE DO NOT DISCONTINUE!
column5: Please make this a permanent flavor. This is hands down my favorite flavor I have ever tried....I absolutely love it. The salty crispy potatoe chips...my gosh!! I love having this as a treat daily. Keeps me sane during shelter in place. Also, B&J is a kickass company that stands for social and racial justice. Love their ice cream and their values.
Wow. This flavor is the best thing I’ve ever had! Absolutely amazing!!! Please keep it forever :)

So I literally just bought it and was excited but I dunno it’s kinda mediocre. Obviously B&J makes fantastic ice cream this one just ain’t doin it for me. The potato chips are chewy not crunchy and they taste kinda fake I found myself eating around the potato bits.

I was hesitant to try this, but it was on sale so I figured I’d got it a shot. Omg. I’m not usually a big sweet and salty person because I think it can make the sweet taste too sweet, but this ice cream balanced the flavors perfectly. Also the chips are somehow perfectly crisp and crunchy. Please make this a forever flavor!!
Best ice every. Must keep making this ice cream!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Amazing blend of smooth, then crunch, salty, and then sweet!!

I love it so much! The potato chip swirl is really good, idk who B&Js does it but it literally tastes like regular chips. The sweet and salty combo is bomb and the fishes chips are really good too. Please B&Js keep this flavor forever

I had no idea potato chip swirl is what was missing from my life. I have told everyone I know about this flavor. It is incredible in its subtle way of mixing all the flavors and textures of smooth, decadent and crunchy, together. Sincerely, begging for this to not be just a limited release--it's too good to see it go away.

I am a 63-year-old mom, I have been eating Ben & Jerry’s for years. My ice cream of choice is Chubby Hubby, it’s been that for years but it just got knocked down to second place. This Chip Happens is the best ice cream flavor Ive ever had. Cannot get over how crunchy the potato chips are. How do they do that in ice cream and they’re not soggy. So unbelievably delicious.
His is my absolute favorite flavor now! Please keep it

This is the best Ben & Jerry’s flavor I’ve ever had! The mmmm it has just enough sweet, salty, and chocolate. My absolute favorite! Please do not discontinue this flavor! However, in case you do, I am going to stock up.

This the the best Ben and Jerry’s ice cream I have ever had where I live we don’t have a Ben and Jerry’s shop so we have to get it from the store and no place has it be cause it is everybody’s favorite we always ask when the might get a shipment and hurry to get it from the store I wish they would carry it more!

Thank you so much for this flavor! I truly hope that it stays on the market. Ever since Late Night Snack got discontinued I've been hoping that you would introduce a new mix that included potato chips. It may sound like a strange ingredient to some, yet the salty sweet combo can't be beat! LOVE THIS FLAVOR!!!

If you're a sweet and salty fanatic like me, get this.. It's amazing!! I've been spreading the word about how amazing this flavor is. If you're wondering if the chips are soggy.. They are NOT!! Idk how they managed to keep them so crispy, but they are, and it's so amazingly tasty. Sad it's a limited batch!

Love Ben & Jerry's in general and this flavor did not disappoint. My curiosity was peaked by the description of the flavor and the "limited botch" label. It was delicious, reminds me of how I dip french fries in my milkshakes to get that sweet and salty balance. Hope this becomes a permanent flavor!

This ice cream was so delicious that it made me write a review in the hopes it will not end up in the flavor graveyard like my beloved Vermonty python. The ice cream is packed with chocolate chips but the best part is the crunchy potato chip swirls. This is everything I need right now.

column4: Delicious! Make it a regular part of the line up!
column5: Such a great combo! Please make this a regular part of the ben and Jerry’s line up.
This is the perfect combination of salty and sweet. I really hope this is a flavor that sticks around and becomes a permanent flavor. You won’t be disappointed!

column4: BEST, MOST UNIQUE ICE CREAM EVAAAAHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!
column5: When my friend told me she'd found an amazing ice cream with POTATO CHIPS in it, I was like, "Ewwww. Who came up with that nasty combo?." But after I tried the flavor, I could NEVER go back. This is the BEST ice cream I have EVER eaten, and I pray God each night that it will not be limited edition. Thank you Ben & Jerry's!!! <3 Colin

I was perusing the Ben and Jerry’s section when I found this beautifully delicious flavor. I was a little skeptical at first but as an Irishman I could not resist the delicious potato and I am glad I didn’t this is my new favorite. I hope it becomes a regular flavor.

This is the best ice cream I have ever had. It is the perfect combination of salty and sweet. (Note, the chips are quite salty so if you're not into that it may not be for you) but holy cow it is for me. Please please please keep this as a permanent product.

I decided to go out on a limb and try this one day. I saw Ben & Jerry’s social platform and absolutely wanted to give this company my support. I was not disappointed. This ice cream is absolutely BOMB and Im so sad because it’s been sold out at my local grocery stores for a while. Please keep this flavor!!

This is exactly what I want in a snack, sweet and salty. There’s the perfect amount of potato chips and chocolate chunks you can get some in every bite. It was absolutely delicious and I wish this would stay a permanent flavor!

column4: So yummy! The perfect sweet and salty treat!
column5: I love everything about this! It’s even better than Late Night Snack (but where is that one? Bring it back, too?). We need more sweet and salty flavors, and this one had plenty of the chip swirl, as well as the sweet chocolate ice cream. Love love love this. Please add it permanently!

column4: One of my fav flavors ever
column5: I will be sad when I can't find this flavor anymore. It was my new favorite -- the chip swirl is delicious and the chocolate tastes almost malted. It's so good.

I just bought this flavor today and I can tell you if you are a salty and sweet fan like myself you will love this ice cream. I really hope they keep this as a permanent flavor, it's a perfect combination of flavors. Please keep this one around!
I cannot say enough about these incredible flavors, the saltiness of the chips are unbeatable. I would buy 1 million of these if I had space in my freezer.

This is the best Ben & Jerry’s flavor I’ve ever had, no cap. I made my boyfriend drive me to five different grocery stores until we found some & I (no joke) bought five pints. I DIE by Chip Happens. I would kill a man for this ice cream flavor.
i've been waiting for a flavor with potato chip mix ins since ben and jerry's got rid of jimmy fallon's late night snack! please keep this one around

column4: Best thing since Late Night Snack
column5: This is the absolute best flavor since Late Night Snack. I hope this becomes a permanent flavor. Late Might Snack will always hold a special place in my heart but if this is the flavor that stays then I’ll take it! Absolutely the best

column4: Perfect combo of sweet and salty
column5: This tastes amazing ! I love the milder chocolate flavor of the ice cream which is more like a milkshake flavor and the swirl of chips is the perfect combo of crunch and salt flavor. Please consider making this a permanent flavor!

column4: I want this to be a part of my life forever
column5: This is the best ice cream flavor, hands down, I have ever tried. I will truly mourn its loss if it isn’t made permanent. I have literally gone searching for it at different stores and I scoop it up (heh) every time I see it.

Please continue to make this flavor! The sweet of the chocolate and the salty of the potato chips is a match made in heaven. I bought the last pint at my local store today. Fingers crossed it will be available for reorder!

It was love at first pint. And now I'm on my third. This ice cream is the perfect balance of sweet and salty, smooth and crunchy. Please consider making this limited batch into a full time flavor. You have truly Nailed It.
The potato chip crunch bits are just so good and salty and amazing. Probably my favorite flavor

Please make this a permanent flavor!!! It saved my quarantine! Love the crunchy salty potato chip swirl, the milk chocolate ice cream, and the perfectly sized chocolate flakes... please bring it back!!!
LOVE this flavor combo. The sweetness and salty balance is perfect. Please keep it-yummy!
Seriously insane. The salty crunchy chip swirl ice cream mixed with the chocolate is the perfect combo. I was skeptical but this might be my favorite new flavor in years. Please make permanent!
I bought this flavor in the last couple of days and it is my new favorite! I used to love chocolate covered potato chips and can no longer find them, but this just beats that by so much more :D
I absolutely love this flavor! It's the perfect blend of sweet & salty
Chunky monkey has been my all time but this is the best ! I love love love it! You guys nailed it, please don’t make this limited edition. It needs be a ever lasting flavor! Thank you!
I bought this Saturday afternoon and I love this creation! Deliciously sweet!
Luv the chocolate taste with the salty crunch of the chips. Great combo
This flavor is so good, it hurts. Nothing should have this level of salty crunch mixed with sweet enough vanilla and chocolate ice cream. This pint completely destroyed me.
Literally snack heaven. Sweet but not overly rich chocolate ice cream, chocolate chunks, and a thick ribbon of crunchy salty chip! So good. Please keep making this forever.

column4: Mostly sweet, but just enough salty
column5:
And chocolate. Need I say more?
Apparently so, to fill out the review.
Crunchy, choclatey goodness that certainly satisfied my craving for ice cream craving. The ice crame even has salt that thought would be terrible, but it was delicious!
this flavor seemed weird to me at first but now its literally my favorite i usually buy 3-4 tubs just because the taste is soo good and u still get a crunch love it !
These are three of some of my favorite flavors,I think it’s a great combination.If the product changes from limited batch,I would love to always buy this product!!
I bought this today because I love sweet and salty, I am amazed that this ice cream is bomb, and the chips stay crunchy. Please keep this flavor.
This flavor is my dream come true. I have never been an ice cream lover but this one right here...just made me one. Thank you for this!!
MY life has not been the same without that perfect little blend of sweet and salty. Thank the B&J gods for this true gift of the people.
Salty mix of crunchy chips and dairy queen cone dip flakes in a chocolate ice cream. So good! Don't want to buy any other flavors now
Literally the best thing I’ve ever eaten in my life. I am so so so sad I didn’t know the last time I ate it would be the last time
Ben and Jerry was on sale last week at a local grocery store....ended up going back for three more pints of this!
I love the sweet and salty combination! It is so good and addictive...definitely a go to after a stressful day!
Bought today and have eaten almost half of it already. I loveee it. I need this to be a permanent flavor :)
Please keep this flavor!! It’s the perfect mix of sweet and salty!! I buy it every week! So good!!
I was skeptical about trying this ice cream but omg it was beyond great. Such a great combination
This ice cream is ridic- and the potato chip swirl really makes it something special. I love it.
A perfect combination of flavors in this tasty treat. Really hope they keep making this flavor!!

PLEASE PLEASE MAKE THIS A REGULAR FLAVOR.
that's all
- A Loyal Fan going through Menopause
Salty and sweet. Smooth and crunchy. Don’t make it limited time - keep this flavor. Delicious
Hands down my favorite ice cream flavor to ever come to be. Hope this one stays around
This is a flavor combination for the gods...nostalgic chocolate ice cream and chips.

column4: Perfect for Sweet and Salty lovers
column5: This was amazing! One of their best creations. It hits the spot for sweet and salty
Bought this on a whim and it’s one of the best flavors from B&J’s that I’ve had!
This has the Perfect amount of sweet and salty!!! I would def recommend this.
Bought this on a whim and it is delicious! Perfect balance of salty and sweet
The potato chip swirl is incredible! Please make this a full time offering!!!
The salty, crunchy chip coupled with the sweet ice cream is to die for.
Loved this! Great cravings combo. Please keep it permanently!
This is the perfect salty sweet balance and just delicious.
Flip me over and give me some of this goodness!!!!

Dearest Ben and Jerry,
Chip Happens is the most divine ice cream flavor to ever grace this earth. Honestly, the way the potato chips looked on the packaging looked a little suspicious. BUT, I was BLOWN AWAY WHEN I TASTED THIS MASTERPIECE OF A FROZEN DESSERT. I LOVE IT SO MUCH. it is the PERFECT combination of sweet and salty. And just REALLY GOOD. In fact, I recommended it to a friend, who once said his favorite flavor was mint chip. BUT ONCE HE TASTED HE THE HEAVENLY TASTE OF CHIP HAPPENS, HE WAS converted as well. We ate so much ice cream for two weeks and put hot fudge on it. It was really a beautiful experience. I will forever hold these memories close to my heart. A month later, I returned to the grocery store scouring the shelves for my beloved ice cream. And to my horror, I could not find it. I even had a whole conversation with a lady at the grocery store employee about how distraught i was. I returned home, sad, hungry, and heartbroken, for my beloved ice cream had left. But, I will not rest until i can experience this ice cream flavor once more. I am calling on you Ben and Jerry, BRING BACK THIS ICE CREAM FLAVOR. IT IS SO MUCH BETTER THAN YOUR STANDARD FLAVORS AND DESERVES TO BE RECOGNIZED FOR THE BEAUTEOUS FOOD ITEM IT IS. I WISH FOR NOTHING MORE THAN TO TASTE THE SWEET GOODNESS OF CHIP HAPPENS.
Love,
Audrey

Am trying this flavor for the first time right now. Took my first bite and fell in love IMMEDIATELY!! May just be my new favorite flavor!! Have tried a different brand of mascarpone ice cream before and it basically just tasted like vanilla. This is the complete opposite!! Definitely not just plain old boring vanilla!! Can NOT believe how amazingly delicious this is!! Everyone needs to try this now!! Would probably drive 10 hours to get this if i had to like omg it's just that good!!!!!!!!!! Please ben and jerry's-I'm literally begging you to keep this flavor FOREVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I love this flavor. It’s light but packs a POWERFUL flavor punch. And the swirl is kind of hidden by its color but man if you find a big pocket of it and try and isolate it, it’s the BEST. The chocolate covered pastry things have Always been crunchy in my 20+ pints to date. The flavor is just so boom in your face. The texture of the Mars alone swirl is insane. This is my 2nd favorite flavor behind Gimme Smore. So help me god if you guys discontinue this flavor or gimme smore, I will come down on you with the wrath of a thousand lightning bolts. Haha. Plz make a cake batter with chocolate chocolate chip swirl and a brownie batter something

I was devastated when the “Holly Cannoli” flavor was discontinued years ago. Every time I passed the ice cream aisle in my supermarket, I’d search for the Cannoli flavor, hoping to see it again. Just when I was about to give up, THERE IT WAS!!!!! I scooped up every pint I could get my hands on. This flavor is the best!! The sweet marscapone cream and chocolatey shell pieces make for a sweet celebration for the tastebuds. Thank you so much for bringing this awesome flavor back! Please don’t ever discontinue it again. You’ve struck gold with this flavor — it is truly is a treat!

column4: I think this is my new 2nd favourite ice cream
column5: Oh man. Where to begin. Two bites and I knew. The marscapone ice cream? Dude. The cannoli shells? DUDE. They're so crispy it's almost like magic how crispy they stay. And coated in chocolate nonetheless! The marscapone swirl is something you almost forget about too but like not even in a bad way because you end up stumbling upon it without expecting to do so and it HITS YOU IN THE FACE WITH DECADENT FLAOUR. Also the chocolate chips are the mini's, the cute ones. Perfectly sized!! B & J knocked it out of the park with this one. A+++
Please keep this around forever! For over 7 years I have hoped that this day would come where my favorite dessert ever would return! Such a delicious ice cream!

The icecream itself is luxuriously fatty, so it does take some time to eat this as compared to opposing flavors. The mascarpone swirls is what I'd say takes the cake for me, though be aware that not all the chocolate-covered cannoli pieces will be as crisp as you'd expect them to be.
This is so good, i have been eating one a day, please keep this around so i can keep eating it
I love cannoli's and couldn't wait to try this. Finally found it and was so excited. But it was a total let down. This taste nothing like any cannoli I ever had. Absolutely terrible.

column4: Thank you for making my dreams come true!
column5: I have been craving, whining about, and reminiscing about this flavor for YEARS.

Not only does this ice cream do nothing to remind you of a cannoli it does not taste good at all. The container says A fan favorite.Overly sweet with an unpleasant aftertaste. Took two bites and tossed the rest. A total misfire. Clearly those fans have never tasted a real cannoli or one of B&J’s better flavors,

Bought this on my recent trip to Target. Had NO expectations...it just sounded interesting. To my surprise this flavor has quickly become my new fave! (Right under Half Baked) It seemed creamier than usual which I attribute to the marscapone. The cannoli pieces are delish and it is an overall pleasant experience. No clue why anyone would call it "plain" unless they were expecting the ice cream to be the flavor of the shell or something. If you are looking for something packed with flavor this one isn't for you. This flavor is meant to have when youre craving a more sophisticated dessert. Quick tip: let it sit out until its soft enough that you're not waging war between it and your spoon at every bite. Takes it to another level ;)

The flavor is great, but there were almost no pieces of the cannoli shell in the pint. My husband and I both thought it was strange, and maybe a bad batch because you can always count on the pints to be pretty full of all the good stuff listed in the description. But not this time. And I see from another review that maybe this isn’t a fluke after all. The cannoli shell is the best part of the dessert, so it shouldn’t be skimped.

A delicious take on the classic Italian dessert, B&J's Cannoli is a winner. The base is described as a marscapone flavor. Now marscapone isn't typically used for Cannolis but instead ricotta. Marscapone is a cream cheese used for cakes and other desserts. While not quite fitting the theme of a Cannoli in that regard, B&J made the right choice for the sake of flavor. The base is absolutely like a heightened cheesecake. Almost as if their regular cheesecake flavor was mixed with the equally delicious buttery brown sugar one. It's fantastic. The swirl is the same flavor, so they blend together seamlessly for a full on sweet cream cheese taste. And the pastry pieces are the perfect contrast to the base. Crunchy and covered in chocolate, they remind me of the similar chocolate dipped waffle cone pieces from Americone Dream, and there are plenty in each pint. Whether it fits the theme or not, Cannoli is a great flavor that I hope stays as a mainline one for a long time.

Finally found this and regret it. It doesn’t taste at all like a cannoli, the bits were sparse and again, tasteless, like eating little chucks of chocolate covered cardboard. Waste of money and calories; just eat a cannoli.

column4: If you like cannolis, you won't like this
column5:
Do yourself a favor and put this ice cream down, walk over to the bakery section of whatever store you're in and get an actual cannoli. This tastes like someone added a crap ton of powdered sugar to artificially flavored cheesecake ice cream and blended it with stale cannoli bits (these could also be bran flakes for all I can tell but I'll take their word for it.)
So if you want a cannoli, get a cannoli and if you want Ben and Jerry's get a more reliable and well made flavor, they have so much better to offer than this.

First of all traditional cannoli are made with ricotta, not mascarpone. This tastes more like tiramisu without the coffee. It's missing the liquor flavor of a cannoli and was too cheesy. It would be better if it had chocolate shavings, but the base is wrong. I ate it, but I would not it buy again.

column4: Makes my Italian knees shake with pleasure!
column5: I happened to find this flavor when I went shopping today at Albertsons and I love all kinds of Italian cuisine. Cannolis are one of my favorite desserts. The flavor of this ice cream was delicious and tasted exactly like a cannoli! Perfect flavor!!

column4: Not at all like a Cannoli
column5: I was so excited to try this because I love a good cannoli. The taste was just wrong. I really didn't like anything about this flavor. The ice cream itself was marscapone which isn't what's in a cannoli. This was just a fail, cannot recommend.

The ice cream is light and fluffy, just as expected from Ben & Jerry’s, but I think the mascarpone ice cream is just a variant of vanilla ice cream. The crunch from the chocolate shells is rad and the mascarpone swirls are delicious.
Bought this a few days ago after searching for a while. So looking forward to it. I loved the flavors BUT it should have had way more cannoli shell pieces. There were barely any at all.
Chunks were found throughout and I really enjoyed ice cream so reminiscent of my fave dessert.

column4: My favorite dessert as an ice cream!
column5: I absolutely love this flavor, and I'm glad it's back to stay and not a 'Limited Batch'
Please keep the Cannoli ice cream!!!!! It is the best EVER!!!!!

Ben and Jerry’s limited batch Cannoli ice cream single handedly got me through law school!!! I have literally written the website 100s of times begging them to bring it back!! For years I have regaled my now fiancé with tales of the elusive, delicious limited batch Cannoli ice cream. Well fast forward about a decade and in walks my fiancé carrying not 1, not 2, but 3 pints of the permanent Cannoli pint. It’s just as delicious as I remember.

I usually love Ben & Jerry but this ice cream was horrible. It tastes nothing like a cannoli. I was so excited to eat this, and looked everywhere for it, and it's a total let down. The "cannoli shells" taste like waffle cones, and the mascarpone tastes horrible. This has a after taste and honestly just a total let down.

column4: Strange strong flavor, mix ins sparse.
column5:
I was a big fan of the retired* Holy Cannoli. This version has a strange strong flavor from 1st taste. The mix ins were sparse, which was not right** regardless of whether I liked the flavor or not.
*Original was ricotta and pistachio ice cream with chocolate covered cannoli and roasted pistachios. It bombed and was retired one year later.
**Pint bottom: NOV0921BJ1 5095 22:59 67867261.

If you like cake frosting... then this is your ice cream. I don’t taste cannoli not even in the least. Just sugar, like cake frosting. I do like the chocolate coated pastry pieces but they were few and far between. I will eat it because i paid a lot of money for it. But pretty disappointed. There isnt any cinnamon flavor or rose water like i put in my homemade cannoli. :-(

column4: Not as good as the prior Holy Cannoli
column5: Holy Cannoli was my second favorite Ben & Jerry's of all time. When I heard it was coming back as Cannoli, I couldn't wait to find it locally. Unfortunately, I was disappointed as it had changed from "Creamy Ricotta and Pistachio Ice Cream with Chocolate Covered Cannolis and Roasted Pistachios" and didn't taste as good. Bring back the old Holy Cannoli!
Chocolate chip cannoli is one of my favorite desserts. I grew up in Boston and know great cannoli. So I was very excited to try this flavor.
Not my favorite.....Tastes nothing like a Cannoli.

Your Cannoli ice cream
Which claims to be Sicily’s finest in flavors, is a complete abomination to the Italian community.
If you’re going to label the thick, creamy, tangy Italian cheese TWICE in your label, I should be able to taste it. Or better yet!!- see it in the ingredients list. Please refine this product.
Thank you

So one thing I love about this ice cream is the crunchy waffle cones covered in chocolate it’s very similar to Americone dream but I think I still prefer the American dream better because of the plain vanilla flavor with caramel.
This one I know is supposed to be the mascarpone flavor. It’s not bad but not my favorite.
This ice cream is very good, however I think that it would benefit from having more cannoli bits in it. If it’s called cannoli it should have more cannoli in it.

I love cannolis and I love this ice cream but I wouldn't say they taste the same. This is really rich. On my first bite I thought it was a bit too strong, but it really grew on me. Love hitting those mascarpone swirls, and the pastry shell pieces are nice and crunchy. Happy it's permanent to the line.

I was so excited to see this. I was a little concerned when I saw that it was made with mascarpone ... which has no place in a true Sicilian cannoli. I should have known ... this is only what a grocery store cannoli would possibly taste like. Bring back the REAL cannoli ice cream: Holy Cannoli.

Found Cannoli in my store recently and decided to give it a try, as I'm from a predominantly Italian area and a fan of the real pastry. Tasty ice cream, super creamy and fun. Could use a bit more of the cannoli bits, though, which was the only reason it didn't get 5 stars. Still a top 5!

Not sure how this is a “fan favorite”... the ice cream base is this weird artificial vanilla, the mascarpone swirl is this gritty, undercooked batter and the fudge cone flakes literally feel and taste like cardboard. I WOULDNT recommend this flavor unless you enjoying wasting your money

column4: First Ben & Jerry's Flavor I did not like
column5: I'm a big Cannoli fan. The filling is so important but so his the shell. This just didn't taste like cannoli to me at all. I'm a native New Yorker and perhaps the filling and shells here are not typical of the rest of the country, but both sure are gold standard in my book

Fantastic. Saw this in the store while working out of town in Jacksonville. Let’s just say the Publix gets bought out every-time I go. Since I can’t find Cinnabon anywhere this one is my new go to. Netflix and chilled is tasty as well classic favorites in one for that one

Wow. This ice cream is soooo good! So good I had to write this review lol. I think it could use a bit more cannoli pieces but regardless it's an awesome ice cream. Do yourself a favor and try it, it's for sure a new favorite of mine and I hope it sticks around forever

I was so excited to find ice cream that allegedly tasted like cannolis. It tasted like utter disappointment! It tasted absolutely nothing like cannolis! This mediocre monstrosity was literally just butterscotch with bits of chocolate covered waffle cones.

Not finding Chunky Monkey, I took home Cannoli and am so glad I did! I ate the whole pint in one sitting... good lord! I loved the still crispy bits hidden inside that lusciousness... yum! Hope this one makes it into the big league as a regular flavor.

This ice cream is by far the best ice cream I've ever had from Ben and Jerry's. Big fan of cannolis and they could not have done a better job. The mascarpone swirls are to die for and I am proud to call this my happiness in a spoon!

column4: Did you have anyone who has eaten a cannoli taste
column5: I bought this tonight and it is straight up vanilla ice cream with chocolate chips. Did there taste testers actually ever have a cannoli? This had no resemblance to the taste of a cannoli. So upset this was a flavor failure

I was really skeptical of the flavor because I’ve never had a cannoli before but I decided to try it because the americone was out at my grocery store and WOW! Genuinely this is my new favorite flavor *chef’s kiss*

I've waited YEARS for this flavor to return.... Nothing compares. Thank you for bringing it back! Please don't ever take it away again.... I don't want to live in a world that doesn't include cannoli ice cream!

I love cannolis. This was no cannoli. Weird tasting ice cream. Hardly any mix ins, which was probably good because they just tasted like cardboard covered on chocolate. Don't waste your money or calories.
Deliciously Different. The marscapone swirl is the best
I bought this at the food store yesterday eager to try it. I honestly didn’t expect it to be nearly as good as it was! It’s just so sweet and creamy and the chocolate pieces add the perfect crunch.
people always complain that things never taste like the thing theyre supposed to but is that a reason to hate it? its good i dont care if it tastes like candy corn just a little its still nice
I shed a tear in the grocery store when I saw that they brought this flavor back. It's the perfect balance of sweet and creamy with delicious chocolate, pastry shell crunchies. YUM!
Literally the most scrumptious B&J’s flavor I have ever had. I ate the whole pint *accidentally* in 6 minutes. I have built a shrine to its perfection in my fridge. FREAKING YUMMY!

column4: Thank you for bringing this back!
column5: This redux is better than the original cannoli flavor that I tried. The mascarpone made it softer than many other flavors and it wasn’t overly sweet like some flavors.
I have a sweet tooth but Ice Cream is usually lower on my list of must have treats. This ice cream changed that for me. Love it. Happy it is back for good!!
I am an absolute cannoli fanatic and to see that there is a cannoli flavored ice cream just blew my mind! I had to try it! Absolutely delicious and decadent
The perfect combo of crunch from the chocolate covered cannoli cookie and swirls of mascarpone I really hope this isn’t one of those ones that’s temporary!
I got to try this flavor just the other day, and I am sure glad I did. This ice cream is one of the beat ben and Jerry's flavors I've had
Tastes nothing like a cannoli. Overly sweet, cloying ice cream with a strong artificial flavor and aftertaste. Would not buy again

column4: Swirl texture is a little off
column5: The flavor was okay, the chocolate covered pieces were a bit chewy. The swirl going through it had a bit of a grainy texture
I LOVE cannolis but this flavor missed the mark! It could have been amazing but it was so boring and not creamy.
The store I went to didn’t have the B and Js flavor I wanted, I am so glad I grabbed cannoli instead!
This is my new favorite ice cream - hands down!! Absolutely love the all the flavors and textures!!

column4: Sicilian treat by the ice cream king
column5: Well done as always. If this ever goes away please bring it back as a seasonal holiday item
I’ve never been disappointed with a Ben and Jerry’s flavor, but Cannoli is my favorite!!!

column4: Good, But I Forgot it was in the Fridge
column5: Decent and really sweet. But I forgot I had it. So...not so much like the real thing.
This is the first Ban and Jerry’s flavor I’m not crazy about. Wanted to like it more.
Awesome! I would have named it holy cannoli! Thank you for thinking of this one.!
I love cannolis and this is one of my new favorites!
Great flavor. It is so rich and delicious I love it!
yassss! Love you so much..........................

This is my favorite flavor in the entire world please make it a permanent flavor!! I made all my friends go out and try it and we're all addicted. I have three pints a week. I wish I was joking. We single handedly bought all of the Gimme S'more stock in our grocery store. The day this flavor is retired is the day my happiness dies. :)

column4: Smart way to make a Smore's flavor
column5: I have several favorite B&J's flavors, but I decided to go outside of my usual and get this flavor. With the first bite you can definitely taste a hint of marshmallow-y flavor in the base ice cream. It's different than just plain vanilla. I think they did a great job capturing that flavor. The chocolate cookie swirl and graham swirl is smart and I think it's a unique way to add the classic flavor of a smore. And of course, you can't go wrong with fudge flakes! I am a total mix-in and swirl junkie, the more the better, and Ben & Jerry's never disappoints with that! Great job on this flavor! Overall a unique take on a novel summer treat!

column4: Way better than the OG S'mores!
column5: I've had many pints of the Gimme S'more while it's been out and tonight I accidentally grabbed the original S'mores, with the chocolate ice cream. It was the most disappointing moment when I opened the pint to find chocolate ice cream instead of the typical golden ice cream I was used to with the Gimme S'more. Gimme S'more is the perfect representation of what a S'more is: mostly composed of perfectly toasted marshmallows, hint of chocolate, and a great trail of graham crackers. I will be so sad when this pint leaves the shelves. And I will never make the mistake of buying the OG S'mores pint again. Too much chocolate to represent a S'more.

I recently had the pleasure of taking a tour of Ben & Jerry's in VT and this was the flavor sample of the day. Instantly, I was hooked. I've been buying some from my local CT grocery store since. There was a sale one night and the store was out. I sat on the floor and cried. While the ice cream base may not taste exactly like marshmallows, is delicious. Everything about this flavor is amazing!

I am so sad that this is a limited batch. Gimme S'more is my all time favorite flavor and I've tried almost all the Ben & Jerry's flavors. It is like heaven in your mouth. The graham cracker swirl and chocolate cookie swirl are my two favorite things about this ice cream. Since the flavor is slowly leaving, my friends and I have gone to multiple stores to stock up on what is left. As you can tell we LOVE Gimme S'more and if you're a s'mores lover like me then it's worth the try!

This is such a great new pint! I stocked up and my freezer is loaded with them. The ice cream, the swirls and chunks are so so yummy! If I could eat it every night, I would. This is a LIMITED BATCH! It did not replace S’mores. It’s still available in stores and online. Gimme S’more has come and will go again and regular S’mores will remain. The very first S’mores was retired but the one we’ve been enjoying for quite a while now is still there. So enjoy this for what it is and have your regular S’mores too.

This is so delicious! It tastes like an amped up cookies and cream but with a graham cracker taste. A S'more is like a cookie so I'm not complaining. I also like it better than the Original. This is my new favorite flavor! I don't think the base tastes like regular vanilla at all. It may not be marshmallow-y, but it's definitely a "warm, dark" and border-lining a faint molasses flavor versus a sweet, strong vanilla if that makes sense. This is my new addiction. I think newbie Ben and Jerry's consumers will take a liking to this one.

column4: A worse version of the old one
column5: I was having trouble finding my favorite flavor of B&J at the store, when I came accross this one that seemed to be an overhauled version of it. I bought it and took it home only to discover that it tastes nothing like smores. The chocolate cookies are good but have a really out of place flavor. They definitely should have had a soft fudge swirl or something instead. The graham crackers are the best part, but there just weren't enough. And the ice cream which says its "toasted marshmallow" flavor just tastes like vanilla. Overall very disappointing not just as a replacement for the old smores but for ben and jerry's in general. I really did not like this one.

column4: Not quite S'mores, but tasty nonetheless.
column5: The new S'mores flavor is much better than the standard flavor from the company. Ben and Jerry's wisely made the decision to use a marshmallow base instead of chocolate, so it doesn't overpower the other components. The base tastes more like sweet cream than marshmallow but when combined with the fudge flakes and graham cracker, the result tastes very close to the real deal. My only complaints are that the chocolate cookie crumbs overpower what little graham cracker there is, losing the theme a little. And the fudge flakes are strangely limited. Still, the components all come together to provide a tasty flavor, and I hope this limited edition lasts as long as possible.

Honestly, I don't love ice cream. It's my least favorite dessert. But, about once a year I get a craving. I saw the Gimme S'more ice cream in the store and love s'mores so thought I'd give it a shot. Total game changer. This is the best ice cream I've ever had and I've ended up buying it like 7 times. I'm so sad it's limited edition and hope it becomes permanent. It's perfectly simple and complex-I wouldn't change a thing. I'm reviewing in hopes marketing people see its ratings and decide to keep it!!

I first tasted this heavenly creation on Dec 24th... And boy what a Christmas Miracle it was. The target I visited was out of my previous favorite Milk and Cookies, and I want in the mood for the "chocolatey-ness" of my other favorite the Tonight Dough.

I feel like this is a just a sweet vanilla ice cream with a cookie swirl, like cookies and cream. There was no noticeable marshmallow flavor, and occasionally I could taste the graham cracker. I much prefer the chocolate based s’mores flavor which was rich chocolate, and a creamy marshmallow, with the perfect amount of crumbly graham cracker. Really, what do you remember about s’mores over the campfire? The melted Hershey chocolate and the gooey toasted marshmallow, followed by the crumbly graham cracker. This new flavor really doesn’t have any of that except the memory of the gritty graham cracker, which was really only there to hold onto the chocolate and marshmallow.

I made it my goal that I’m going to try every single flavor of B&J that I can possibly get my hands on. And out of 10+ flavors so far, this is one of my favorites! I have tried the phish and loved it! I wondered how it would taste with a little bit of crunch and so I decided to try this and it did not disappoint!!! The fact this is actually a TOASTED MARSHMALLOW flavored ice cream!!! BOMB. and not only does it contain graham crackers but CHOCOLATE COOKIES BITS too. And of course a generous amount of chocolate chunks and the hints of fudge. GENIUS.
They really did it with this ice cream guys. I’m so blessed I got my hands on this.

column4: All I kept thinking was "oh man, oh man!"
column5: I literally just bought this 20 minutes ago, put a little bit in a bowl, and decided I had to write the review. I agree with one reviewer where they said the marshmallow ice-cream doesn't really taste like marshmallow. However, I feel like that's a really difficult flavor to capture and the overall execution was very good. I totally tasted the graham cracker pieces and I LOVE the chocolate cookies BJ puts in their ice-cream. If I had to make a critique or suggestion, I would say maybe have more graham cracker swirls and/or flavor the ice-cream graham cracker and have marshmallow swirls with the cookie and graham crackers? I don't know though because I'm pretty overkill with my ice-cream. If it doesn't sound like I'm going to die it wouldn't be my first choice. All in all, I am so happy, I'm struggling to not get more, and I would be very sad if this never came back.

Please bring this flavor back. I noticed one love came back again this year so ive been waiting to see this one too especially since I can't imagine a single person who tried this didn't love it. I saw one person in their review said they ate 3 pints a week. I ate a whole pint every single day the whole time it was available. Bought my grocery store out every time they restocked. I still have 3 or 4 a week but no other flavor compares to this one, not even my old favorite. This ice cream ruins all other ice creams.

column4: I have never been let down more
column5: The original s'mores ice cream was a dream come true, it was by far my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor and I even drove to Vermont to tour the facility and get a cone there. When I tried this replacement I had hope to be wowed but was left feeling nothing but disappointment. S'mores do not have cookies in them so I am not sure where that idea came from, and normally I would like cookies in my ice cream but if I am looking for the flavor profile of a s'more this ice cream just doesn't deliver.

My favorite flavor of Ben and Jerry’s is S’mores, which I have been a fan of since it was called Marsha Marsha Marshmallow but it is the HARDEST flavor to find! I saw Gimme S’more in my grocery and got so excited! But when I got home, I was disappointed. I thought my favorite part of S’mores was the graham cracker swirls which are also in this flavor, but it turns out, the Chocolate ice cream was more vital to the awesomeness of the flavor than I thought. The “toasted marshmallow” Ice cream just tastes like vanilla. While the add-ins are good, the ice cream part of this pint leaves something to be desired. I guess I’ll forever be on the hunt for my fave flavor “S’mores” because you can’t beat it! They shouldn’t have changed a good thing!

I need this flavor to return. This was my favorite flavor of ice cream ever and I would buy multiple pints of it out of fear that I would go to the store one day and the “limited batch” ice cream would be gone. My heart broke as I checked the Ben and Jerry’s section of the freezer and saw that there was no more and it wasn’t coming back. PLEASE bring this back even for just a month so I can buy every stores stock. I’m serious, every time I eat ice cream now I just feel like it isn’t the same as gimme s’mores. I still check the ice cream section at every store I go to and I will continue to do so till it comes back :(

column4: Ok, but NOWHERE near as good as the original.
column5: Don't get me wrong, it isn't bad. It's fine. But I'm docking it one star because it comes nowhere close to the original S'mores flavor--this strikes me as a disappointing remix. The ice cream itself tastes closer to sweet cream than toasted marshmallow, and it lacks enough chocolate to actually compare it to a s'more--chocolate is supposed to be a constant component of the dessert! While I prefer the original's chocolate base regardless; if this flavor had more chocolate chunks and a toasted marshmallow swirl like the original, it might be a lot better. But as it stands, OG S'mores is still my favorite ice cream flavor ever and this simply doesn't come anywhere close to it.

column4: So glad they went back to the original recipe
column5: I loved the 2014 version of Gimie S‘ more. I was so disappointment when the ice cream flavor was changed to chocolate. That being said, once they brought back the toasted marshmallow flavored ice cream, I was thrilled. I liked the chocolate cookies, but the ice cream felt more like cookies and cream than s’mores, so I just added my own crushed graham crackers. EVEN MORE RECENTLY I noticed they changed the recipe, again. This time it was perfected!! I no longer have to add my own graham crackers.

column4: A solid pint. Great use of flavor choice.
column5: I bought this flavor last week while making a trip to my local scoop shop. Let me just start out by saying that smores is a hard flavor to really nail flavor wise. I really enjoyed the marshmallow ice cream. Alot of companies usually go with chocolate as a base for Smores and I think that its usually overwhelming and distracting from the marshmallow. So the star of the flavor show was definitely on point. The grahms are great and are a great topping used in alot of flavors lately. Unfortunately tgis pint suffers from the same thing most smores flavored things do and it was ultimately too sweet in my opinion. I enjoyed this pint but theres too many more to try to stop here!

S’mores is my favorite flavor EVER. So when I saw Gimme S’mores in my local grocery store I almost fell over I was so excited! However the excitement was short-lived because this is not s’mores. Not even the slightest bit. If I were blindfolded and tried this, I would never guess that it is s’mores flavor. The “marshmallow” ice cream is vanilla and there is no hint of graham cracker. The most overpowering part is the chocolate cookie swirl...which is not s’mores. Don’t get me wrong, the ice cream is good! If I were rating based on taste it would get 5 Stars. But I’m rating it based on how closely it captures the s’mores flavor. If I could give it a 0 I would because this is basically The Tonight Dough without the cookie dough and chocolate ice cream. So do yourself a favor and just get that because at least you have cookie dough.

This was the best s'more flavored edible substance I have ever consumed. Every time I saw "Limited Batch" on the label, I dreaded the day that would be my last time seeing it on the shelves. Mercy shone upon me each time, though, as upon return to my home, all the dread melted away as I rejoiced and beheld Heaven's essence grace my mouth with the textured, creamy delight of Gimme S'more. Alas, the day finally encroached upon my innocent self that I would see in its stead, "One Love". I've since settled for Milk&Cookies which I know can never fill the void once occupied by the dessert of unmatched divinity. I dream that one day I'll once again taste the treasure graciously gifted to this unworthy world by the great Ben and Jerry.

column4: Best s’mores ice cream I’ve had!
column5: Way better than the previous s’mores recipe. Fantastic! I sat down with the pint and before I knew it, it was gone. Oops!

As a long time fan of Ben & Jerry's, I have favorite flavors I always want. Being summer and seeing the store did not have any of my favorites, I thought I would try this "new" flavor. I have to say, it is not at all what I was hoping for. I am a marshmallow junkie and was hoping for toasted marshmallow flavor; instead, I felt like I was eating vanilla chocolate chip with some of those cake crunchies that you find in ice cream cakes. I will go back to my regular flavors or skip buying if Gimme S'more is my only other option.

I have been a hard-core regular cookie dough ice cream only fan for YEARS, but this flavor caught my eye at the beginning of summer and I haven't been able to buy any other ice cream since! It's the amazing cookie swirl that almost convinced me that I could love the Tonight Dough flavor, despite my hatred for the nasty peanut butter dough. And the ever so creamy toasted marshmellow ice cream was a pleasant surprise! Even the graham cracker swirl blends in perfectly so you don't feel like you have random dry crumbs messing up the texture! It's the perfect combination that at times tastes like what an Oreo ice cream should taste like! I haven't had my go-to cookie dough ice cream in over 4 months and will be incredibly sad when this masterpiece goes away!

This flavor does not remind me of S'mores at all. Why cookies? The chocolate flakes are more like big pieces... too big for this. I couldn't even finish the container. It wasn't worth it. first time I've done that with Ben & Jerry's. Hopefully you'll never quit making the original S'mores, even if they are only in the shops.

column4: Best ice cream I’ve ever had in my life
column5: I had an ad pop up on my Instagram timeline for this ice cream and I went and found it at my local H-E-B. The next day I went back and they were out. I went to 4 Walmart’s and 3 more H-E-B’s with no luck until I finally found it at target. I have now bought all the pints from my local target. Please send more every where in San Antonio. I need it to live at this point LOL

I really enjoyed this flavor! I was excited to try this flavor because the other s’mores flavor has chocolate has the ice cream which I personally don’t like, so I was very happy to see this one with a marshmallow ice cream! I will say, marshmallow is a hard flavor
to replicate, so the ice cream tasted more like vanilla to me. This flavor would have benefited from marshmellow bits mixed in. The chocolate cookie swirl and graham cracker swirl were amazing and crunchy! These swirls delivered on the s’mores flavor for me!

I love s’mores, and don’t get me wrong this flavor is great, but not what I wanted. I was expecting more of a s’mores flavor, and I would explain this ice cream as more of a “marshmallow cookie crunch.” It’s still good! Just not s’mores. It would be better with gooey marshmallows :)

I just bought this as well as my staple, cookie dough. Cookie dough was as usual amazing but this one was just a miss for me. It reminded me of the pint slices, not nearly enough toppings or pieces. It was mostly vanilla ice cream with some cookie pieces in it. Definitely not enough marshmallows to make it feel like a s'mores ice cream. Anyway, I love most of B&Js flavors but this one wasn't for me

column4: Breaks my Heart this is Only Limited Batch
column5: I like ice cream and I eat a fair amount of it but never have I had an ice cream that haunts my dreams like this one. This ice cream might actually be perfect. The toasted marshmallow base is excellent and not too sweet and the flakes of chocolate add the perfect crunch to the blend. I'm not a big chocolate ice cream fan and I think that making the base marshmallow allows all of the flavors to be appreciated as one instead of being overpowered by chocolate. However, by far my favorite part of this ice cream is the graham cracker fudge swirl. Holy moley! It has a fantastic texture and the taste leads me on a whirlwind adventure. I don't know what I have to do to make this more than just a limited batch but I will do it. Every time I go to the grocery store I hold my breath that it will still be there waiting for me, cool and delicious.

column4: Tastes so good it should be illegal
column5: This is my new favorite ice cream. While I agree that the base ice cream is not an exact replica of marshmallows, it does not taste like plain vanilla... more like the melted gooey inside of a marshmallow that’s not actually warm or gooey. The add ins are perfection to me between the swirls graham and chocolate cookie I’m in ice cream heaven. I have to carefully calculate my purchases so this is the only cheat on my diet each week! I hope it goes from “limited batch” to “here to stay”!

I love a good vanilla based ice cream flavor, and this did not disappoint. I was skeptical to try to the flavor because of the reviews that were already posted but it was amazing. I loved the graham cracker bits. people complain it's not like the regular smores flavor, uh hello duh the smores flavor already exists and is still in stores. This a tasty spin-off and does not disappoint

I have been buying this consistently for about 5 weeks almost like twice a week because I cannot get enough of this flavor. It’s honestly unhealthy for me at this point and for my bank account because I barely bought ice cream before taking a chance on this one. Delicious! The cookies and graham crackers are amazing in it. I literally went through the process of giving my info just so I could write this review in hopes that the flavor is continued and more people improve upon their lives by buying this flavor.

Hmm tasty but not s’mores. Just tasted like cookies n cream with some extra chocolate chunks. No graham cracker flavor. Wish the base actually tasted like toasted marshmallow, but unfortunately the flavor isn’t coming through. Oh well!!

column4: Please rename this to Cookies and Creme
column5: I love Ben and Jerry’s but they missed the mark on this one. This is nothing even faintly reminiscent of S’mores ice cream. Now this one replaced the original S’mores and I can’t find it. Very disappointed.

column4: I need this to be a permanent addition!
column5: I love this flavor. Forget s'mores because that one is just old news. I bought and stocked up my freezer but now I am eating the one last pint... Please bring it back soon

I first tried this flavor with my best friend and became hooked the moment those flavors hit my palate. I’ve gone through 6 pints within a week (multiple times), trying to savor the limited batch that was created (also in hopes of raising the number of pints sold, encouraging your company to keep them on the grocery shelves). There was never a time I’d leave the grocery without one of these pints. Until, my local grocery store finally ran out.

column4: The old S'mores was so much better!!!
column5: The previous S'mores was so much better. The chocolate ice cream tasted much better than the marshmallow one. When I went to the store and didn't see the other one anymore (which btw was my favorite flavor ever!) and saw this one I decided to give it a try, but overall I was very disappointed. The ice cream itself is not good and the chocolate cookies do not taste like s'mores to me. Please bring the old one back!!!

It's vanilla ice cream not toasted marshmallow. That alone was extremely disappointing. A little graham cracker swirl was ok. Just didn't go with the ice cream. I did like the chocolate cookie swirl. It basically was a cookies and cream ice cream taste. Only a little bit of fudge flakes but that's fine with me. Extremely disappointed. I love marshmallow.
Gimme Smores is the best ever. My whole family loves it. Please make it a forever flavor. We can't get enough.

It's ice cream, of course it still tastes good... but sadly this tasted nothing like s'mores. Marshmallow ice cream taste nothing like marshmallow, and the chocolate cookie took over the graham cracker flavor.

column4: In no way is this like a s'more.
column5: The ice cream base is suppose to be a toasted marshmallow flavor but to me it is just vanilla ice cream. This ice cream to me tastes like cookies and cream to be honest, save your money and just make a s'more.

column4: Best Ben and Jerry's Ice Cream
column5: Few Ice Creams in life have a perfect blend of flavor, texture, and eatability (which I know is not a word, but I have made it up for this review!). You can eat Gimme S'more! for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, and still be able to find a way to have more more bite as dessert. You can eat this straight, or as a dope milkshake. I really hope this flavor sticks and goes into permanent rotation. Good job Ben and Jerry - keep up the great work!

This ice cream deserves more than 5 stars. It is by far the best flavor of Ben and Jerry's I've ever had and every time I go to the grocery store I still check to see if MAYBE it will be back. My boyfriend and I were both obsessed with it and had all of our friends and family try it. This deserves to be so much more than just a limited edition flavor. The whole world needs to try it. I agree with the below reviewer that said when this flavor is off the shelf, their happiness died. There is a hole in my heart than can only be filled with this flavor.

Ben and Jerry’s, PLEASE keep this one around. I loved the old S’mores too but this one is so much better. I know most flavors end up in the graveyard but if this one ends up in the graveyard it will be a tradgedy on par with human trafficking.

column4: Best tasting s'mores ice cream I've ever had
column5: My girlfriend bought one for us to try. Went back and bought each our own.

I like this version better than the original, however it still doesn't taste like s'mores. There needs to be a smoky element, whether that be smoked salt or bits of charred marshmallow. Also there needs to be a LOT more graham. I couldn't taste it at all. This ice cream has the potential to be amazing & legendary. It's tough to re-create the taste of a real s'more though. Hope you keep trying.

column4: So glad I had it while it’s still available
column5: Delicious! Great ice cream and the swirls are perfect! I eat my Ben and Jerry’s with one of my son’s toddler spoons to help make the pint last longer (as I always eat the whole thing) but this one I couldn’t help but take huge bites anyway. I really like this flavor! I could have maybe gone for a little marshmallow swirl in addition just for a texture contrast but that’s not a big deal.

I have been FEENING for this ice cream. It is hands down the best ice cream I’ve had in my entire life. Do you know how tormenting it is, to find your favorite ice cream then it goes out of stock? Then you try a million different flavors and none of them do what the Gimme s’mores does. ITS THE BEST. PLEASE. I beg you. Bring this back as a permanent flavor. The people need it.

column4: best s'more flavored thing besides actual s'mores
column5: I am not a fan of s'mores flavored items. I like real s'mores. but this ice cream is exquisite. the graham and chocolate cookie swirl are stars of the show and on a backdrop of marshmallow ice cream, not a sharp sweet but a mellow and deep savoriness...its delicious. I had never tried the original "S'mores" flavor, but tried it after loving "Gimme S'more".. Gimme S'more is hands down the reigning champ, i feel the other s'mores tastes mostly like a rich chocolate, nowhere near as complex in flavor

column4: Definitely better than the old S'more flavor but..
column5: It's pretty much another cookie bit flavor similar to "The Tonight Dough" and "Milk and Cookies." It's pretty tasty though. So.... if you're expecting an authentic s'more flavor, you'll be disappointed. But if you like cookies-n-cream types compared to the two popular flavors I compared it with, you'll enjoy it.
I'm so sad they've discontinued the previous s'mores recipe for this.

My most favorite thing in this entire world is s'mores. Anything Chocolate or marshmallow is good enough, but when you put them together it creates the world's best dessert!
Unfortunately this ice cream didn't taste anything like s'mores. It was delicious nonetheless, but I didn't taste the marshmallowy goodness that I was expecting. The ice cream tasted like regular vanilla, and there were some chocolate chunks in there. The Graham swirl was incredible and made up for the lack of toasted marshmallow flavor.

So, it's not like this ice cream is bad, but the name and description are very misleading. I would call it more of a cookies and cream because there is no marshmallows. And it's not a very good cookies and cream. Definitely one of my least favorite flavors:(

Probably my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor. The marshmallow ice cream is super tasty, I love the chocolate cookies. The original s'mores flavor is too chocolate-y for me, so I much prefer this one. My only complaint: I wish there were more graham crackers.

This flavor absolutely tops any ice cream flavor I have ever tasted; and I love ice cream!
It may hold an extra special place in my heart as it was the sample of the day when we visited Ben and Jerry's in Vermont during a New England vacation. I have had a hard time seeing it in stock at my local grocery stores recently (and I've searched in a few) so I would love to see it more readily available and for it to be a permanent flavor! You will continue getting our business for this amazing ice cream!

I just bought this a few weeks ago and I wanted to try a different flavor and I was compelled to buy this one because of the description. I was very curious about this flavor but afraid it could be too sweet. After my purchase, I finished the whole pint in one sitting because the flavor is delicious! I can't get enough of this flavor. I was looking to buy a second in the grocery stores but I couldn't find any! It's apparently not sold everywhere but when you get the chance to see this flavor, do it!
