I purchased this ice cream because I LOVE Smores but I'm not a big ice cream person (I mostly stick with vanilla bc you can't go wrong with that). After eating the entire pint in 2 days, I was basically begging my husband for another one. Thank you for taking my boring vanilla days and turning them into a rainbow filled, colorful painting I can live in. Yes, I'm a stay at home mom and my days are pretty
much the same. Please try to keep this flavor around and not bury it in a year. Thank you
I may have gotten a bad one but there were no swirls of anything. Just specs of stuff. Plus it was very hard.

From the first time I laid eyes on this cream, I couldn't go back to any regular flavor lol. Seriously, this flavor is soooo much better than the other over-powered chocolate based Smores that you all have. It's texture and flavor is impeccably balanced to resemble an actual Smores. Don't judge me, but it has even come down to me buying atleast 3 pints every other week just to keep my fridge stocked for the future lol. Just please take it off of the "Limited Batch" list. Pleeease!!

I work at walmart. Over the summer I took to sampling a large number of different ice-cream pints, but once I discovered "gimme s'more!" the sampling stopped and I have settled into my favorite ice-cream. While I refuse to share my pint, I would encourage others to get their own. With this flavor, there are no regrets.
I can’t find regular S’mores anywhere anymore. This is a sad excuse for a replacement if that’s what’s happening. It’s your best flavor.
There are no graham crackers or marshmallow swirls. Doesn't even taste like smores. Chocolate chunks are the best part.
The chocolate cookie swirls in this blew my mind. Combined with the graham cracker and marshmallow WOW so good.

I brought this flavor from my local grocery store yesterday because I've been asking for S'more ice cream with toasted marshmallows forever; the wait was finally over or so I thought. Unfortunately, this is NOT S'more flavored ice cream this is however cookies in cream. The "toasted marshmallows" taste exactly like the cream filling in Oreos and the double chocolate cookies like the Oreo cookie – Infinite sadness.
Chocolate Fudge Brownie used to be my fave until I tried this. I’m SO glad I did. This stuff is heavenly!

column4: I think cleaned put my local stores
column5: My daughter and I loved this, i hope it returns as i think weve gotten the last ones at our local grocer

LOOK. I am a busy person. We all are. And part of what makes being a busy person so bearable is ice cream. Especially Ben and Jerry's ice cream. ESPECIALLY THIS FLAVOR. When I tell you that this is like a sweet and creamy version of every campfire memory of your youth, I mean it. It is every good part about every good flavor that makes S'mores a gosh-darn ethereal pleasure right here on earth. So get in your car, walk to your subway station, or hail the nearest rideshare or omnibus and GET SOME OF THIS BEFORE THEY TAKE IT AWAY.
Literally the best ice cream ever made. My new favorite. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!!!!
Currently stuffing myself with heaven and I gotta say this is the best flavor I’ve ever had
This one is 10 times better than the other s'more one! Please keep making this one!
This ice cream is so good and I really wish Ben & Jerry's would make it year round!
I have been on a journey to find the best Ben and Jerry's ice cream. This may be it
So good- I’ve bought it several times. The cookie crumble is the best part.
My new favorite ice cream! So much better than the original s’mores flavor!

I’m going to be super disappointed when this flavor is gone. I love that there is ZERO chocolate ice cream, but instead wonderful graham crackers and chocolate pieces. The toasted marshmallow ice cream is perfect. This is literally the first time in 30 years I’ve been willing to spend money on Ben and Jerry’s (I don’t exactly see eye to eye with some of their views on certain policies and laws), but as long as they keep selling this, I will keep spending my money!
Wish it wasn't a limited batch...I could eat this all year long!
this is so good please keep this flavor forever ohhh yeahhh
I love the new Gimme S’more! It is my favorite flavor❤️❤️❤️
Awesome flavor could be my favorite the texture is awesome
One of my newest favorite flavors❤️ I hope it returns.
It’s the best! Whyyy does it have to be limited? WHY
THE MARSHMALLOW ICE CREAM IS AMAZING please restock

column4: Should not be a limited batch !
column5:
THE BEST ICE CREAM !
Please keep it around!!!

It didn't really taste like anything, just tasted like vanilla ice cream with specks of cookie and chocolate. And when I say specks, I truly mean specks. Trace evidence of flavor. Not a fan at all, tasted nothing like S'mores.

It's a good flavor...... but doesn't remind me of s'mores at all. It's more like cookies and cream with graham crackers. It should have the same marshmallow creme that Fish Food has and way more chocolate chunks.

column4: Give it a good ol' try
column5: Upon first spoon, I was overwhelmed with the disappointment of too much chocolate. I assumed that it was just another foolhardy excuse of a s'mores flavored food that would be overpowered with chocolate. However, I persevered and did not give up. As I continued on in my journey, I was greatly impressed. The marshmallow portions in the ice cream were great. was it as up to par as my usual go to staple of the Tonight Dough? No, But it was good enough to wear I would purchase again if I needed something different in my life. It does get better. Do not give up on this flavor, you really just gotta commit. Not a total fail of the s'mores flavor, which tends to be a difficult one to portray, however not a total success. It is good, though maybe not a typical s'mores. I do not think it completely captures the essence of s'mores, however I think that it is decadent and delicious enough for me to purchase again.

Please do not replace the previous s'mores flavor with this one. It hardly has any s'mores flavor at all. All I taste is marshmellow, where's the graham crackers? Nope, I do not want s'more of this one!

Ok, ok granted I love the original S’mores. I’m just tired of having to drive 37 miles (yes 37!) to get it. This flavor hurt my soul. The base didn’t have any flavor but sweet, the chocolate cookies part was ok. That honestly all the flavors I found. I’ll keep driving the 37 miles.

Perfect name, because I can’t stop eating this and I need some more! Oh my gosh, this ice cream is SO good! It’s my favorite ice cream that I’ve bought in a grocery store, and my favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor since Fossil Fuel. I’m a lover of all things smores, and this is the best smores flavored ice cream I’ve had. I’m going to cry when it’s not in stores anymore. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor, it is too good to just be limited batch!!!

I was very disappointed when I saw my boyfriend decided to buy this flavor instead of Milk & Cookies... to the point where I ate all the ice cream in my freezer before even thinking about opening this new pint. And boy oh boy was I so wrong - the combinations of flavors in this pint exceeded all expectations and Gimme S'more has now risen the ranks to my new favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor. Don't get me wrong, I will eat ANY flavor, but now when I go to stores, I specifically search for this one! The only thing that makes me sad is that most places don't carry this flavor as it must not be as popular, but when it's available, it's embarrassing how excited I get. Don't sleep on this flavor like I did... I've never written a review for any product I've ever bought in my 27 years of life, and am happy that this is my first. I'd give it 10 stars if I could!

I tried this for the first time about 3 weeks ago, and have bought an embarrassingly excessive amount since. It is so good. I love how the chocolate isn’t large chunks, and swirls with the graham cracker perfectly. Too often I find a flavor I like only to have it discontinued. Please don’t do that with Gimme S'more!! Keep it!! I promise I’ll keep eating it!!!

I grabbed this flavor along with a few others when I was bringing a bunch of ice cream for a get together at my brother's home. I picked it for dessert and it was the most amazing thing I have ever eaten! When I was going home for the night, I made sure to take this pint with me!

column4: I will eat it because it is ice cream
column5: I will eat it because it is ice cream, and B&J makes great ice cream, but I am very disappointed in the S'more flavor. I was searching for my long lost, always hard to find, favorite flavor that I recall having a chocolate base with graham cracker and marshmallow swirls. What happened to that glorious ice cream?! I was ready to love this new version but it wasn't meant to be. If you try again, Ben & Jerry, I will too.

column4: Best S'mores Ice Cream Hands Down
column5: This flavor is everything a s'mores should be, and I sincerely hope it becomes a permanent pint in the lineup.

column4: Less than 5 stars is a joke.
column5: Anyone who votes less than 5 stars tried the wrong ice cream.

I bought this last week on a whim and was blown away completely. I went on a quest for it today. No one had it, so I decided to try the original S’mores. You guys. This flavor is so much better than the original. The lighter base really helps the contrast of the flavors, and it’s honestly amazing. Completely worth the calories where the original isn’t. I hope I can find it again before it gets discontinued.

I had the pleasure of trying this flavor at the end of the tour, and it's the most excited I'd been about an ice cream flavor in fifteen years. The ice cream itself is phenomenal, as are the chocolate chips, but the FUDGE FLAKES are the winner in my book. Purchased two pints from my local supermarket (four states away) and it's just as delicious. Please, please, please, please, please keep this flavor!!

column4: Great flavor but S’mores it is not
column5: I was so excited to see this new flavor as I love all things s’mores. I agree with previous reviewers that it reminds me of cookies and cream. A very rich, cookies and cream. What it needs more of is graham and marshmallow, less of the cookie swirl. Having said that, I wouldn’t not buy it if I were in the mood for a little ice cream. Thanks B&J for introducing this new flavor. I hope you keep it around.

I was in Denver, Colorado at a scoop shop and saw the flavor "Gimme Smore" I read the description and it sounded good. My friends and family loved it too, and as soon as we got back home we checked if our local grocery store had it and they did! We honestly probably bought 10 of them. Once it left the stores we were devastated and emailed to make sure it would come back and happily it did!!

column4: So much better than the OG S'mores!
column5:
I used to be diehard for the original s'mores flavor..as it became harder to find I found I just didnt love it as much anymore and I was looking for something to replace it with. Then I found this one! WOW its so good. Please leave it as a consistent flavor!
I have found I can only find it at Kroger sometimes. Publix does not seem to carry ANY new/ limited edition flavors.
Honestly very underwhelming. Maybe if there were more swirls of cookie and graham cracker, or adding marshmallow swirls would help. But I definitely won’t be buying again.

column4: Get rid of the other s'mores and keep this one!
column5: Finally a good rendition of s'mores! So smooth, love the chocolate cookie pieces! Wish it had marshmallows in it like phish food, but oh well. Don't get rid of it please!
This is my new favorite flavor. Tonight dough is a very close second. Hope this becomes more than a limited edition. Would be a staple in our freezer
I ended up trying this flavor because they were out of my favorite. It was so much better than I expected it to be! It might be my new favorite.

column4: So good! My new favorite ice cream
column5: This is by FAR my new favorite flavor! The crunch from the cookies and graham cracker really makes it! I hope they decide to keep it around

It’s currently 1 am and I’m eating my ice cream that I have been looking forward too all day. It’s basically vanilla ice cream with cookies & grahm crackers. The ice cream does not taste like marshmallows & that’s so disappointing.

This was our favorite B&J’s flavor ever. It really tasted just like you were eating a S’mores from a campfire. It was a limited batch and it must be over because it is no longer available where we live. We tried the other B&J’s S’mores Ice Cream, while it is a good chocolate ice cream, it does not really taste like S’mores. Very disappointed it is gone.

This has all the elements of a s’more, but I don’t get that full s’more flavor when I eat it (I think because the marshmallow flavor isn’t very strong). That being said, it’s absolutely delicious. I love the different textures of the chocolate and graham cracker, and I had to stop myself from going back for more. I will definitely be buying this again!

I bought this for the 1st time when I couldn't find my favorite "S'mores" at the store. Very disappointing!! Tastes nothing like a s'more. It reminded me of a cookies and cream type flavor but not even as good! Please bring back the "S'mores" flavor! With it's toasted marshmallow, graham crackers and dark chocolate ice cream, it was delicious!!!
I shared this with my five-year-old great nephew, and he said it was the best ice cream he's ever had.

column4: Please make this a permanent flavor!
column5: I absolutely LOVE this flavor! If I’m being honest, I don’t think it has an overwhelming ”s’mores” flavor, but I love it anyhow. The cookies have a great flavor, and the texture of the graham crackers is wonderful!
Great flavor. The texture of the cookie is spot on. I’ll be disappointed to see this one go.
DELICIOUS! This ice cream has great texture and tastes amazing. I can't wait to get more.
This is my new favorite flavor! I hope they decide to make this a permanent addition!
My whole family loves this ice cream! We tried this flavor during the factory tour in VT. When we got home, we bought the last 3 at our local market. Please make this a permanent favor! PLEEEEEEEASE!

column4: Make this a permanent flavor please
column5: Magnificent.. best flavor out of all B&J I’ve tried. Keep it a permanent flavor!
Fave B&J ever! This should be a forever flavor, not limited batch! Puh-lease!

Been getting this one for years. Its my favorite.
The only thing i do not taste is the marshmellow.
So please throw a marshmellow swirl in this and ill love you forever.
Why is this only a 4/5? People seriously...this is an epic epicurean delight
Wish it wasn't a limited batch. My doctor is glad it is though. LOL
I am obsessed with this flavor. Wishing it wasn’t a limited batch!
Stocked my freezer with it, really wish it wasn’t limited batch
Hands down fravorite flavor yet, and I’ve had a lot of them
I have never been so passionate about an ice-cream flavor than I am with Ben & Jerry's "Gimme S'mores!"

Literally my new absolute FAVORITE icecream ever. It’s PERFECT. It’s all my favorite flavors together all in one and that chocolate cookie swirl is to die for and omg that graham cracker is just heaven, not too chocolately and that marshmallow icecream just ties it aallllll together. Amazing. Exquisite. Must have with every meal.

column4: Better than the actual s’mores flavor
column5: Sooooo good, my new favorite flavor of Ben and jerrys!!!

After my first pint I never looked back. Iv eaten more of this ice cream in the past few months then Iv eaten any ice cream in my entire life lol. If you like smores (or ice cream) then you need to try this. The only bad part is that it says limited batch . "I hope they do us all a flavor, keep this one around for us to savor ".

column4: Great ice cream, but really S’more
column5: The overall ice cream was really delicious, but it didn’t really taste like a s’more. The actual ice cream did not taste enough like marshmallow, would have loved to have actual marshmallow swirl in it like some of the other B&J flavors. Tastes more like cookies and cream with some extr little extra chocolate chocolate pieces.
For days, I have been stocking up on this flavor. The graham cracker and cookie swirls are the pints' best features!! I would love to see this become a permanent flavor!

Oh my gosh I’m so happy they brought this flavor back! I was obsessed with it during the summer and I was so sad it went away, but I just saw it at my grocery store and just about freaked out. The texture from the marshmallow is so nice and the flavors are just perfect. My favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor, hands down.
This is now my favorite Ben and Jerry’s I’ve cream! I love the toasted marshmallow taste, and the fudge ripple and graham cracker swirl are to die for!
This is a horrible job of fixing something that wasn’t broken. Where is my S’mores!?!? I can only find this gross imposter where it used to be.
I’ve been buying this flavor left and right ever since I first tried it — it is my new favorite and I just can’t seem to get enough!!
This is my most favorite ice cream ever! I don't normally right reviews on anything but I want Ben&jerry to make this all the time!!

I have been searching for this flavor for weeks after finding one perfect pint of it. This is what cookies&cream would taste like in an ideal world. Sweet marshmallow ice cream base with a textured Graham cracker swirl is everything a s'mores ice cream should be. I desperately want to find this again!

I cannot say enough about this delicious treat! The sugary graham cracker bits and chocolate cookie pieces...incredible!!!!! If I wasn't already married, this ice cream would for definitely ensure the fact that I would be single forever, which, for this ice cream, would be totally worth it!!!!!!

This is my favorite ice cream. I’ve always been a lover of Half Baked and never ventured out of my comfort zone, but now I’ll never go back. I seriously want to buy pints of this and keep it in my freezer for the 2 years that it is apparently good for. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!!

I really just wanted to break from my usual and when I saw this and it wasn't a chocolate based ice cream, I just had to get it. The last time I went to buy a pint, it was out but today when I went there were some, so just to be on the safe side, I bought two because I love it so much!!

This is by far my new favorite ice cream from Ben and Jerry's! It says "limited batch" on the container, but I hope this becomes a permanent flavor! I will eat this year round. The marshmallow ice cream is amazing and paired with the chocolate cookie pieces and graham crackers, to die!

column4: Top 3 Ben and Jerry Ice creams
column5: I bought this because it was limited addition thinking it would be mediocre. But it was amazing.5/5
Literally my new favorite flavor. Possibly the best one yet. I hope they make it a forever flavor!

column4: This is the best they've ever made.
column5:
I was on a strict diet and hadn't touched B&J for months. Saw this in the grocery store and didn't even hesitate to take two pints. I love s'mores and I hate chocolate ice cream. It turned out to be even better than my other favorite (Milk and Cookies, which is btw a fight to find in any store because it's bought out so quick).
This ice cream is so good (and also a limited batch) that I drove to every grocery store in the area and bought all of the pints available (about 10 pints were left) because they were ALL on closeout and they were going so fast that I didn't want to risk taking the time to go and get a basket when I found more that 2 in a freezer and just bare-armed carried all of them to the register before someone else could. This is not an insane, ice-cream obsessed town, its a normal town. These are normal people. This ice cream is RIDICULOUS its TOO GOOD. If they don't bring this back as a regularly stocked product I will consider it one of the greatest food related tragedies of my life.
Just when I thought Oat of this Swirrled was the best thing EVER. You guys made this flavor.

I crave that cookie taste all of the time. Please make this permanent! I accidentally got the smores flavor thinking it was the same and boy was I wrong. The smores one is just plain chocolate whereas this one tastes like a delicious smore. This is my favorite flavor of all time!!

column4: AMAZING - my new all time FAVORITE!!
column5: I tried this knowing how good the old one was, but this is even better! I actually stopped buying the old one since it got too sweet and overpowering for me, and this newer version fires on all cylinders for me. My 11 year old son also loves it so we have stocked the freezer ;)

column4: I hate that this is limited
column5: My Husband and I enjoy Ben & Jerrys ice cream a few times a week. We have our "usual" flavors; Cherry Garcia and Pistachio. We tried this a couple weeks ago and we LOVED it - the marshmellowy icecream and the crunchy bits plus chocolate pcs perfectly delicious. Now we need MORE

I never had a favorite flavor of ice cream... until now. I’m terrified of the fact that it is Limited Batch. I keep buying a couple of pints when I’m at the grocery store. They go quickly at my house. And so far they are still in stock... but I’m afraid! Don’t take it away!
Honestly I don't know how this flavor only has four stars because it is legitimately one of the best (if not the best) Ben and Jerry's flavors of all time. SOOOO good.

Wonderful remic to the prior version. I really love the chocolate cookie swirl in this. I really wish there was a pronounced graham cracker in here. Maybe replacing the dark chocolate chip with a cluster of graham cracker instead would probably make this a better flavor IMO

Gimme S'more! is one of the best flavors Ben & Jerry's make.
The Marsh mellow is sweet without being too sweet. Great ratio between Chocolate Swirls & Flakes and Graham Cracker Swirl. Although I wish there was MORE Graham Cracker Swirl because it's so tasty and crunchy.

I picked this up yesterday and I wasn't sure that I would like it because I tend to be pretty simple in my ice cream tastes. I am so excited that I did because this is delicious! My favorite part is the combination of the ice cream flavor and the graham cracker swirls.
Best flavor yet! Cant seem to find more in the same stores lately!
The old version is much better this one is not very good at all.
This is the best Ben and Jerry’s I’ve ever tried. It’s amazing!
Finished a pint in one sitting it's just sooooo good!

Bought one of each of the new flavors and this was the first i tried. Its great taste like smores and id buy again. However BRING BACK VANILLA HEATH BAR CRUNCH PLEASE!!!! Obviously i dont eat this for breakfast lunch or dinner either thats a stupid question

I have an obsession. I live around the Algonac mi area. And I guarantee your sells for the gimme s’mores are up thanks to I. I can’t help but eat it on the daily. Absolute best icecream I’ve ever had. I hope it becomes permanent. I’ll be sad to see it go.

I love Ben & Jerry's and I have tried many different flavors. However, this one is definitely my favorite! I've lost count of how many pints I have bought so far. I hope you guys decide to keep this flavor, I was disappointed that it said "Limited Batch".

Please keep this flavor forever, this might be my new all time favorite. Perfect for s'mores lovers, blows the other s'mores flavor out of the water. Love the graham cracker/cookie trails and the toasted marshmallow flavor. It's simply the perfect pint.

column4: The most delicious flavor ever probably
column5: Do yourself a favor and try it! Its delicious. The roasted marshmallow ice cream with graham cracker swirls is just a great mix with the chocolate cookie. I made the mistake of confusing is Gimme S'more! for S'more and while it's good it's not as good.

This is my favorite ice cream by far from anything in store or even fresh from our local ice cream shops! I can’t live without it! I even like it better than the regular s’mores flavor by Ben and Jerry’s. Please please make this a permanent flavor!!!!

This is hands-down the best flavor Ben and Jerry’s has ever made! I love all ice cream but this was so delicious. Tons of graham cracker, chocolate chunks, and chocolate swirl throughout. I wish this was made all year long! I highly recommend this.

My husband and I have purchased this flavor multiple times this summer. By far, one of the best flavors and would love it if it became a permanent option. The combination of ingredients is phenomenal, you won’t regret choosing this flavored pint.

Please add this add as permanent flavor!!! Tried this on a whim and its taken over as the only flavor I have in my freezer. I usually have great self control and eat only a little at time, but with this flavor I can't help but eat the whole pint.

Bought this a month ago & went back for it & have not been able to find it since & am DEVASTATED! It is the BEST icecream I've EVER had & I am pretty picky...like about everything. It has a well balanced flavor that tastes LITERALLY like smores

This is literally THE best ice cream I have EVER tasted. I would love nothing more than for it to be permanent. I have bought every single pint at the three grocery stores in my town! I could not have asked for a more perfect flavor combo.

The Gram cracker and chocolate cookie swirls go amazing with the toasted marshmallow ice cream. The fudge flakes add a nice crunch to the texture. Amazing combo of light and rich flavors, def my new favorite. A bit hard to find in stores.

This is easily the best flavor Ben and Jerry’s has ever released. I firmly believe it should replace the original s’mores because gimme s’mores blows it out of the water. It seems like it’s gone but I’m always on the hunt for it nonetheless

I bought this one after the store was out of my usual and I give it 10 stars it was perfect! I usual have to pick a flavor that doesn’t have too much hard crunch because of sensitive teeth and this hit the nail on the head! Will buy again!

This flavor should become a permanent flavor. Way better then the OG S'mores. I was so sad when my grocery store ran out of this Gimme S'more. Please mamke more of this delicious flavor and make it a permanent one, available all the time!!

i tried it today and it was SO good!! the only thing that would make it better is if the ice cream itself had more of a toasted marshmallow taste. i think right now it just tastes like vanilla (maybe just a tiny bit sweeter tho).

This is the best flavor, I’m obsessed with it. I have to have at least two pints in my freezer at all times! I know it’s limited edition, but PLEASE keep it!! It’s even topping half baked and mint chocolate cookie as my favorite!

column4: Great taste, but not a staple favorite
column5: I absolutely love this flavor, all of the flavors stand out on their own but blend well together. I definitely would grab this on occasion when available. But due to lack of availability it just hasn't become a staple favorite.
This is by far the best Smore's flavored ice cream. Do yourself a favor and try this out because you will NOT be disappointed!

This is a limited edition batch - but it shouldn't be. It's been months since I last found this in stores and I'm waiting for it's return. PLEASE MAKE THIS A PERMANENT FLAVOR. This is some much better than the OG Smore flavor.

Hey guys!
This is my absolute favorite flavor and I am so thankful it is back! I don't eat chocolate ice cream so this version of S'mores is perfect with a marshmallow based ice cream instead of the chocolate based ice cream!

The best Ben & Jerry's flavor yet. AWESOME! Hope this one becomes a regular flavor. I ended up buying the four pints that my local grocery store had left and placed in my deep freeze. So much better than the S'more flavor.

Tried this when it first came out and I was hooked. It has become my new favorite and I like it a lot better than the original S’mores. Hopefully they make this a regular flavor as I’m sad it’s becoming harder to find.

This is probably the best Ben & Jerry's ice cream I've ever had. My boyfriend and I are obsessed with it. We want it to be a permanent flavor not just limited batch!!! It it so so yummy- please keep it forever B&J!!!!

S'mores is one of my favorite flavors ever and B&J's absolutely killed it. You taste the cookies more than anything but once you get to the marshmallow and graham cracker tastes it is amazing. Would highly recommend.

I have never been a fan of marshmallow anything. The exception...Smores over the campfire. This ice cream flavor has me hooked. The marshmallow is subtle but pairs well with the graham cracker and chunky fudgy bits.

I LOVE S'more flavored things and all existing ice creams on the market do not have a good take on it. Ben and Jerry's S'more ice cream is so addicting! Add a bit more graham cracker and perfection will be reached!

Every part of this flavor is amazing. The toasted marshmallow ice cream would be good enough on its own, but throw in the graham cracker swirls and chocolate and it's one of the best desserts you can buy frozen

This flavor was surprisingly DELICIOUS!!!! I was hesitant that the marshmallow would be too sweet but it was such a nice flavor, actually more like a cheesecake taste. Definitely will be getting this again!

The marshmallow flavor was very unique! For a s’mores ice cream, I was surprised but happily! I’m usually a chocolate therapy girl, but this may be a new fave! There were plenty of toppings in every bite!

column4: 100% New Favorite Flavor - PLEASE KEEP IT!
column5: Its like comfort in a pint. Always been a hug fan of Phish Food, but this one is nostalgic and DELICIOUS. I know it’s a limted batch, but I would LOVE to see this on the permanent Ben & Jerry’s lineup!

Guys, I have eaten a ton of Ben and Jerry in my lifetime but THIS is the best I have ever had. Let’s stop the games and make it a permanent flavor. Once this limited batch is done, I’ll be heartbroken.

This is my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry’s, & my favorite ice cream flavor I’ve tried. I like anything inspired by s’mores, and this ice cream did not dissapoint. I hope they keep this flavor around!
I was not a fan of the toasted marshmallow Ice Cream. the chocolate cookie swirls, graham cracker swirls and fudge flakes are all wonderful fill ins. I wish they used a different tasting marshmallow

column4: BY FAR BEST BEN & JERRYS FLAVOR
column5: This is by far the best Ben & Jerry's flavor ever. Finally a s'mores flavor that realizes chocolate is not the star in a s'mores its the GRAHAM CRACKERS. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!!!!!!!

column4: PLEASE DON'T LESS THIS BE LIMITED
column5: This may be my new favorite flavor!! I seriously hope they keep this on forever as a flavor since it said limited batch. I didn't think I could like one more than Half Baked, but this may beat it

I couldn't find the traditional "S'mores" flavor at the grocery store so, as a smores fan, I bought this one instead. What a disappointment! I literally took one bite and made a face because I did not like the flavor. I dug around for a minute looking for a marshmallow swirl.... nope, it's not there. Just small bits of chocolate cookie. What? How is this a smores ice cream? The base ice cream tastes nothing like marshmallow and certainly doesn't have the wonderful marshmallow texture the old ice cream had. Couldn't find anything resembling graham cracker here either, unlike the old one. This is just.... cookies and cream. And a pretty dull cookies and cream at that. This is not only nothing like smores, it is a dull ice cream.
I originally bought a pint of this flavor two weeks ago. We finished the first pint so fast that now we buy two every time we stock up on ice cream. I can’t wait to get s’more of this flavor.
I'm so excited to see they're bringing this flavor back. It's been gone for about two years and I thought I'd never get my ice cream back. Thank you Ben and Jerry's for answering my prayers.
I love anything marshmallow and this ice cream hits the spot! I was so excited to try this and I'm so happy I did! Going to be stocking up since it's a limited edition flavor! Amazing!
I love this new flavor. I hope it sticks around. I love s'mores flavored things. This just adds to the list of delicious s'mores like treats. Perfect blend of flavors. I love it!
I have not tried all Ben and Jerry flavors, but have tried enough to rate this as one of the best. The hint of toasted marshmallow with chocolate and graham cracker are spot on.
I’ve never made a review for any ice cream but this one deserves it!! Never been so disappointed about something being limited edition. This is my ultimate favorite ice cream.

column4: The chocolate cookie swirl... Oh my!!
column5: By far my favorite B&J yet. The ingredients yall use is what makes the difference. That was the only one left at our Target so I hope that get more. I’m in LOVE! -Oxford, AL.
Every time I go to a food store I always get gimmie smore!It has a amazing taste!!If you like chocolate chunks and graham crackers and marshmallows the your in for a treat!!
Excellent balance of chocolate to graham cracker. Could use more of a toasty note on the marshmallow, but favorite new flavor along with with the oat of this swirled flavor.
Terrible. s'mores are graham crackers, marshallow, chocolate. Gimme S'more has ZERO graham cracker taste. It's essentially just another vanilla ice cream with chocolate.
This might be my new favorite. The taste and texture are amazing. The crunch of the graham cracker, chocolate swirls. I told my sister I would share, but there was no way.
This flavor is so amazing. i’m a huge s’mores person and i couldn’t believe how amazing this was. B&J is my go to ice cream and i’ve offically found my go to flavor. YUM!
This ice cream is so delicious when my wife found out it was back for good she was smiled bigger than on our wedding day. Such an improvement from the old s’mores flavor!

column4: Good but flavor not as advertised.
column5: I was so excited to try this but the toasted marshmallow ice cream does not taste anything like marshmallows or any kind of toasted flavor. It’s more like regular cream.
This was so good! I'm not a fan of the chocolate based s'mores and really enjoyed the sweet cream base here. I do wish they had more graham cracker swirls, though.
Everytime I find a flavor I love either they discontinue it or it becomes hard to find in my area...this is my new favorite flavor, please don't make me regret it!!
Just found this. Tried it and it's my favorite flavor. I bought all of them at my local store. I love how much graham crackers crumbs are in it. Soooooo delicious!
This is the best flavor ice cream I have ever had. I will be heartbroken when I can no longer find it on the shelves. Please bring the flavor back next summer!!!!!
I am going to be heartbroken when I don't see this is the stores anymore. I am obsessed. I always buy this when at the grocery store...and usually more than one.
If we can buy Americone Dream with Stephen Colbert, and The Tonight Dough with Jimmy Fallon, I feel like we should definitely have Busta Rhymes on Gimme S’more!
This was good ice cream but I didn't get the smores flavor. I wasn't getting any marshmallow. If it was stronger it would be perfect. But it was good to eat!
Hands down the best ice cream I’ll ever have. I stock up all summer just to make sure I’ll have enough to get me through all other seasons... it’s THAT good.
I don’t ever write reviews but this is the best ice cream I have ever eaten. I really hope this becomes a standard year round flavor I could eat it everyday.
The cookie and graham cracker swirls are my favorite part and this is my favorite flavor by far! It's not too sickly sweet, but satisfied your sweet tooth!
I really like this flavor, the combination works really well. I dont think it tastes as close to a s’more as the original flavor, but still a solid pint.
I really enjoy my ice cream so when I saw this flavor I had to try it! Needless to say it’s my go to now! Please consider keeping this flavor permanently!
The marshmallow ice cream blends perfectly with the graham crackers and fudge swirls. A perfect amount of everything a a very great and spot on base!
I tried this flavor not too long ago expanding from my usual half baked, this has now moved into spot #1. Please please make this a full time flavor!
#THIS by far is my FAVE-O-RIT B&Js flavor.... I thought Urban Bourban was hitting on something, but #THIS.... Gimme S'more for sure! mmmmmmmmmmmmm
Marshmallow ice cream is a refreshing twist on the usual chocolate ice cream base. This is a new favorite, and I always grab a pint when I see one!
I pray this becomes a permanent flavor.. When I tell you I searched EVERYWHERE for this when it was a limited edition flavor... PLEASE BRING IT BACK
It's a tie with Americone dream for my favorite. The chocolate cookies are a good alternative for chocolate chunks and make it a little lighter.
Please bring it back, best flavor you guys have made, been to Vermont multiple times, and go to the local store regularly. Please bring it back.
I thought I was grabbing a personal favorite. The s’mores ice cream and ended up with this disappointment. I’ll pay more attention next time.

column4: Best Flavor I have ever had!
column5: I tried this on our tour of the plant in vermont and now that its out I have been getting it as much as possible before It goes away forever.
My favorite flavor ever. Please remove this from the " limited batch" category and make it a regular item please. It's so difficult to get!
We bought this flavor once and now cannot stop buying it. We officially have “a problem”, haha. The marshmallow ice cream is incredible!
Excellent flavor. Tastes like a french vanilla based ice cream but even better with all the mix ins. I want this to be a regular flavor!
This was the best S'mores ice cream I have ever had. It saddens me to see it as a "limited batch" flavor as if it will be gone one day.

column4: Best flavor out there! Please don't discontinue
column5: I was heartbroken when B&Js discontinued Imagine Whirled Peace - this is the best thing that has come out since then. Please keep it!
This flavor is the best Ben and Jerry have ever come out with. It is a perfect combination of flavors! I hope they keep it around!
I buy/bought this very frequently. Few times a week. So much better than the original. Needs to be available all the time.
Everytime I see this kind I buy as many as I can please please keep it And the best part is the cookie swirl it is heaven
Never, ever get rid of this flavor. I didn't think anything would knock Phish Food off the top of my list. This one did.
The old S'mores was the best flavor. Cookie chunks? Not like a s'mores. The ice cream taste is way off. Very unhappy.

column4: Just Wow. Feels like I'm sitting at a Camp fire
column5: My new favorite ice cream in the world. Cant believe you guys figured out how to make a toasted marshmallow ice cream
This is the BEST flavor I’ve ever had. It needs to stay as a permanent flavor it’s the best!!! You can’t put it down!
You gotta bring this back! It is my favorite thing and my life hasn´t been the same since I´ve tasted it. Please.

column4: Doesn’t come close to the other S’mores
column5: Disappointing. Doesn’t taste like s’mores. Their other S’mores offering with the chocolate ice cream is the BEST

column4: Best Ice Cream I’ve Ever Had
column5: This truly is euphoria in a bowl. I like to put chocolate syrup on mine. I wish this flavor was at more stores!
this is by far my FAVORITE Ben and Jerry hands down, I buy every one I see!! A must try for s’mores lovers !!!
My boyfriend and I bought every container from the store! (6 pints) (It didn’t last as long as we expected)
Our whole family is crazy about this flavor! It is the best! Please don’t stop making it… Ever. Ever. EVER
This is the best flavor. The chocolate ice cream of the other smores is just too much. This one is perfect
Not chocolate-heavy like the other S'mores flavor. Nice graham cracker flavor and texture. Well-balanced.
Love this flavor! Please make it one of the regulars. It has the perfect balance and tastes so delicious!
I am in love with this flavor! I am so sad to know it is only limited batch. Please don’t discontinue it.
This is so good that I desperately try to find it in the city sometimes. Please don’t get rid of it!!!

column4: Is it possible to give 10 stars?
column5: I was sooooooo happy when you brought this flavor back from Limited Batch status. I could live on it.
Please replace this one for the current s’mores! This flavor is so delicious, I can’t get enough!!
I recently bought this and I am very impressed. It was very good and I would definitely recommend!
My favorite used to be Phish Food. Gimme S'more is even better! This should be a permanent flavor.
This flavor is amazing and it said it was a limited batch. Please keep it as a permanent flavor.
0h my yummm!! This by far is my favorite & my new weakness! Ben & jerry please keep this one!!!
I honestly think this is one of my favorite flavors of Ben&Jerry's! Perfect texture and crunch
Hands down my all time favorite ice cream! I will buy this for as long as I shall live lol!
This pint has the perfect amount of add-ins that it's not too overwhelming. Perfect combo
Super delicious, definitely my favorite flavor. I really hope it becomes permanent.
I've been eating Ben & Jerry's for 15 years, and this is easily my favorite flavor.

column4: Please keep as a flavor that is always available!
column5: Perfection if you love s’mores, especially if the marshmallows are your favorite

Thrilled they brought this flavor back !
I could eat pint after pint of this
My all time favorite flavor. I hate that it’s seasonal. I want it year round!
Tried about a month ago and am hooked only downfall not a year round flavor.
This is one of the best B&J I have ever had. Please keep this one around.
this is my absolute favorite ice cream flavor ive ever had. so so so good.
This is the only flavor we agree on. The graham cracker is the best part!
Havent had anything else the past few months. This flavor is pure gold.
Please keep it. Also miss the caramel one, the good ones need to stay
I don't know why this is limited batch it is the best flavor to date.

column4: BEST Flavor EVER. Please add more Marshmallows
column5: Amazon just AMAZING. i bought 7 in one week! Please keep it coming
I love a good s’more and this ice cream is perfect and I love it!
This is my new flavor & far exceeds the chocolate S’more version!
Delicious! This is by far my favorite B&J flavor of all!
Definitely one of my new favorite flavors. Too good!!
The flavor is IMMACULATE. I mean... need I say more?
Best ice cream ever! Please make it permanent!!!!!!

A flavor I'm glad to see back after liking it before it was discontinued, PB Half Baked is even better than I remembered. There's not much to say if youve already had the standard half baked. It works very similarly except that the vanilla portion of the flavor is now replaced with peanut butter ice cream, and the chocolate chip cookie dough is instead peanut butter cookie dough. For such slight changes though, they do make a big difference. One thing I disliked in the original half baked was how weak the vanilla base was and how it was completely dominated by the chocolate. That's not the case here as the peanut butter taste to the ice cream is strong enough to balance out the chocolate, giving the classic combination we know and love. The balance is also matched perfectly with the mix ins. There are HUGE brownie squares in this flavor, tasting great as always, and combined with the numerous peanut butter cookie dough pieces, you're getting the chocolate/peanut butter taste in every bite. If you're a fan of that flavor combination, you can't go wrong with Peanut Butter Half Baked.

Normally the tonight dough is my go to. I have been waiting for this flavor to get to my area and went it finally did I made sure run right to the store. I was in LOVE after the first bite . This is by far the best peanut butter ice cream flavor ever made. I beg and plead for this flavor to never go away because I am forever hooked. Thank you thank you thank you for my new favorite ever. This is a MUST TRY because you won’t look back

I bought this at a Ben & Jerry’s store a couple days ago in Sandbridge, VA and it was oh so good! I am a sucker for anything chocolate and peanut butter and this did not disappoint. My son took one lick and was jealous he did not pick it so we went back again last night and bought some for him! I love the peanut butter ice cream and fudge brownie and didn’t realize the cookie dough is peanut butter too, yum! Now that I am home from vacation I just need to find it near where I live!

First of all I would like to say THANK YOU to whoever decided to put peanut butter in half baked! Half Baked is my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor but I'm not a huge fan of vanilla ice cream... I just think the Peanut Butter ice cream really pairs well with the rest of the components in this mix. Dare I say... I might like this BETTER than the original Half Baked? It's too soon to tell. I love you Ben & Jerry!
The ice cream has chunky brownie, amazing cookie dough... Just amazing stuff!
It’s everything you could wish for that would make being stuck at home seem a real treat. Chunks abound! The peanut butter and chocolate combination is hearty, decadent and worth it!
Yes. Just yes. Nothing else needs to be said. This ice cream is it. Buy it. Try it. Love it.

I LOVE this flavor, and I am happy it is now a full time flavor! Both my mom and I find this as our go-to desert. The ice cream is loaded with stuff: cookie dough and brownies and on the side I like to add in some chopped nuts. LOVE LOVE LOVE.

column4: Love the PB, just needs a little more
column5: Bought this past week, was expecting a lot more PB, was very similar to the regular Half Baked. Still Very Good!
If you like peanut butter cup or PB and chocolate, this is like that, but so much better

column4: Best ice cream in the world
column5: If Ben and Jerry’s only made one flavor, I’d want it to be peanut butter half baked.
Took me awhile to find this but when I did I just kept going back for more.
The perfect combination all in one! And the better “half” to half baked
So bummed when this disappeared. Our voices were heard! Thanks guys!

All time favorite flavor! The berry flavored swirls of ice cream are perfectly delicately, but distinctly, flavored. The natural pastel purple that comes from the blackberries is definitely an adorable plus! The mascarpone ice cream swirls have that heavenly cheesecake-y taste, which combines with the soft crumbly shortbread to create a tiramisu-esque experience... but instead of the rich notes coming from cinnamon it comes from the crunchy fudge-covered almonds. May I suggest renaming this flavor to "Chuck Berry Mascarpone" after Chuck Berry: one of the pioneers of rock'n'roll.

column4: Seriously The Best Ice Cream Ever
column5: This is without a doubt the best ice cream I have ever tried from Ben and Jerry's, and probably from anywhere at all! There is a B&J's scoop shop down the street from my apartment, one a couple miles away, and countless grocery stores in between. However, I constantly find myself driving out of the way to go to the only store in the area that I know stocks this flavor regularly. It is the perfect combination of flavors, and I have a really hard time keeping myself from going through the whole pint in one quick sitting. I will be absolutely devastated when this exclusive flavor is no longer available. Please keep it as a regular!!

A lot of recent flavors from Ben and Jerry's have left me disappointed but I saw this at Whole Foods and had to give it a go, because I'm like a Ben and Jerry's expert at this point. I thought it was going to be gross but I was pleasantly surprised by how all the flavors complimented each other. I left a few other people in the house have a small spoonful and they liked it as well. And to the person who said Strawberry Cheesecake is gone, you are wrong. That flavor is everywhere and never going away. Perhaps your store just stopped carrying it. It would be nice if they brought back the Blueberry Cheesecake flavor that was an exclusive at Walmart years ago. Anyway, Blackberry ice cream gets thumbs up from me!

This is my new favorite ice cream!!! It is absolutely delicious! I saw this at my local Whole Foods and decided to give it a try since I was craving ice cream with berries and I was so pleased when I got home and tried it. This flavor has just the right amount of sweetness and the flavor combo is to die for. The chocolate covered almonds and cookie bits not only add to the flavors but provide a great texture. I usually don't write reviews but this is so good and I'm afraid it will only be a limited time product. I hope they keep this one. I'll buy it forever. Recommending to all my family and friends.
I’m not even a big ice cream fan, but this is life changing!

first of all--the pieces of cookie throughout the ice cream are EVERYTHING! I love the balance of flavors. It's so good. I'm actively searching for it which is the primary reason I ended up on this website, but figured I'd add a review and give it 5 stars to keep it on shelves.

This is a great balance of flavors -- each one compliments the other and none of them are too over powering. Creamy, sweet, and a little fruity. I especially like that's it not jam packed with fixings and you get to taste the actual ice cream.
Great flavor combination. I wanted to try it because it was a new flavor and ended up loving it! Definitely in my top 5. My only criticism is that is it difficult to obtain.

When I bought this flavor, I was hesitant to switch things up from my trusty flavor, The Tonight Dough. At night, I got peckish and searched the fridge until I remembered about this new flavor. I was in bed when I had my first bite, my only main regret.
Bring Bach strawberry cheesecake. This isn't cutting it!!! I'm done buying Ben and Jerry's until it comes back!!!!

This is my Favorite Ben & Jerrys Flavor ever, I wish it was easier to find. so many pB cups !! #LOVE that !! I really hope they make it permanent, because their is not very many other options for banana lovers. (I Hate the toppings in Chunky Monkey (◕︿◕✿)) would love if they added fudge brownies
I'm so glad this flavor exists, it's my new favorite! Chocolate, PB, and banana is such a good combo, I order smoothies and milkshakes in that combo too.
It’s like chunky monkey but with peanut butter cups instead of nuts!
This is the best Ben & Jerry's I've ever had! I can no longer eat nuts so the peanut butter cups are the best alternative to Chubby Hubby. I hope this flavor is available forever!
Bought this on a whim and it's the best B&J flavor of them all.
My local store sold out completely of this flavor, no word when it’s coming back. :( I love it. The banana so good. It’s the better version of chunky monkey! The cups are perfect!

This is the best flavor Ben and Jerry’s has done!
Banana and chocolate ice cream with mini peanut butter cups. Please please keep this as a permanent flavor. I buy multiple containers whenever I can find it!!

column4: This needs to be a REGULAR flavor!
column5: Happened upon this at the grocery store, and knew I needed to get it. I've been enjoying Jen & Jerry's for decades, and my favorites before this were Cherry Garcia, Apple Pie a la Mode (from years ago - I heard this one couldn't be added to the reg. menu because the price of apples fluctuates too much), Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, then Half-Baked, and more recently Cinnamon Buns. This one combines SO MANY of my favorites: cinnamon, dough, chocolate, brownies ... and now SPICE. YAS. I LOVE spiced and spicy chocolate, and what has been created here with this special edition is just EVERYTHING. PLEASE keep *churning* this one out!!! ;D It is simply the BEST.

I have been hooked on half baked for years now but this flavor changed everything! There’s just so much depth of flavor. I thought the spicy brownie would be too much but it’s very mild. I’d still prefer normal brownie but not by much. I love that the cinnamon ice cream and chocolate ice cream are two different ice creams swirled together. At first glance I thought it was going to be just chocolate ice cream with cinnamon flavor but I was wrong. Every bite is a unique balance of flavor that sends my tastebuds to heaven. I just wish it wasn’t a limited batch. I can’t go back to just half baked after this.

I really enjoyed this flavor--interesting, but not so far out there that I couldn't wrap my taste buds around it (I was a bit skeptical about the spice factor, but it was nice and mild). However, while the pint succeeded in taste, it fell short on execution (bad pun unintended, considering the name). The chocolate base was noticeably less dense than the cinnamon, and was riddled with tiny air bubbles. It still tasted great, but the creaminess was inconsistent, and likewise, there were plenty of dough gobs but only 3 big brownie chunks. Seems like Justice Remix'd just needed a a bit more balanced mixing.
For reference, my pint's info: UPC 076840036745, Date FEB0621BJ52, 5095 09:20 67834702)

I bought this flavor today. Upon trying it, I immediately wanted to go back to the store & buy every pint that they had. SOOO GOOOD!!! Please keep this as a permanent flavor, instead of a limited batch. This is one of the best flavors you've designed in a long time (except for the sour sorbet this summer).

Oh man. I don't even seek out ice cream that often, but this flavor caught my eye and now I am an absolute fiend for it. I'm getting emotional thinking about this ice cream. I tell everyone I know to please try this ice cream. I sent out text messages to my family telling them to go buy this ice cream. I have never tasted anything like it in my life! Please keep it forever! I'm obsessed! (And of course I am also happy to hear about the nonprofit partnership.)

This is delicious. I didn't know what to expect when I read the description of the flavor, but OMG it's so good. It takes like the Abuelita brand hot chocolate with a little hint of spice from the brownies. I love it!
I was a little nervous about the spicy brownies but oh my gosh! I love this flavor!! Please be a regular flavor not a limited batch!!! It’s so good!!!

This hit every sweet spot for me. I'm serious. Absolutley loved this flavor, and I'm actually a little sad I tried it, because if it's a limited edition flavor that means it'll go away and never return. This needs a spot in the regular rotation. Don't make me go back to the store and hoard all of them.

I love cinnamon more than any other flavour in general (in cakes, bubble gum, tequilla, porridge ... - you see, ice cream is certainly no exception), so i was really excited to try the ben & jerry's cinnamon bun, when I saw that flavour for the first time some years ago. Unfortunately, when it comes to ice cream, I strongly prefer chocolate over vanilla or caramel as a base, so I the cinnamon bun flavour didn't blow my mind completelly. Just 1 hour ago I saw THIS new flavour at a gas station and coudn't resist. It's even better than I expected, because the spiciness harmonize so well with the cinnamon & chocolate (that I always love). So I highly recommend this ice cream flavour to anyone, who really loves cinnamon in general and chocolate ice cream.

The Ben & Jerry's line of ice cream is some of the best I have ever tasted. When I spied this, the newest in the freezer at my local grocery I was intrigued. So I ponied up my cash and brought it home. As usual, I popped the top and took a taste. OMG! I was floored. This has to be added to the line-up as a permanent option.It is everything I did not expect it to be. The flavors burst in your mouth! The combination of cinnamon and chocolate, although seemingly odd, are perfect together. And the "topping on the cake" is the spicy fudge brownie. Love this new flavor.

I can't stop buying this flavor. The balance of cinnamon ice cream, chocolate ice cream, tiny chunks of cinnamon bun dough, and bits of spicy brownie?! OH MY GOD. It's perfect. I saw a picture of this flavor online and then noticed it in my local grocery store, so I bought it. That was a month ago and now I can't stop. Please please please, Mr. Ben and Mr. Jerry I am begging you from my soul to keep this in the permanent rotation. JUSTICE TASTES DELICIOUS.

column4: amazing flavor! even more amazing cause
column5: So glad to see B&J step it up on the activism front as well as on the taste buds front! This is a delicious ice cream

column4: Went back and bought every last pint
column5: This flavor combination is out of this world with perfect balance of flavors, textures and ... that cinnamon spice is everything. i wanted to try this initially because I support the cause and I was curious about how the flavor combo would be - and now I’m here begging you to add this to the regular rotation of flavors even though I never write reviews. I just went and bought out my local stores stock. Please add this to the regular line up!

I saw this in the store and had to buy it as soon as I saw the words "spicy brownie." They weren't lying, the brownies have a really interesting kick! I can understand why it was too strong for some, but for me it made up for the lack of cinnamon promised in the ice cream and cinnamon bun dough (which basically was like their cookie dough in texture minus the chips). This is a flavor for people who like the classics but are bold enough to try out some more exotic ones. Overall, one of the most intriguing flavors I've had from Ben and Jerry's.

I'm not sure I will ever love again! This is a fantasticly unusual combination that just hits every mark for me. I can usually ration out my pints over a couple weeks, but this flavor only lasts me two sittings! Anytime you need a break from the sugary cinnamon, the deep rich chocolate is there to smooth things over with a little spice and vice versa. I would definitely become a regular fanatic if this became a daily flavor (r.i.p. my diet)

It's so good! The cinnamon seems to pervade the entire pint and the spicy brownie bits are so tasty and interesting! I don't think that Ben and Jerry's has another flavor with a spicy element and I don't think that they need another one if they were to just keep this one around, which is exactly what they should do! I am gonna be so sad when they take this one away. I get that its kind of a weird flavor but it seems like the people who like it, REALLY love it.

This flavor is exactly what I didn’t know I needed, the cinnamon ice cream and hint of heat from the brownies really make it something special. I hope Justice ReMix’d becomes a regular flavor, it’s one of the best in the Ben and Jerry’s lineup and I’d be so sad to see it go.
Someone brought this in at work and I immediately fell in love with it. It has chocolate, chunky dough, and cinnamon!! So Good!

This flavor combined my two favorite desserts - chocolate and cinnamon rolls. To me, it tastes like the Mexican hot chocolate, Abuelita - which I LOVE! I didn’t read that the brownies were spicy, so I was confused at first, but it was a great addition!
I’m an ultimate half baked person, and this is amazing and just what I wanted. Please keep it is so good!!!

Whoever expresses this as a disappointment is wild. All these flavors paired wonderfully and the spice to the brownie is like a cinnamon spice and so delightful. I'll be sad once this is gone! Love it!!

This is my favorite flavor ever. Its the only flavor I buy now when I get ice cream and I always buy 3 or 4 pints of it at a time out of fear it won't be there when I go to the store next. I love the cinnamon and spicy brownie combination. There isn't a substitute to this and I will actually cry when its no longer available.

I am in love with this ice cream as of many others I know, I always seem to become OBSESSED with a product when it is a “Limited edition” item. For the first time ever I am actually contacting a company in hopes to continue my obsession with this fantastic ice cream. PLEASE keep this flavor available!! :)
This is how every flavor pint should be! Gorgeous chunks evenly distributed throughout, creamy, chocolatey with a cinnamon zing. Phenomenal.

column4: PLEASE Make this a Regular Flavor!!
column5: This is actually some of the best ice cream I have Ever had. All the spicy elements blend perfectly with the chocolate to create something I can only describe as the apotheosis of Mexican hot chocolate. Please don't take this deliciousness away from me!!! Make this a regular flavor!
Bought this yesterday at my local supermarket and ate half the pint already. Love it, love it, love it.
LOVE LOVE LOVE! Please keep this flavor definitely one of my favorites I can’t get enough of it!!!!!
Please please PLEASE keep this flavor!! It is my all time favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor!
I love the cinnamon bun and can't find it saw this and tried it! Best flavor ever! Please please please.keep!
Loved the cinnabon pieces and the spicy brownie pieces!
...and you will not change my mind. Its cruel and unusual that this is a limited edition batch.

This is the kind of pint that I could eat in one sitting, but have to hold back to save more for the next day. The combination of flavors are exquisite in my opinion!! Nothing to complain about for me. If you’re scared of the spicy chocolate, know it is not very spicy and quite delicious. THIS ICE CREAM NEEDS TO BE PERMANENT because I’ve realized I can’t live without it now. Please consider keeping it!!!!

I was skeptical initially on the spicy fudge brownies, but holy Hannah! It’s 1000% amazing! It is darn near impossible to stop at one serving. I hope this stays around for a while, or I’ll have to get another freezer to stock up!
I'd never had a favorite ice cream flavor before I tried Justice ReMix'd and now I've gone through five pints and counting and I would sacrifice my firstborn to keep it in the roster forever

This flavor is complete perfection! It’s the perfect balance of chocolate and cinnamon. I love the spicy brownie (not too spicy) and the cinnamon roll. I just keep buying multiple pints every time I go to a grocery store because this flavor is almost singlehandedly getting me through the stress of working during the pandemic. As an added bonus to the delicious flavor, the nonprofit connection is for criminal justice reform - ice cream doesn’t get any better than this! I hope you add it as a permanent flavor!
At first I didn't feel the spice from the brownie but when it's eaten alone its definitely there. This flavor is sooo good. I wish it would be a permanent flavor.
I was really excited to try this one when I heard about it I love the spicy sweet aspect and really wish they would make this one of the regular flavors
The ice creams are blah but the spiced up brownies saved the pint...until I ate it. All.

My curiousity stopped on the label at 'gobs of cinnamon bun dough', so I didn't even notice the "spicy fudge brownie" part. Turned out I don't actually like the little cinnamon dough buttons (easy to spit out), but the spicy brownies really made this worth the purchase. I hope they revisit it again, Loving the cinnamon/spicy chocolate combo.
The icecream itself and the cinnamon buns were good but the brownie was too strongly spiced.

I haven't found a new ice cream flavor like this in awhile. I would love to have it permanently, because it is my fave flavor currently! Very odd, but satisfying. The spiciness of the brownies works perfect with the sweetness of the mix of the cinnammon bun dough and ice cream. I'd love to see more creativity like this in my ice cream!

column4: The best ice cream ever. Make it permanent!!
column5: Ever since this ice cream has come out I always have a pint of it in the fridge. Seriously right now I have 3. Not only is this my favorite ice cream of all time but it also supports a great cause so maybe we can be lucky enough to keep this pint because as long as you guys make it I will keep buying it.

column4: Just didn't do it for me but I really wish it did
column5: I was more disappointed in myself than I was in this ice cream. I really wish I liked it. I really do. All the mix-ins were right up my alley. I don't know where my taste buds took a wrong turn. I had visions of a cinnamon roll with spicy hot chocolate to wash it down, but instead it was like a roller derby of playfully competitive flavours fighting each other to win. In turn, they ended up too black and blue to discern who was who. :'(

column4: This ice cream cured my depression
column5: NEEDS TO BE A PERMANENT FLAVOR! I can’t believe there’s a flavor that combines my favorites— cinnamon bun with Half Baked. Every bite was so interesting and delightful. A whole pint goes down eeeeasy. I hope I can find this again. DEFINITELY a new favorite.

column4: Addicted To CinnaBuns & Chocolate Ice Cream
column5: Was first time trying and I'm addicted the spicy fudge brownies paired with the sweet chocolate ice cream and cinnamon bun dough is to die for thanks @Ben&Jerry's for the best I've cream always - Ricco

The flavors did not go well together AT ALL. It sounded interesting so I decided to give it a try. I like spicy food but the spicy brownie mixed with the strong cinnamon flavor was vile. If I had very much of it, I Would be nauseous . The second I bit in to the brownie, I thought “this is disgusting “. Absolutely the worst Ben & Jerry’s flavor I have tried and the worst flavor of ANY ice cream I’ve ever tried.GROSS.
Oh my gosh, I loooooooove the mixture of chocolate and spicy brownies! It reminds of Mexican hot cocoa. I vote to keep this flavor forever!
Please make this a permanent flavor. It’s one of the most unique, delicious flavors you’ve ever produced.
If you like Mexican hot chocolate, you’ll like this! It’s delicious!
The cinnamon spice is way too aggressive - tastes more like strong gingerbread - and the flavor doesn’t pair well with the chocolate at all.
New favorite ice cream. Ate all of it in one night. Heck yeah

This is the combination of all of my favorite things and I'm so happy. It is so delicious and I hope Ben and Jerry's never stops making it. I'd always wondered about the lack of Ben and Jerry's cinnamon ice cream because it's my absolute favorite -- and Justice Remix'd knocked it out of the park. Everything is so cinnamony and chocolately. I love the chunks. SO GOOD.

column4: This flavor does ice cream JUSTICE!
column5: I bought this a week ago because it sounded delicious. After finishing the first one a couple days ago I just had to get another. I had to go to two stores to get one and learned it's a limited batch. I LOVE cinnamon ice cream, mix that with cinnamon bun dough and spicy brownies and it is heaven on earth. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE add this to your line of regularly available flavors. I would hate to lose it as quickly as I discovered it.

The cinnamon ice cream and chocolate ice cream are great. And the cinnamon bun dough is out of this world!! But the spicy brownie in it overpowers everything. I end up picking it out of the ice cream. Honestly either the brownie needs to be taken out all together or the brownie needs to be a plain brownie instead of a spicy one. There is also so much brownie in it so it could also stand to be toned down in that regard as well

I got this flavor by accident. Had done curbside pickup at the grocery, but instead of Phish Food, I received this. It sat in the freezer for about a week and decided to try it. I honestly feel like my taste buds were being punished, as if i lost a bet and was forced to eat this. If fear factor created an ice cream flavor, this would be it. None of the flavors work together. The cinnamon is too strong. Would be better if it tasted more like a cinnamon roll than the cinnamon challenge from a few years back. The spicy brownie makes no sense. The flavor is so off putting, i wanted to gag. They could have easily used some sort of Mexican hot chocolate flavor and it would have been so much better. I really have no words except this is one of the most vile and disgusting flavors I have ever eaten. Save your money and make a donation to your favorite social justice charity.

column4: Singing to the Tune of Justice
column5: Not only does this ice cream flavor support a I cause important to me, but it's an amazing texture and flavor combo. That spicy ribbon of fudgy brownie?! Those cinnamon roll chunks?! My tongue is dancing to this beat. How does this not have an average of 5 stars already? It's the remix I needed. Play it again! Make it a permanent member on the Ben & Jerry's Flavor Playlist.
I wish this flavor was around year round I never knew I needed this in my life until I unlowingky took a bite into the most heavenly thing I’ve ever eaten. I LOVE IT

Went looking for Justice Remix'd ice cream because of a facebook post that led me to Ben & Jerry's civic and social commitment. The Ice cream happens to contain a cinnamon and brownie deliciousness that I love and is hard to find together. A true surprise and delight. Thank you so much and if the blueberry one comes about I know I'll like that one too.

column4: A great message on a great icecream.
column5: So many ice creams these days are one trick ponies: sweet on sweet on sweet. A well balanced dessert needs multiple notes. This delivers. Warm cinnamon, spicy brownies, bitter chocolate and of course smooth sweet Ben and Jerry's icecream.
Sugary and not great. This is probably my least favorite flavor I have ever had of Ben and Jerry's.
I wanted to like this flavor so badly but I just didn’t. The spicy brownie ruined it for me. I ended up digging out the brownie and just eating the rest.

I know I bought this, but I can't remember it. So that means that A. it's not horrible and B. it's not outstanding. Kind of like a blind date who is certain to end up with someone decent and you wish him the best, but he's not for you. I'd probably buy it again just to make sure I wasn't intoxicated the first time and that's why I forgot.
Just bought this and took three bites and I couldn’t swallow any more this is the most disgusting ice cream I’ve ever had I don’t know how it made it to the shelves
I love Ben & Jerry's however this one is not for me..Dissapointed.
Super icky. I've never thrown away an almost full pint of Ben &Jerry's before The cinnamon flavor was too strong and the spicy brownies absolutely unpleasant.
Don't waste your time. Much like protests, the whole thing is ruined by disgusting spicy chocolate!

I love this flavor so much that it is now my official go to! The surprising bite of spicy brownie is so delicious! I was hesitant to try it because I can't do too spicy anymore, but this has just a small amount of spice which oddly balances with the sweet! I hope this becomes a part of the permanent collection!

I’m not a chocolate fan at all, but I love cinnamon so I decided to give this flavor a try and im glad I did!! The chocolate wasn’t overwhelming and the cinnamon mellowed it out. I loved the chunks of spicy fudge and cinnamon bun dough. This was super creative and perfectly executed

Thank you for using your platform for good. Ice cream flavours are incredible with real ice cream! It amazes me how socially responsible this company is. I 100% recommend this brand to everyone I know any chance I get. Incredible flavours, incredible missions, worth the price!

I'll admit - the colorful packaging and good cause drew me in. Who knew that the cinnamon that lingers would be the thing that keeps me walking back to the fridge each night around 9:30pm? I'm not an ice cream addict, but this flavor is more like a gourmet treat. Indulge!
Probably the worst ice cream that has ever been created. Absolutely disgusting

I love Ben and Jerry's because their ice cream is delicious and because they support good causes. This flavor looked interesting and I like knowing that a portion of the money I spent might help make a difference. I ended up eating the whole pint in one sitting

If you don't like the flavor profile, chances are you won't like this pint of ice cream. However, if it sounds good to you like it does to me, pretty sure you'll enjoy this ice cream. My only complaint is I wish it had more of the spicy fudge brownie pieces
I was so excited to try this but it was absolutely terrible. It made my stomach hurt and I literally was nauseous.

I have never written a review here before, but I thought this necessary to see if you could make it permanent. It is so so so good. The spicy chocolate and everything is amazing. I went back and bought our grocer out. Please make it permanent. :)

What a change of pace! Not a huge fan of chocolate but the cinnamon gives it a good balance. What's B&J without something gooey? Oh yes! Gooey gobs of cinnamon bun dough and brownies! Even the brownies are magical! The taste bursts on my tongue!
The flavor combination is disgusting, obviously no real thought went into this ice cream and I doubt anyone taste tested it.

column4: Not what I expected but really good!
column5: I didn’t really know what to expect with this flavor and it was different but still super good. It is pretty powerful on the cinnamon and with the spicy brownies but everything complemented super well together. Would probably buy again.

I found this at the grocery store once and I fell in love with it. Unfortunately, I haven't been able to find it anywhere after that. I really want this flavor of Justice will become a permanent flavor!!!!!!!! PLEASE!!!!!!!

I absolutely loved the cinnamon and chocolate flavor combination. It's very unique flavor in the best way possible. It's easily one of my new favorites. The spice in the fudge brownies is perfect to fight against the sweet.
Horrible flavor. Get rid of it. One of your worst ever.

I impulse bought the last pint of this my Kroger had, and I swear to you it’s the best ice cream I’ve ever had! The spicy brownies were absolute perfection! The only problem? I’m craving more and can’t find it anywhere!

column4: Not good! Bring back One Sweet Whirled.
column5: Why not bring back some of the good flavors from the graveyard instead of garbage like this?

Seriously, please keep this flavor on the shelves and available forever! I love cinnamon buns and brownies. But the spicy brownies were new to me--and now they're an absolute favorite! Can't get enough.

Bought this just to try it after reading the label, I was intrigued by the spicy brownie aspect (I LOVE Mexican brownies). Ate it right out of the pint, and was SO GOOD!!!!!! definitely a new favorite!
This is wonderful! Definitely different than your “traditional” flavors, but I seek this one out! I wish it was easier to find!! You have to LOVE cinnamon though— some strong flavors here!
This ice cream is amazing, the flavors go together so well and remind me of Mexican style hot chocolate with a lovely spicy kick! Please add this to your permanent roster of flavors!!!
This flavor absolutely rules and I hope it never goes away. I love that Ben & Jerry's takes social justice seriously as a company, and I love the work they've done with Senator Sanders.
AMAZING FLAVOUR! Ben and Jerry are so awesome that I don’t mind paying more for this ice cream because they pay their employees very well. Great guys. Gen Z loves and approves!!

column4: One of the best ice creams I’ve ever had
column5: I’ve eaten way too many kinds of ice cream, and this is easily one of the most amazing and creative kinds that I have ever had. Any time I see it in a store I have to buy it.
I almost didn't buy this, but my daughter convinced me to try it. It's amazing! I love that it has just a bit of brownie spiciness with the sweetness of the ice cream.
All of the flavors pair very well with each other, the brownies add just a touch of spiciness that is complimented by the chocolate. This is going to be my new go to!
This is seriously such a good flavor. The brownie in it has enough cinnamon to give it a kick but isn’t overbearing and the little cinnamon bun bits are phenomenal.

column4: Spicy Mexican hot chocolate and Cinnabon
column5: Anyone who rates this below a 4/5 is foolish! This tastes like heaven !! Spicy brownie batter with cinnamon ice cream and Cinnabon pieces. I hope this stays forever
Hi I just kept feeling like they are reaching for flavors on this one. Bring back dastardly mash and New York super chunk
I absolutely LOVE this flavor. It's sweet with just a touch of spice with my favorite flavors. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!

column4: Please make this a regular flavor!
column5: OMG it's so good, spicy brownie, it's like you have been listening to my inner ice cream dream thoughts! Thank You : )

column4: its good but not the best
column5: i bought this awhile ago and it's good. i really realized that I was white when I though the cinnamon was spicy lol
I love this! It's my favorite ice cream since Late Night Snack. I wish it would become a permanent flavor.
So good!!!! Please keep this one as a regular! It's the closest thing I can find to Mexican Chocolate.
the best ice cream flavor out there! the spice is phenomenal and it NEEDS to be a regular flavor
Are a combination meant for holy matrimony. This flavor needs to be made a permanent option.
Please keep this flavor it’s my favorite the cinnamon and chocolate are a perfect combo
I love this flavor so much this is my favorite pls dont ever get rid of it im begging
This is by far my favorite flavor of all time with Cinnamon Bun. Please keep it!!!
Absolutely love this ice cream!!!! I’ve never been disappointed when trying flavors

column4: Not for everyone but I like it
column5: Not for everyone but I like it. Lots of cinnamon flavor and a nice hit of chili
This is an amazing combination of flavors. Please make it a regular!

column4: Wish it were here to stay
column5: They’ve done it again! Few things I crave, now this is on the list
Love this flavor so much! Dethroned several of my favorites!

column4: Please make boots on moon a regular flavor!
column5: I love this flavor, and am already sad that it is a limited item. Yummy chocolate ice cream with crispy toffee & fudge cows and sugar cookie core. It's all amazing, and a terrific combination! Please please please, how do we make it a regular flavor?

column4: Worthy of being a regular flavor!
column5: Bought this the other day and omg I am in love! This needs to be available always please don’t take it away it’s too good to not be around for long!!! The sugar cookie core is to die for!!

I’m just gnna say. This one makes me wanna sit on the couch and just smile n dance like a chunky little kid gettin’ their ice cream shimmy on!!! The chocolate ice cream, for some reason, tastes so dang good in this batch! The toffee bits are such an awesome touch to it. The fudge cows, another awesome texture element with a hit of a nice bittersweet dark chocolate to contrast the sweet/salty toffee crunch and silky smooth milk chocolate ice cream. But the dang killer here is....... that SUGAR COOKIE CORE. WHOA B&J... ur just showing off now. That stuff.... is like.. out of this world (; U should really put a litttlleee more in the pint hehe! :D
But anywho, it’s Uber yummy!! Wouldn’t be surprised if it became a next hit and stuck around!
