This is my favorite Netflix B&J flavor and I will be purchasing again. I was worried this would be too sweet but has the perfect balance of chocolate, toffee, fudge, and sugar cookie core. The sugar cookie core is not overbearing like some other core flavors. I also love the that the texture is both smooth and crunchy. I hope this become permanent

I was excited to try this new flavor last week. What's not to love about fudge cows, toffee, and sugar cookie. Unfortunately for me it was a major flop. The ice cream and fudge cows were enjoyable. The toffee clusters were a weird texture experience, unfortunately. I was expecting something more along the lines of the toffee in Everything But The.... which I really enjoy. The real disappointment, and reason I'm actually taking the time to review ice cream, was the sugar cookie dough core. For me, it just tasted of wet sugar. Grainy, too soft, no flavor. Ben and Jerry's has set high expectations for their products, but sadly this one didn't deliver for me.

The combination of flavors in this ice cream is OUT OF THIS WORLD! I was lucky enough to find one pint and have been searching for more. I really hope this becomes a regular flavor because I’m obsessed. I’ve been checking all the stores nearby and everywhere is sold out. Please please please keep this one around!

The combination of flavors makes an incredible medley for your taste buds! It was exciting to try a new flavor. The sugar cookie dough is absolutely heavenly. You have to try this new flavor combination!

column4: Boots on the Mooo'n is out of this world!
column5: Hole-y Cow!!! (Hole-y as in holes. You know, because craters...? Oh well.) Couldn't wait for Boots to show up in stores, so when it did, I pounced. I would be over the moon if this was made a regular flavor. For heaven's sake, do it! This is one of the best B&J flavors I've ever had. Been eating B&J for decades.

column4: Best Chocolate Ice Cream in the Solar System!
column5: I tried this last week for the first time on a whim (because there was no other B&J's left at the grocery store). I was nervous because myself and my partner are not usually chocolate ice cream lovers but this one has changed our minds!! The cookie core and other bits balance out the chocolate ice cream PERFECTLY. I've been trying to track it down again since but it seems people have caught on to it and it's been sold out. You have to try it!

My son and I can’t stop talking about how good this flavor is, and how we would sign a petition to get it made a permanent Ben and Jerry’s variety! Please continue to make it...the combination of fudge and sugar cookies and toffee! oMG!
After searching all the stores in my area, I was finally able to get my hands on what I now believe to be my new favorite. Please don't let this be a limited batch! It's too good to disappear!!!!

column4: Most amazing flavor I’ve ever witnessed
column5: I bought this flavor a week ago, hearing about it from the office ladies podcast. It sounded good and I love supporting them and also Space Force, so I had to buy it. I am not kidding when I say this is literally the best flavor I’ve ever had. And it’s not even close to my old favorite go-to of cookie dough and cookies and cream, so that says ALOT. This needs to be a permanent flavor. 500 stars.

I got a serious case of the munchies and this was the best icecream a person could ask for...A ice cream for the Gods! and them mini chocolate cows got me feeling like a archaeologist digging thru looking for there goodness. Hats off!!

Move over Phish Food and Cherry Garcia and Coffee Coffee Buzz Buzz and Americone Dream- all legit faves of mine! And make room New York Super Fudge Chunk because there is a new Wowzer in space!! PLEASE make this one stay in orbit!!!

Searched high and low for this flavor. Finally found it and bought 6 pints! Everyone in our family (5 of us) is obsessed with it. Hands down a winner! Especially love the toffee clusters in this ice cream!
The toffee bits sold me on this initially, but every part of this flavor was a delicious surprise! Everything from the milk chocolate ice cream to the cookie core... so good!!

column4: Please make this a permanent flavor!
column5: This is my new favorite icecream. I really hope you guys keep it on forever. Usually it takes me months to finish a pint (I know, it's weird) but this one I finished in a day.

column4: Please please please make this a regular flavor
column5: I never write reviews for anything. This is the best ice cream I HAVE EVER EATEN! Please please please make this regular.

I bought this today and holy camoly it is so good. The sugar cookie dough is to die for. Can you all please make this regular. Please. It is a perfect balance of sweet and the toffee adds some saltiness, and the sugar cookie dough just finishes it off.

column4: Nothing but fun for the mouth
column5: The milk chocolate flavor is excellent, and there are tons of things to keep your mouth entertained. Awesome!
I love the special cows! and literally everything else about this pint. it’s so good in every way

I went back and bought the rest of them at my local store.
Please make these a regular flavor!

I'm sitting on the couch devouring this entire pint. Make this flavor permanent, i need it in my life. Love chocolate based ice creams with crunchy additions like almonds, chocolate, toffee, etc. Most are ruined with marshmallow so this was an exciting flavor to find! My other fave is New York Super Fudge Chunk. We need more chocolate flavors like these!

I went to five stores in my area looking for "Boots on the Moon". I love all things MOON, and I thought I would like it, and I was wrong - I LOVE it! I had some for breakfast today...and dinner tonight. I am glad I live alone, so I don't have to share it! Am I addicted to it? Will an intervention be called for? Tune in, and make it regular!!!!
My usual pint, Milk and Cookies has taken a back seat. The sugar cookie core + the toffee is a combination to DIE FOR. Plus, we all know the delight that is B&J chocolate ice cream.

One of my new favorite flavors, I’m so sad that it’s not a regular flavor. The sugar cookie core is my favorite part, and the toffee clusters add a great sweet crunch. Would definitely keep purchasing this if they made it a regular flavor.
Seriously...never get rid of this...even if the show doesn't continue on (which it should)...never ever ever get rid of this amazing flavor combination.

column4: SWEET BABY JESUS please keep this flavor around!
column5: I seem to have discovered this flavor just as it was going out of stock. Got one for me and one for my wife, and we both thought it was fan-freaking-tastic. It even has a hint of malt flavor, whether unintentional or due to a confluence of other ingredients. I'd have trouble choosing between this and Phish Food, and that's saying something! I'd be even more stoked if you could make a froyo version, 'cuz the reduced calories and saturated fat would let me eat it more often!
This is seriously my fave!!! Please make it permanent!!!
My new favorite flavor from you please make more!!!!!

column4: Would give 10 stars if i could.
column5: Okay I’m not joking when I say I love and hate this flavor at the same time. I pe this flavor because it is BY FAR the best tasting Ben and Jerry’s flavor ever made, no competition... and i amd a huge Ben and Jerry’s fan. The reason I hate it is because this flavor has caused me to gain like 30 lbs at this point because I cannot stop eating it. It does not get old. Ever. The crunchy sweetness of the toffee is spot on amd just pairs PERFECTLY with the sugar cookie core and the milk chocolate ice cream. Oh yeah, MILK CHOCOLATE. The milk chocolate is so good. I have eaten probably like 50 of these at this point and everytime the core is big and i never get a bad core. Every pint i have gotten has been just as good ig not better than the last. Please Ben amd Jerry’s. If you are reading this. DO NOT MAKE THIS A LIMITED TIME FLAVOR.

This new flavor is so good! I love it, it's like a fun twist on some well loved Phish Food flavors. The little chocolate cows are such a cute touch. I hope that this becomes a regular flavor, as it is now my favorite chocolate ice cream based B&J pint. My fav of all time will always be Salted Caramel Core, but this is a close second. Definitely for caramel and toffee fans, I even loved the sugar cookie core.

I am not the biggest ice cream fan but I do like a good dessert, but this was everything I could have wanted from a dessert, creamy chocolate, a nice crunch of cookies and toffee, a smooth flavor that wants me going back for more. If your a fan of texture and something out of the ordinary give this a try, I know I did and I cannot wait to get more.

column4: Until this becomes a regular flavor...stockpile.
column5: When I first discovered this I was on the East Coast. Found it in a tiny gas station. After one scoop I immediately made plans to go back and buy the place out. Bought the remaining three pints the next day. We only had a week left on our trip but I had no issues finishing all 4 pints.
Just tried chip happens..yummy! Don't know how you managed the chips in it but love the salty/sweet combo. Reminds me of b-day's as a child

I love this flavor SO MUCH! It's such a bummer when the limited time flavors are the best flavors. I still think about the 2016 Empower-mint. Please keep this one going. And maybe bring back the Empower-mint?
This could’ve been fantastic, but you went and ruined it with Almonds, one of the most common food allergies!!
My daughter (19) and I think this is one of the best flavors. Can't stop wanting in our freezer. Please make it a regular.
Absolute favorite flavor! All the flavors compliment each other perfectly and make a final product that is absolutely to die for! Please please please make it a regular flavor!

One of the best flavors out there.
At first the cookie core had me second guessing, but I was 100% wrong!
Everything about this is amazing.
Its a shame that its a limited batch.

column4: Not as Great as the Others.
column5: Tastes kind-of bland. The sugar cookie core doesn’t really taste like much, especially when combined with the chocolate ice cream. Favorite part was the toffee pieces.
Sugar cookie dough core make that into a flavor only

I loved this ice cream so much I typed in Ben and Jerry's Americone Dream is amazing into Google. I wanted to add a review since there was only one so far... To my surprise the cone was still crispy and the amount of fudge covering the cone was not overwhelming whatsoever. But the caramel swirl is fantastic quality, bringing back memories of the first time I had caramel with a side of Apple. I chose this because I was looking for a non traditional flavor but not too rich, now don't get me wrong, eating half a pint is definitely a hefty load on the gut but it doesn't feel too busy and you still get to enjoy the ice cream.

I've gone back to this flavor after favoring The Tonight Dough and the Caramel Core ones. I forgot what I was missing. I bought 2 the last time they were BOGO at Publix and go 2 more before the sale ended. I love caramel(I hate fudge) and the crispy chocolate covered waffle cones are tasty. Also I don't see many other options with waffle cone pieces. There have also been a lot of waffle cone in the pints.

Tastes good, satisfies my sweet tooth, and definitely represents the Americone Dream!!!! Also, you don't have to feel guilty about eating a pint because you're eating ice cream for charity (it's like a tax deduction.... calories get deducted if they're for charity)!!!!
I typically try every new flavor that comes out when I see them. When they have no new flavors to try, my default is American dream. I love it!
I eat a pint when I am sad, I eat a pint when I am happy, I eat a pint when I want to be happy... I keep eating this ice cream... SOOOOOOO GOOOOOOOOOD. This ice cream is truly dreamy

column4: And I don't like ice cream...
column5: I am not a big fan of vanilla ice cream. In fact, if it isn't coffee or chocolate I am usually not a fan at all; however, Americone Dream is a mix of fabulous flavors! No toppings or modifications are needed to make this a tasty treat for my son and I. The touch of waffle cone is a nice addition (though crunchier cone would be even better). Thanks for making a great ice cream!
Fell in love at the first taste and haven't looked back. No other ice cream can compare. June 19 was the first I saw and heard of the slices and now I won't sit and eat the entire pint. Thanks guys!

So between this and the new Gimme S’mores. It’s a TIE. I honestly can’t decide which one I like more. But this has been one of my favorites before Gimme S’mores. I love Americone Dream so much The ice cream and the caramel ripple and the chocolate covered cone parts is AMAZING.
Whoever said this needed more salt it DOES NOT. It is perfect the way it is. I found no issues with the crunchy part either.
It has the perfect amount of caramel perfect amount of crunch and chocolate ratio. This is like a drumstick but with more of that “good part”.

It would be fantastic if the texture were better and it had something to balance out the sweet. Replacing plain caramel for salted caramel, or adding sea salt to the chocolate. Switching to dark chocolate. The cone pieces felt chewy or doughy, and I expected a crunch. Though I do suspect this has more to do with the freezing process. I'd like it a lot more if it was only one of these. While I don't care for it, I can see why lots of people love it. Good job!!
I chose this flavor for the caramel swirl as much as the fudge covered cone pieces...sadly it contained neither
This is my fave ben and Jerrys flavor. I had it back when I met jerry at a speaking engagement. The little waffle cone pieces are perfect and the ice cream flavor is great. I have and will buy again!
My favorite ice cream! Taste just like a drum stick!! Has the perfect amount of flavor [product:ben-&-jerrys-americone-dream-ice-cream]
Very good ice cream u guys have. Americone Dream is me nd my wife's favorite flavor. I it new varieties coming out anytime soon?
This one is pretty perfect in my opinion. All the elements work well together and the chocolate covered cone pieces were nice n’ crunchy!
They have much better flavors. It’s not bad but I do not like that the waffle cone pieces get soggy

I just want to say that now that I have found Ben & Jerry's Americone Dream ice cream, my life now has purpose!! That purpose is to get up everyday, eat Americone Dream ice cream until it's gone, drive to the store, buy some more, and repeat. This ice cream is EVERYTHING!!!!!! Please never stop making it!!!!
Excellent! This flavor has all sorts of things in it!

Guilty pleasure! I think everyone can agree Ben & Jerry's is delicious no matter what kind you get. I really like the Americone Dream. I'm a huge fan of waffle cones so add that into the ice cream and I'm sold. I usually get the small pints with my boyfriend and we'll finish that in one sitting! It's so bad but so good :P

Such good ice cream. Like too good. I cannot physically stop myself from consuming this ice cream. The flavors and textures blend so well together and I am overwhelmed with the need to keep eating it. I am considering seeking professional help. Keep doing what you're doing. All the stars *************

My favorite ice cream! Its so delicious, especially the caramel swirl! Also Ben & Jerrys high key supports the #BLM movement. So we STAN Ben & Jerrys in this household. 10/10 recommend to anyone and everyone in literally the entire world. Go get you some Ben & Jerrys. Like. Right now.
The vanilla ice cream is so good! Almost as good as my Grandma used to make! I am a caramel lover and could use a little more in this but it was yummy, and of course everyone loves the cone!
OMG.....amazing! First time trying this flavor and it did not disappoint! I love that the ingredients were in every bite. #happycustomer

column4: Never Knew Something Could Be So Good!!
column5: I finally weaned myself off of the Strawberry Shortcake and then came Americone. Oooh Americone, I love you so!
All of the best flavor combinations in one place! Sweet, salty, crunchy, creamy, chocolatey, waffly goodness!

column4: Yummy!!!! Perfect combo. Lots of caramel!!!
column5: Satisfies all sorts of cravings. Crunchier and creamy. Love it while I watch the Steven Colbert show!!!
Literally my favorite flavor. The waffle cone prices and magical.
So perfect!!!!!! The caramel swirl is amazing!!!!!

Beauty, brains, and brawn. Chocolate, caramel, cone. There are no wrong answers here. I'd say it tastes like heaven but something about it is just so sinful. Nothing should be this good and still be legal. Oh but it is. It so is. Haven't tried it? WRONG. You haven't just "not tried it", you haven't even started living. It is life giving. Fix it. Go forth. Brave the great wide world in search of the truth of the universe. (Hint: it's Americone Dream).

This is one of the most delicious flavors of ice cream I’ve ever eaten. It’s sweet, crunchy, wonderfully gooey, with pieces of waffle cone, fudge, and caramel goodness. To make it even better, the proceeds go The Stephen Colbert’s AmeriCone Dream Fund, which feeds hungry children, provides them with medication, and also provides services to veterans. For what more could you ask? You’ll love it and feel good about helping those in need.

I'm new to B&J icecream, just got a whole bunch of flavors last month and out of ~10 this is my least favorite.
The good: The icecream is high quality, and what you would expect from B&Js, and the caramel was gooey and tasty.
The bad: The cone pieces had a soggy texture and were very unpleasant to eat, they were slightly chewy. Not sure if this is a result of my freezer or something, but I couldn't finish the whole pint.

I decided to go with something out of the blue but sadly I wasn't thrilled.... the waffle cones where soggy and didn't make me want to eat the whole pint, like how I usually do lol.... don't think I'll eat this one again.... :(

A good flavor! It's pretty simple- vanilla with caramel and fudge-covered waffle cone pieces- but sometimes that's all you need! I've definitely purchased this flavor more than once. The only slight flaw- and this wasn't an issue the last time I purchased it so maybe it got a bit better- was that the waffle cone pieces could be a bit too big sometimes. I'd still highly recommend it, though!

This Ben & Jerry's was good, but not my favorite of their line. Idk if it's the label or the actual ice cream. I think it needs someone else on the label who doesn't hate our current president. I'm a repeat consumer, but I won't buy again because of that. I love America regardless of who our president is, but overall the flavor is actually great like all ben & Jerry's

The vanilla icecream part is amazing!!! The chocolate covered cone pieces and yummy, but the texture of the caramel is bad, i love caramel swirls in icecream but this light almost slime textured caramel really bothered me, i tried to.mix it in more or somethinh but it was like biting into a cold slime ball i couldn't eat it. But the rest of the icecream was great

I’ve always loved Ben & Jerry’s. I really like this flavor. It’s really sweet and all of these flavors together are amazingly good. The only bad thing about this flavor is that the ice cream cone chunks are soggy. Either than that it’s super good and I recommend! It’s an ice cream that you can get an upset tummy over because it’s not too much chocolate!

Lactose is not my friend. When I eat dairy I tend to clear out a room and be left alone. For this reason I don't eat dairy whenever possible. BUT THIS! I don't even care!! This is THE ONLY ICE CREAM I eat. My husband and kids and hide in the basement, I'm NEVER giving this up!!!!!
*plus they support the fight against racial inequality AMAZING!!!

This one is my husbands favorite. I prefer Phish Food or Half Baked. I'm so addicted that sometimes I will eat a whole pint in one setting. It's a little costly but sometimes you can find it on sale. I live this and nbn if you like ice cream then you would enjoy this. Check out Phish food andHalf Baked. Half baked has brownie in it...omg

My husband bought me this and it was sooo good I had to look it up to show my sister to convince her to get this flavor... and see if everyone agreed with me!! It made my night. I am usually not a huge fan of ice creams, I am pretty plain and like basic flavors like coffee, vanilla, and strawberry but man was this ice cream good!!

This is my favorite Ben & Jerry flavor! It's the perfect amount of sweet for my sugar cravings. I like the waffle cone bits which give it a crunch and some texture. I give it 4 stars instead of 5 because some batches tend to have soft pieces of waffle cone. The waffle cones are not consistently crunchy with every pint i buy.

This is my favorite ice cream ever. I cant say this enough. They currently dont have it at the Walmart near me so I have to get it whenever Im at food lion. Its so worth it though. I think my favorite part is the waffle cone pieces. My only complaint is that there isnt enough caramel, but thats just because I love caramel.

The best combination of things. I like vanilla based things more than chocolate ice cream based things and so I stay away from a lot of Ben and Jerrys flavors because most are the latter. This is great for a vanilla lover. With pieces of fudge and caramel (waffle cone pieces). The gooey-ness is real and drool worthy. YUM.

Great brand, amazing quality and this flavor is just perfect The crunchy waffle cones with caramel and the vanilla is just the right blend however I add chocolate syrup in with mine to give it more of a chocolate flavor I'm not big on the vanilla ice cream but with chocolate syrup mix in it's perfect summer time treat

This is one of my all time favorite flavors!! The ingredients go together so well!! The waffle cone pieces are very easy to chew, I get a rush of gooey goodness when it's mixed with the caramel swirl, and I get the ultimate satisfaction in enjoying a very tasty ice cream pint!! Please don't ever discontinue this flavor!

I'm lactose intolerant so I tend to stay away from ice cream but every now and then I give in . This by far has the be the best ice cream that I have ever had and it's also my first and only time trying Ben & Jerry's . Haven decided when I think that I'm going to try a new flavor yet because so far this is the one .

Ben & Jerrys will always be my favorite ice cream from the store! These pints are packed with flavor - mainly because while developing the product Ben, who suffered from a disease that left him unable to smell, couldnt taste the flavor of the ice cream! So, they just kept adding flavor! Which turned out GREAT for us.

I love this brand of ice cream. I have no complaints with any flavors from this company. Growing up we lived near a Ben & Jerry's and that was our treat. I love this particular flavor because of the different bits added to it. In short I don't have the time to write all the reasons I love this brand or this flavor.

very good ice cream flavor from the bunch in my opinion. i think the cream flavor is great and i love the chocolate covered cone pieces that is all over the cup. the price is good and you can find this at your local Walmart or Target for about $4 i like to have it with me on a spa night while i'm watching movies.
I love the smoothness of the ice cream, the crunch of the cone and the yummy caramel swirl. Thank you for creating this flavor.

I normally only get Cherry Garcia from Ben & Jerrys, but I just tried this flavor out for the first time ever. This has all of my favorite things in it - chocolate, fudge, caramel and waffle cone bits! The waffle cone bits are my favorite little add on. They add a nice crunch to the ice cream. Highly recommend!

One of my favorite ice cream flavors. I love Stephen Colbert and its so cool that they collaborated with him on this! The flavors together are so delicious- Im not even a caramel fan but the overall flavor is just too good. And the chocolate covered waffle pieces are so unique to this ice cream and so tasty.
I love Ben and jerry’s Ice cream but this flavor is just not it... It’s so boring tasting compared to most of the other choices they have

Ben & Jerry are my two favorite men because not only are they SMASHING the patriarchy, but theyve been killing the ice cream game for years. Americone dream is the perfect balance between the sweet cream I cream and the salty waffle cone pieces. Its not too indulgent and is always stocked in my fridge!

I LOVE Stephen Colbert and I LOVE Americone dream! I am a total vanilla girl through and through and tell me that my vainlla has toffee, almonst, caramel and wafers? HEAVEN!!! This ice cream was made for ME but, since I love Stephen Colbert SO much I let Ben & Jerry name this one after him. Mwahahaha!

My favorite ice cream in this world! For a long time I've tried to find my favorite ice cream. My brother likes buying random ice creams and he ended up having this one night. I fell in LOVE! I feel this ice cream on a spiritual level! It defineitly fits who I am as a person! Crunchy and sweet! ; )

im not the biggest fan of ice cream but THIIIIS is so good. I cant get over how amazing this is if im going to a drug store for snacks I always grab this. If you havent tried it please give it a try you wont regret it!! (plus this is an amazing company to support so please spend the extra money!)

column4: Three Times This Has Been Offered to Me
column5: My husband has bought this for me three times and I've eaten it all three times. I was "squinty" two of those times so on those occasions, I was super thankful for it and likely licked the bowl. That said, I am not reviewing this also squinty and eating Cheetos that I also think are super awesome.

If I had to pick a favorite ice cream I think it would be this one. Yeah it would definitely be this one. Its just the best ice cream I dont know what else to say it has everything you could want it has chocolate covered waffle cone pieces, it has caramel, and it literally is the Americone dream.

I am not a big ice cream person at all but we picked this flavor up so I gave it a try since it has been so hot out. It. Is. DELICIOUS. I now have a scoop every night - the caramel swirls and chunks of cone in the vanilla ice cream are insane. You can tell they are used high quality ingredients.

I cannot tell you how much I love this ice cream! It is a flavor I always buy when buying ice cream. I cannot express how delicious this is and I think you should go out and buy a pint right now. Trust me. I love ice cream. I am super satisfied with my choice to eat this for dessert for years.

I know a lot of people really love this one, but I'm not feeling it. The caramel swirl is delicious, but the cone pieces are soggy/chewy, and to me, they should be crunchy, like in a Drumstick treat. I think I'll be passing on this one in the future and trying the Karamel Sutra Core instead.

This ice cream is one of my favorites right now!! The pieces of chocolate covered cones are so good. Also I love the caramel swirl throughout this ice cream. It's a little on the sweeter side but so creamy and delicious. I can't wait to get more of this. I just wish it was a little cheaper.

This ice cream is one of my favorites right now!! The pieces of chocolate covered cones are so good. Also I love the caramel swirl throughout this ice cream. It's a little on the sweeter side but so creamy and delicious. I can't wait to get more of this. I just wish it was a little cheaper.

This is my second favorite flavor of Ben & Jerrys. I love it so much and hope they never retire the flavor. Delicious sugar cone bits are the perfect crunch in the creamy ice cream. I only put a few sprinkles on top of this and it is the perfect dessert! Hard to not eat the whole pint...

This has to be my least favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor. Usually they knock it out of the park, but this one disappointed me. Its strangely...bland. The cone pieces seemed stale and cardboard-y, and the rest of the flavor didnt make up for the lack, unfortunately. I wont be buying it again.

When I want ice cream, this one is my GO TO. I love everything about it. Although the Tonight Dough is a close second, I prefer the Americone Dream. Its easy to find and the pint size is perfect for one serving for me! Nothing hits the spot when I am having a craving like this variety.
This flavor is delicious!! I absolutely love the little pieces of waffle cone in there. I enjoy ben&jerrys the most out of all the other ice creams because its creamier than others.

This is my all-time favorite, vanilla with pockets of fudge and caramel, it is pricey but goes on bogo often where I shop. The tubs are small but that's a good thing otherwise brainfreeze and sweats or pj's (unless you have elastic waist pants) would be the norm. Perfect with Netfix.

This icecream is so good. I like the chocolate covered waffle cone pieces and the swirls of caramel yummy . Its the perfect combination. Sometimes I eat the whole pint . Its thats good. Plus Ben & Jerry's is woke so im happy to support them. I will definitely continue to repurchase

My favorite ice cream! Taste just like a drum stick!! Has the perfect amount of flavor! Vanilla, milk chocolate and little bits of cone, just the perfect combination. I try not to go down the freezer section of the grocery store because I know I'm going to get a couple pints! Yum!!

Ben & Jerrys is a staple in the ice cream industry and i enjoy it. Its not my go to because it can be too rich a lot of times but this particular combination of flavors is classic and delicious. If i only had Ben & Jerrys to choose from this would be it! Gotta love the classics!

I am a long time lover of Americone Dream, delicious caramel and waffle cone flavors. I was surprised with my latest purchase to find cookies and cream ice cream instead of vanilla in the carton, in the end a not unwelcome addition. Perhaps brings into question quality control.

I love Ben and Jerrys as a company because of their social justice and community based causes. Americone Dream is one of my favorite flavors. Its the perfect mix of fudge, caramel and waffle cone pieces. Its rich and creamy. Beware, once you get started, its hard to put down!

Since I was 13 I have never strayed from my two favs Phish Food and Chocolate brownie ... I saw waffle cone pieces and was sold. Americone dream is a great combination of flavors. The waffle pieces are still crisp and fresh. I ONLY wish it was loaded with more waffle pieces.

Ben & Jerrys is a family favorite because my dad has a dairy allergy. I love when stores have dairy free options because our family is able to enjoy a fun dessert where everyone is happy. Best creamy and fun ice cream flavors! [product:ben-&-jerrys-americone-dream-ice-cream]

My husband and I are addicted to the Ben and Jerry's ice creams! They are just the perfect amount of creamy. The chocolate is tasty and decadent. This flavor is perfect with the waffle cone pieces. I would highly recommend to others to try this flavor. You can not go wrong!

This is by far my favorite ice cream from Ben & Jerrys. The vanilla ice cream is always a winner, then the fudge covered waffle cones add texture and little bursts of surprises in your mouth. The caramel swirl adds that smooth buttery flavor without it being overwhelming.

Once this came out it quickly became my fave Ben and Jerry's flavor. Its has all of my favorite things in it. Its delicious the cone is crunchy not soggy and tge chocolate hits the spot. Perfect on a cold summer day. The price is average but can often be found on sale.

[product:ben-&-jerrys-americone-dream-ice-cream] I love ice cream and I love Ben and Jerrys Icecream ! Out of all their flavors I love Americone! A nutty buddy basically mixed with the classic vanilla ice cream! This is a most have! You have to try this ice cream!

Yummy! Has all my favorite flavors. Chocolate, fudge pieces, caramel. It doesnt get better than this! No improvement needed. Can be a bit pricey, but if you want the best , you pay more. Im very satisfied with this ice cream !!!
Highly Recommend

It's in my fridge right now! I love this flavor! The waffle cone is just the right amount of crunch to the smooth creamy vanilla. I am a repeat consumer and highly recommend this flavor when you're watching and/ or bingeing your favorite tv channels and Netflix.

My go-to Ben and Jerrys! They have the best ice cream, and they always pack it full of amazing ingredients! They are all good, but this one is definitely my favorite. You cant go wrong with fridge covered waffle cone pieces with Carmel drizzle. Seriously the best!

THIS IS MY FAVORITE ICE CREAM OF ALL TIME! Ben and Jerry's went crazy this falvor, and I love it. The mix of caramel, waffle cone, and vanilla is superb, and if you do anything next to the grocery store, you have to pick this up. I swear it will change your life.

This is one of my most favorite flavors when it comes to ice cream! I love that he has pieces of cone broken up in it! How creative is that!? This is the most bought ice cream flavor for me, but this is mostly because its only a few servings! Thats okay though!

There will never be a bad time for ice cream. I LOVE Ben & Jerrys. Not only does the company actually stand for some pretty great things, theyre flavors are unbeatable!! Americone Dream is my favorite with crunchy little waffle cone pieces, chocolate, caramel!!

This is so so good, but it's also so so expensive. The containers are so small that you split this between 2 people and you are done in one sitting. I do really love the different flavors swirling together in this one but I save Ben and Jerry's for emergencies.

This brand is for certain my favorite brand. It is consistently good. This flavor is the best. Someone put me on it when I was in college and ever since I have been hooked. I also love how it is widely available. The names are pretty unique and I love that too.

column4: Delicious, but too much caramel sauce.
column5: I love this flavor, however, the ones I have purchased in the last year had far too much caramel. It is not just swirls, but globs, which makes it all too sweet. The rest of the ice cream, especially the chocolate cover cone pieces, is great and well balanced.

Ice cream is one of my favorite desserts and Ben and Jerry’s never lets me down. I’m not much of a vanilla person so all the bits and pieces and drizzles throughout the ice cream is great. It tastes delicious and there’s enough that it lasts me a few days too!

We call this our honeymoon ice cream because it was what was being sampled during the factory tour we went on on our honeymoon. I’ve purchased a pint a month since then. The chocolate cone pieces seemed so weird at first but the flavors blend so perfectly.

Listen, my apartment is a Ben & Jerry's apartment. If I'm going for ice cream, my first grab is always B&J. Americone Dream, Chubby Hubby, Tonight Dough, Half-Baked. The list goes on. There's usually a pint in my freezer. What's not to love about it?

The best flavor, hands down. Forever.
Ben and Jerry's is my #1 ice. It tastes super clean but never bland. I like the natural ingredient lists and the variety of flavors. Plus its just creamier and better than every other ice cream out there, hands down.

as with most ben and jerrys products this is a masterful combination of texture flavor and scent. the smooth creaminess added with the crunch of the shells and the sweet smell of caramel give this flavor its sheer amazingness. definitely a favorite flavor

By far the best ice cream I have ever eaten! I have quite a sweet tooth so trust me when I say that this stuff is good! The caramel is in every bite of vanilla ice cream. The chocolate waffle cone is light and delightful! Please never discontinue this!!

I love this icecream it's the best. It's very delicious and you won't be disappointed at all with the flavor. This delicious icecream are the best compared to any others. I'm a repeat consumer. I love it. I would definitely recommend this to everybody.

My favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor! It has everything - cone, caramel, cookie dough. So good. Same price tag as all Ben & Jerrys but delicious enough to splurge. Also, as a person with a nut allergy there is no warning or may contain, which is relieving!

I thought it was jimmy Fallon on the pint wanting to get the tonight dough. I was so upset when I got home. So I attempted to enjoy it. It’s not tasty at all. It’s salty, and crunchy & not what I want my ice cream to be.

My wife brought me this one home to my disappointment as it really did not appeal to me. I thought it would not have any strong flavor, but I am glad I was wrong! Great mix-ins through out, a nice caramel taste and chewy bits of cone. Would buy again!

I really enjoy Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream varieties but do not often purchase them because of the high price tag. One of my favorites from Ben & Jerry's is Stephen Colbert's Americone Dream. I love the crunchy wafflecone bits mixed with all the goodness.

THE BEST ICE CREAM OUT THERE!!!! I love the chocolate covered wafers that give it an extra crunch and they go so well with the Carmel drizzle and vanilla ice cream. I buy this over and over again every time I have an ice cream craving, 10/10 recommend

Favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor of all time. I love the crunchy cone pieces, the super sweet caramel, and the luscious ice cream. This flavor never lasts in my freezer a pint is basically a single serving. I highly recommend everyone try this flavor.

I really enjoyed this ice cream. The ice cream itself was super smooth and didn't do that weird thing where it gets crystally when you put it back in the freezer. Plus it satisfied my craving for something crunchy thanks to the ice cream cone pieces!

This is my favorite icecream and icecream brand ever. I love how they dont just sell chocolate or vanilla but these creative ones instead. The only thing i wish they did was sell bigger sizes. Its expensive for how small it is but totally worth it.

I really wanted to love this ice cream. Maybe its the hype? But I kind of had higher expectations. It was good, dont get me wrong!! I liked the sweet and the crunch and the chocolate... but Idk. Wouldnt call it my favorite of all time or anything.

Yes, 3 stars. I would have gave it 4 or 5 stars, but tonight dough raised the bar to high. After trying the amazing mix of flavors in tonight dough, no other flavor will be able to match the quality or complexity that I know expect from ice cream.

B and j always wins in my book. Nothing is better than blue Bell but this always takes the cake. I love this brand so much and their ice cream is loaded! Better than any alternatives out there. Nothing taste like b&j. Super satisfied with this!!

Okay, i usually do not like vanilla or caramel, but this ice cream laughs at me. The waffle cone bits are worth it all. If thats all you get it for, its worth it. They are chocolatey, crunchy and the ice cream just goes so perfectly with it.

This flavors has become one my of new favorite as my flavor of choice seems to ALWAYS be sold out. Its got a great mix of flavors that come together for a delicious taste. I generally only buy when the product is on sale as it is expensive.

I love this ice cream!! I prefer vanilla-based ice cream over chocolate, and this is my favorite B&J ice cream flavor. With waffle cone pieces and a chocolate swirl, this sweet treat is a rewarding dessert that will tickle your tastebuds.

Ben and Jerrys is your best friend when you are just chilling watching Netflix and eating ice cream after your boyfriend had just broke up with you it is such a comfort food we love ice cream and Ben & Jerry’s is so amazing very satisfied

I really enjoyed this flavor of ice cream. I really really love the pieces of waffle cone inside of the ice cream, it adds a very nice crunch. I really enjoyed the combination of the flavors together it isnt too overwhelming and is great.

One of my favorite flavors by Ben & Jerrys! I loveeee the chocolate waffle cone!! Im drooling thinking about it. Im pregnant and Im surprised I havent gotten a pint yet! Definitely going to after being reminded! Its so good, trust me!

This is one of my favorite flavors, I dont get it often. Partially because I cant find it and also because I dont tolerate dairy well. It is pricey as its Ben& Jerry but its also has all of the yummy flavors I remember from childhood!

Ben and Jerrys is the best ice cream! The Americone dream flavor is one of my favs because it has everything you could ever want in an ice cream right there in the pint. Its not too overbearing it has just enough of everything in it

By far my favorite ice cream by Ben & Jerry's!! This is such a great, never done before flavor that is provides that classic taste of a chocolate dipped cone. If you're debating which flavor to buy, you can't go wrong with this one.

I very rarely Eat ice cream because Im lactose intolerant. But every now and then I crave it. I tried this once on a whim, and fell in love. I havent been able to find it recently which is a bummer. I also love how they support BLM.

My very favorite ice cream flavor! It is incredible including caramel ribbons, chunks of sugar cone, chocolate chips all mixed into vanilla. I only wish that it was slightly more affordable. I would eat it way more often if it was!

I love this Icecream! I love the fact that they have actual pieces of cone in the Icecream. I think its a little on the expensive side. I only buy that brand when they are on sale. Thats really the only negative thing I had to say.

I was not a fan of this particular flavor they have. The waffle cone pieces were stale, and it wasnt that great of a flavor. I didnt even finish my pint. I love a lot of other flavors they have, but this one I would not buy again.

This has to be my favorite flavor! Ive probably have brought more than 10 pints. This is the best ice cream created. It has vanilla, caramel, and waffle cone. Its just amazing! Please do yourself a favor and run to the store now!

I love this flavor, the bits of cone add the perfect texture and the overall combo of flavors is great. I appreciate the support the company gives too, so it makes the ice cream all the sweeter. Plus Stephen Colbert is hilarious.

This is one of my favorite flavors! It's vanilla ice cream with waffle cone pieces and fudge. It's very delicious! If you have not tried Ben & Jerry's then I highly recommend you do so. One of the best ice cream brands out there!

When I’m feeling ice cream, I splurge on Ben and Jerry’s! It’s really rich and creamy and has great flavor! Lots of sugar tho so be careful and don’t eat it all the time. This flavor is definitely my favorite, you should try it!

Im a person who likes a lot of goodies in their ice cream. This flavor was a little bland for my personal taste and didnt seem to have as many fix-ins as other varieties do. It was an ok option but I would not purchase again.

My favorite ice cream of all time. This is the perfect combination of ice cream, swirls and chunks. But dont bother with the [product:ben-&-jerrys-americone-dream-pint-slices-ice-cream-9-ct] they are extremely disappointing.

I love me some Americone Dream. The perfect treat at the end of the day. The crunchy waffle cone pieces inside are my favorite because they add a nice crunch to go along with the creamy ice cream and delicious caramel swirl!

I like the flavor and all the different kind of ice cream that Ben and Jerry’s have! The price is a little high but I would pay for it for having a good ice cream. I would buy it again and I recommend it to my friends always

Literally the best ice cream ever. All the best ingredients. In my fantasy world half the Carmel would be replaced with pretzels but it’s perfect as is too. My stores don’t gave it enough but that’s ok. It’s a scarce luxury

Best of is in this concoction of yummy! This is my go to and not only because I love Stephen Colbert but part of the proceeds go to charity. The mix of the cone in the ice cream with the chocolate just all around perfect

THIS IS MY FAVORITE FLAVOR OF ICE CREAM! It is not over pricy and is usually at all the stores that sell Ben and Jerrys. Though by the time I get to grab it there is usually only one or two left so it is clearly a winner!

Literally my most favorite ice cream ever! It definitely is a splurge treat, but worth every calorie! The crunchy cones covered in chocolate is what my dreams are made of! Will buy this ice cream for the rest of my life!

Crunchy, . Creamy, . Sweet, . Salty, . This is my perfect ice cream flavor. It has everything youll want. The chocolatey waffle cone pieces add the perfect crunch and the caramel swirl adds the perfect salty sweetness!

I like the Americone cream flavor a lot because it has really delicious cone pieces in the ice cream. I also like that Ben and Jerrys takes the time to collaborate with people to create custom flavors, its a cute idea!

Americone Dream is one of my favorite flavors from the Ben & Jerry’s store. I love that they sell it in pint sizes now! Although it can be a little more expensive than other ice creams, I think it’s worth the splurge.

Ben and Jerrys its my number one brand of ice cream! But AMERICONE DREAM ITS THE BEEEEEESSSSSTTT without any doubts! My goodness, its the best, I just cant stop thinking about it haha. Everyone should try this flavor

This is my absolute favorite pint of ice cream out there. Its a bit pricey, about $4.00 where I am, I love the waffle cone pieces dipped in chocolate in here! Delicious, makes me want a Ben and Jerrys store close by!

Absolutely delicious!!
This is my favorite Ben and jerry available on fresh. A chunk of goodness and every bite you take.. I wish I would have never tried it .. its too hard to put the spoon down :( just love it ..

These little tubs of ice cream are perfect. I love hot great all the ingredients taste and how soft and smooth the ice cream is. I wish they sold this in a bigger size but other than that, this ice cream is amazing

I honestly love this and use it everyday! Highly recommend this to anyone and everyone me or female. I use it practically every single day. I love this brand too, I would choose this over any other brand as well.

This is amazing. I love it. I can not say enough great things about this product. It is definitely worth the money. If you have the chance to experience this product, be sure you do so because you wont regret it.

Craving some Ben and Jerry's I made a stop to pick up a pint looking for something chocolatey. Saw this flavor and thought I'd give it a shot, and DANG!!!! was it good! Love the fudge covered waffle cone pieces.

The combo of the smooth caramel swirls and the bits of waffle cone makes this flavor one of the best. Little pricey but definitely worth the buy. You will not be disappointed in the deliciousness of this flavor

This was the first flavor of Ben & Jerrys ice cream I ever tried. Ive always heard great things about their ice cream so I decided to give it a try. I absolutely loved it! Can be found at most grocery stores.

I tend to like a little crunch in my ice cream. This is great because it isnt overwhelming, but gives some caramel, and the crunch of waffle cone pieces. Its like ice cream in a cone without all of the hassle.

I’ve bought this every chance I’ve had and it never disappoints. The perfect combination of caramel, crunch and vanilla is amazing. Thank you for creating this wonderful ice cream it has made my life complete

I think this is my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerrys. I love the bit of crunch from the cone, and the fact that it is not too chocolatey. Its always delicious and never a disappointing flavor! Will buy again.

One of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor! Not too sweet and the waffle pieces in there add a nice texture to the ice cream. Some ice creams have too much caramel or not enough but this is very well balanced!

Ben & Jerry’s has great flavors. I especially like this one because you don’t need to scoop it onto a cone, there are bits of cone in it already!! A bit expensive, but I get it on sale at CVS or Stop & Shop.

This is my favorite. The only thing that makes it better is when I add my own slices of banana to it (I really like banana and icecream); but it's fantastic the way it is. My FAVORITE Ben and Jerry's flavor.

This is just a great product I really recommend it to all of y’all out there. Because it has a good bang for its buck and it also works very very well! It rlly works with anything. This is my great review.

This is hands down my favorite flavor of ice cream. I love the chocolate dipped cone pieces and the smooth texture of the ice cream itself. Its just absolutely delicious and I would definitely recommend it.

My absolute favorite ice cream of all time. I love the cone pieces in this ice cream as they maintain texture without being too hard resulting in a great mouth feel. I will be sad if this ever gets retired.

Whats not to love? B & J have the best flavor combinations and the chunks of goodness are always generous sized. I have not met a flavor I did not enjoy. I am definitely a repeat customer. Highly recommend.

Probably one of the best ice cream flavored Ive ever had. Plus it has Steven Colbert on it which is a nice touch the flavor is immaculate, nothing Id ever change. Sometimes pricey but absolutely worth it!

Ben & Jerrys is so good and super creamy. The balance of caramel and the fudge pieces in this flavor are so perfect. Ben & Jerrys is a little on the pricey side, but never enough to keep me from buying it.

This ice cream is to die for. It is simply delicious my whole family is addicted to this Ben & Jerrys ice cream it has the perfect amount of chocolate and the perfect amount of sweetness I am recommending

Who am I kidding, I like pretty much every flavor of B&J ice cream! Not only do they make a great product, theyre a good company- and I like to support the good ones! Look out for Bogo sales and stock up.

This has been a favorite of mine for quite sometime. Such a brilliant combination. I love a cone in my ice cream so this is a dream. Ben & Jerrys is more than some brands but worth it! I highly recommend.

The only ice cream I every get when Im craving some. It is sweet but its not overpowering like some other flavors and there arent a horrific amount of fillings. 11/10 ice cream with 20/10 political humor

Love the cone pieces in this ice cream and the flavor is really good I find myself eating the whole carton which is dangerous but Ben and Jerry’s is always amazing and never a let down love this so much

A tasty treat! Not my favorite ice cream but a decent one to try. Plus Colbert! And chocolate! Best eaten straight out of the container with a spoon. Grab a pint, grab a best friend, and grab 2 spoons.
So delicious I absolutely love this flavor of Ben & Jerrys Americone dream ice cream. The only improvement this product needs to put it in a larger container, And make it a little bit more affordable
I love this product. Its the perfect combo of ingredients. The product is a bit pricey for the size you get but its definitely worth it. My boyfriend got me addicted to this. Id keep buying it again.
I love this flavor! As an ice cream enthusiast, yes I named myself that, I would eat mostly any flavor, but when it comes to splurging for the very best, I scourage the shelves for Americone Dream!!
I love Ben and Jerrys so much! This is a great flavor. I love the chocolate covered waffle cones. It adds a really nice crunch and texture thats different from any other flavor or brand Ive tried.
If you are a fan of ice cream in a waffle cone, you will love this. The chocolate covered waffle cone pieces are SO good. This ice cream is Pricier than some other brands but i would recommend it!
My favorite flavor of Ben & Jerrys. It has everything in it that I love. It has waffle pieces and caramel and fudge. I love the taste of theyre ice cream. Its a product I love to treat myself to.
Love Ben & Jerrys! The only downfall is the price. It’s pretty expensive for the little amount you get. The ice cream is really good tho! I definitely splurge every now and then on the good stuff!
I am someone who does not care for desserts which are too chocolatey rich. Americone Dream is a perfect flavor balance for me. Sweet vanilla and caramel with just enough chocolate crunchy cone.
A great find. If you love caramel and chocolate I HIGHLY recommend this flavor. You can't go wrong. It is sweet and crunchy and just everything great about ice cream. I always buy Ben and jerrys
My husband loves this flavor. Its my second favorite after phish food. So yummy. Vanilla ice cream is so classic. Mix it with caramel, fudge, and waffle cone piece and you are almost in heaven!
I have been a Been & Jerry fan for years. I even have their ice cream recipe book. The caramel is so buttery and delicious. The bits of chocolate covered waffle cone are the perfect addition!
This flavor gets the job done if youre wanting an ice cream cone without having to eat an actual ice cream cone. It is just a little too sweet for my liking (similar to how sugar free tastes).
This is my favorite flavor from Ben and Jerry! It taste amazing and definitely worth it. However because of the brand, a small pint is about $5 which is a bit expensive for such a small size.
Vanilla ice cream. Chocolate covered waffle cone pieces. Caramel. Perfect ice cream for people that don't like super sweet foods and they put a decent amount of pieces and caramel into them!
Rich and creamy! Quality ingredients! Affordable and the perfect size for a few snacks during the week. All the little additions to this ice cream are delicious! I love Ben and Jerrys!
This is definitely not a "healthy" treat, but it is worth every calorie when I've had a bad day and need a pick-me-up. If you get a chance to try this flavor, go for it. Treat yourself!!
Delicious!! Sweet vanilla ice cream with chocolate covered waffle cone bits?? Whats not to love. It was super tasty and is a great flavor for people who do not prefer chocolate ice creams
The only way you can go wrong with BJs is if youre lactose intolerant- Other than that your stuff is the best so delicious so many wonderful ingredients put inside these packages of yummy
One of my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavors. I love ice cream with lots of texture and the crunchy bits in this are so delicious and add a lot of variety to it. Definitely buying this again.
This is my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry's. It doesn't hurt that I also enjoy Steven's shows. I buy it at the store when it goes on sale usually. I love the waffle cone pieces the best!
One of my favorite ice creams. The flavor combos sound weird, but it all works together. The saltiness from the caramel works with the crunchiness of the waffle cone bits. Delicious!
This was a festive surprise flavor choice. The ice cream tastes good, its sweet and the cone is soft rather than crunchy but tasty if youre stuck at home craving a tasty, sweet cone!
Ben and Jerrys are definitely one of the top ice cream makers out there. Nothing like going to the frozen isle in the grocery store and grabbing a pint of Ben and Jerrys. Delicious.
I love the waffle cone pieces in it and the ice cream is creamy. The flavor of this is yummy with everything it has in it. This is my go to for when I want good ice cream at home.
I like this ice cream! Im just not much of a vanilla person. The mix ins are tasty though. Not sure if I would buy again but if its in front of me Id definitely eat it all haha
I love Americone Dream! It's perfect because I love icecream cones but who likes to buy cones?? And on a hot day you can put have a sweet cone and it wont drip on your hands.
I found this ice cream at Walmart during the Summer of 2019. Its got the perfect blend of crunch from the cone pieces and the ice cream tastes so good. One of my favorites.
My favorite flavor! Lots of goodies in it: waffle cone pieces, nuts, caramel, chocolate syrup... so good! Truly a dream! Give me a spoon and a good movie and Im in heaven!
All time FAVORITE ben and jerry’s flavor! I pick it almost every time I have ben and jerry’s because you just can’t go wrong. The pieces of waffle cone totally make it.
Americone Dream is my guilty pleasure! It has caramel and ice cream cone pieces, so delicious. Plus, Stephen Colbert is hilarious and I really enjoy watching his shows.
My absolute favorite of all of Ben and Jerry's flavors. When the Colbert Report ended I was really upset bevause I thought they would end up getting rid of the flavor.
I love this flavor!! It hits ask the right points...except, of course, if you want anything other than high calorie!! It's just what you get for something like this.
This ice cream does not taste good. My son tasted it and he had to spit it out.
Possibly my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor next to the Ron Burgundy Scotch Scout Scotch. I love the bites of waffle cone mixed in that gives it a wee bit of texture.
This is my goto flavor. For a reward. For antidepressant. For anti-road rage. For "shucks that didn't work". For "ok where did i park the car, dag nabit i took uber"
ben and jerrys is my FAVORITE ice cream brand! they have the best flavors and so many to choose from! the ice cream is a bit expensive but totally worth the price!
I really like this flavor. All of the fun of a cone without a cone? I can buy one pint and enjoy a Drunstick without having to actually buy a box of 6 drumsticks.
probably my favorite ben & jerrys flavor, it has a variety of toppings in it and i like that. i wish it came in smaller servings, kind of like how hagen dazs has.
I dont remember much about this ice cream other than I loved it, then couldnt find it, then was told by my doctor to watch my carbs. Sad time for me all around.
Hands down my favorite ice cream flavor. Vanilla ice cream with fudge covered waffle cone pieces and Carmel. How can you say no to this flavor? Creamy and yummy
Something about the combination of the caramel and the pieces of ice cream cone makes the perfect combo! The ice cream bar variety of this is fantastic as well.
The crunchy pieces of cone in this flavor are so good! They really add to the flavor and I wasnt expecting it. Tastes just like an ice cream cone with caramel.

I love the waffle cone pieces in there, wish there were more!
It has just a right balance of sweetness.. couldnt get enough found myself wanting to eat more.
I love this flavor- and Im not even an ice cream cone person! In this context, it just works. Vanilla ice cream with fudge, caramel, and ice cream cone chunks
This is my absolute favorite flavor of Ben & Jerrys! The chocolate waffle cone pieces, caramel and ice cream are just so perfect together. Highly recommend!
My absolute favorite ben and Jerry's ice cream ever!! It tastes so good and I LOVE that it has crunchy pieces of waffle cone in it!! The texture is amazing.
This is one of the best ice creams I eat. In between on price affordable and pricey! No improvement! Maybe make tubs of them. Doesnt compare to any others!!
It's ok, I've had better but overall I'd try it again just to make sure I have the same opinion of it. I like the combination of ingredients that are in it
Great ice cream, nice base good add ins would be improved by more waffle cones and caramel swirl. Personally dont love plain vanilla so add ins are a must!
This tastes amazing! The flavor is on point my main love for B&J is the range of flavors and the ice cream is loaded with different toppings which I love.
Husbands favorite. Tastes good. Not too sweet and doesnt get old fast. Only buy in special occasions though bc its so expensive I cannot otherwise justify
Yall are sleeping on this flavor if you havent tried it yet. Vanilla ice cream with fudge covered waffle cone pieces and a caramel swirl. Thank me later.
Love Ben & Jerry ice cream, & I love in Vermont so its cheap out this way! Also you can tour where they make the ice cream & it smell so good in there!!!
This is my current favorite. It hits all the points I want in an ice cream. The waffle cone is the best part. I will always grab this is it's available.

My favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor!
Vanilla, pieces of ice cream cone and caramel! Not overly sweet & the pieces of cone give the perfect blend of texture

column4: Best Ice Cream in the WORLD!
column5: If you have never eaten this ice cream and you love toppings - you are missing out. It is the perfect blend of ice cream, chocolate crunch and caramel.
My all time favorite flavor from Ben and Jerrys. The waffle cone was always my favorite part so its nice to have this to take home and eat when I want!
The best tasting ice cream!!! Love some Ben and Jerrys!!! Definitely not for someone who is counting cals or sugars. Great deal when b1g1 at Publix!
Love this newer flavor! The waffle cone pieces make the perfect crunch. Had this while at the factory in Vermont and has been my new favorite flavor.
One of my favorite ice cream flavors of all time! It’s a great one to pick up at 7-11 for a treat and is the perfect amount of chocolatey and sweet.
This is my FAVORITE ice cream ever. I can literally eat this EVERYDAY. It delicious, I found out about it on YouTube and been eating it ever since.
This is my FAVORITE ice cream. I love the cone pieces throughout because it adds some extra texture (plus the cone is the best part in my opinion)!
Great flavors and texture. I love the mix of crunchy cone pieces in the ice cream as well. Plus you can get it in the handheld bar options as well!
Ben and Jerry's has the best pint ice cream hands down. I absolutely love this flavor when I want some crunch to go with my sweet this is a go to.
Americone Dream has all the best stuff: caramel swirl and chocolate covered waffle cone. This is my go to ice cream flavor, I get it all the time!
My Favorite flavor, the most mix ins of any brand and the best quality ice cream. A litttle pricey but well worth the price for this deliciousness
Is definitely a really good concoction of things in this ice cream so youre in for a surprise with basically every bite! I definitely recommend it
This favor is sooooo delicious! You can only find this flavor at certain grocery store and even the actual Ben and Jerry store. Highly recommend!
My Absolutly favorite pricey expensive treat but very worth it. My favorite is half baked and its like heaven in my mouth and it personal serving
Oh my God its the best I know a lot of calories just dont read the label its my favorite I live to feel the pieces of cones on the the ice cream
This ice cream flavor is perfectly delicious without being too sweet or going overboard. Please don’t ever mess with this level of perfection!!
Aside from loving this pun, the ice cream is awesome. I love the mix of creamy and crunchy bits. The bits of waffle cone are my favorite part
This is the flavor I reach for EVERY single time I want Ben & Jerrys. My friend introduced me to it and I havent picked a different flavor yet.
Americone Dream is hands down my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. My only complaint would be that it is sometimes difficult to find in my area.
From vanilla ice cream to chocolate covered chocolate waffle cones, this ice cream is a home run. Its a balance of sweet, savory and crunchy!
I love Colbert, and the "Americone Dream" flavor bearing his photo is outstanding! Just the right about of sweet with a little bit of crunch.
This is so good. My favorite. Its the vanilla fudge ripple with small bits of waffle cone mixed in. Nothing like Netflix and Ben and Jerrys.
I really really love this flavor. Its delicious and the chocolately pieces of cone in there is just perfect, adds some crunch and I love it.
Wow Ben and Jerry got this one on point! The perfect amount of carmel, and crispy sugar cone dipped in fudge! This one is hard to put down!
Not every ice cream needs a lot going on. This is the perfect example. Lots of delicious caramel swirl and waffle cone pieces are awesome.
Who doesn't want waffle cone in their ice cream? Tastes just like the waffle cone filled with ice cream, only WITHOUT the mess! Win! Win!
I love Ben and Jerrys ice cream so much and this is definitely my number one go to flavor. It is the perfect mix of crunch and sweetness.
This flavor is my go to!! Its so good and makes you just wanna keep eating! Ben&Jerrys is a little pricey but the flavor makes up for it!
I love Been & Jerry's ice cream. This flavor is good, but it does not compare to the Kaberry Kaboom ice cream that had pop rocks in it.
This ice cream is one of my favorite Ben and Jerry flavors! So crunchy with the cone pieces and so yummy! Great if you love ice cream!
I love these! There is so much personality and depth in the flavoring! I really enjoy eating these and I always feel satisfied after!
Im not a big ice cream person but when Im craving some I always choose this flavor! Its so good and the pieces of cone are soooo good
This is one of my go to choices for Ben and Jerrys. I love the chocolate dipped cone chunks. I wish I had a pint right now honestly.
This is my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerrys ice cream. Everything inside blends so well together and makes such a delicious flavor!
I love using this product! It taste really well and it is very affordable! I have purchased this and used it with my whole family !
Life this is life lol creamy and paked with flavors and textures. No matter what you enjoy there is a flavor mix for you. So yummy.
This was way better than I thought it would taste. It was kinda expensive but I would definitely buy it again 10/10 hella recommend
This is my boyfriend and I's favorite Ben and Jerrys to grab. The combination isnt too over powering and its perfect for cravings.
I love Ben and Jerry's! It's a great brand and I love their mission. Their ice cream flavor names are great and enjoyable to have.
Its my all the time favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. It has the perfect balance of flavor and hits the spot when you need ice cream
I love the combination of flavors - enough chocolate to satisfy a craving, but lighter and more interesting than plain chocolate.
If my husband and I want a snack on cheat day, this is our at home go to! Its simple yet amazing, and its hard to stop eating it!
Yummy yummy yummy. Ben & Jerrys is my favorite ice cream of all time. Tastes great and is filled with so much chunks of goodness.
This ice cream is my second favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor at first I didnt want to like this but it ended up being a great choice.
Ben & Jerrys Americone Cream ice cream is amazing its a vanilla base ice cream with a bit of chocolate covered waffle cone in it
all ben and jerry's flavors are great but this is one of my favorites. I usually splurge on it when it is on sale at the store.
This is a pretty good flavor. I like the Carmel and pieces of waffle cone. Maybe chunks of brownies or something would be good.
This is definitely one of my favorite flavors of Ben & Jerry's ice cream. I've had it several times now & I love it every time.
My absolute flavor with the yummy cone and caramel ! Its not super sweet and over powering , its so good to satisfy any craving
This is my second favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor! I love the waffle cone pieces inside. The mixture of flavors is just amazing
Flavorful explosion in your mouth. I really love it. It is delicious and I would recommend this to people who love ice cream.
this ice cream is so good but so bad for you, i wish they made lower calorie ben and jerrys! i guess halo top will have to do!
this one is so rich and delicious! definitely my go to! its a bit sweet so its one of the ice creams i would definitely ration
Yum! What ice cream isn't good from their brand? They taste delicious! Perfect size! The name is nice. Always a nice treat.
This is my favorite flavor! I can't stop eating once I start, which is bad for my waistline but great for my tastebuds. Yum!
i swear this is the best ice cream i ever had. its soo good it has caramel, waffle cone pieces that are covered in chocolate
Not as good as Haagen Dazs caramel cone. There isnt too much flavor and its mostly just vanilla ice cream with some chunks.
My favorite flavor of Ben & Jerrys. It has the perfect amount of everything. So hard to not finish the pint in one sitting.
The flavor is honestly just eh for me, but the fact that they come in individual serving size cups is super helpful & wise.
Ben and Jerrys has the best ice cream and flavors , the texture is amazing and the prove is affordable gives a good amount.
I didn’t expect this to be so good. The flavour and the price for it is worth the try because I know I’m buying this again
My favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor! I love the combination of caramel and chocolate. I can eat the whole pint in one sitting.
delicious!!! creamy and easy to scoop! always have some in my freezer!! also great with the hard shell chocolate topping!
This is so delicious it's addicting. I can't get enough. You start eating and before you know it the pint is gone !!!!!!!
I loved ben and jerry soooo much! I am now keto so I cant have it but it is one of the best brands of icecream out there!
AmeriCone Dream is LIFE! I LOVE when I find this on sale. Gift to a friend who loves I've cream and has never tried it
this is my favorite ice cream of all time. everything about it is so amazing. the chocolate cones in it make it so good
I bought this flavor a day that Chunky Monkey was sold out. Although Americone Dream was not bad, it isnt my favorite.
My favorite flavor, it has waffle cones in it so it gives a little crunch to it. The best mixture of all my favorites.
Every time I go to a scoop shop or the Vermont factory I get myself a big helping of Americone Dream. IT IS THE BEST.
I love the mix of bits of sugar cones in the ice cream. Its a good balance of having both ice cream and cone in a cup
I love this ice cream! The cone pieces add a nice crunch and the ice cream is tasty without having too much going on.
My choice of ice cream! I love all of the different that are mixed in and the stripes of caramel make it even better!
Its amazing how crunchy the cones stay in the ice cream and dont get soggy! Great blend of flavors here. Addicting!
This is my favorite ice cream. I stumbled across it one day with a friend and rarely get a different B and J flavor
I love this ice cream sooooo much! Its honestly the best. The chocante waffle cone is def the best part of it all!
Ben and Jerrys always has the most unique flavors and names for their ice cream. I recommend this slices as well.
Americone Dream is God's gift to man. It is by far my favorite flavor even though sometimes it is hard to choose.
This product is great for snacking. It is very delicious and it is my favourite.I would definitely buy this again
I Love Steven Colbert and i love Ben and Jerry's icecream. This icecream is the best so far !! So Delicious!!!
This is my all time fav ice cream. Love the ice cream cone bits in them! Fixes a sweet tooth anytime! Recommend!
So good. Such a great idea with flavors that really stand out. The cone bits crunch but also melt in your mouth.
This one is by far my current favorite. The best part about it is the added pieces of waffle cone. Its delish.
There just great and every knows it!! You can never go wrong to testing your self to a pint of Ben and Jerry’s
Americone Dream is such an amazing flavor - one of my absolute faves from B&J. Have bought this so many times
Could eat this all day long, my favorite part was the waffle cone pieces, it was the perfect afternoon snack.
I love this company and their ice cream. Always down to support Ben and Jerrys and eat some delish ice cream!
This is my favorite ice cream of all time! Thank you Stephen Colbert perfect blend of all of these flavors
Who doesnt love an ice cream with all the stuff! This one is delicious but really isnt all ice cream yummy?
Ben and Jerrys has some of the best ice cream Ive had but its soo expensive for a pint for whatever reason.
This flavor of Ben & Jerrys cannot be beat. I love the chocolate flavored waffle cone pieces. So so tasty!!
So freaking good. I love how the cone pieces dont get soggy or gross even though theyve been in ice cream!
This ice cream is my favorite ever. I love it!! It is my dessert after Dinner. It makes me crazy seriously
A unique and well-balanced combination of flavors. Quite good, really! I am pleased that I gave it a shot.
Oh my gosh. Best ice cream out there the little chunks of cone really make this ice cream worth the money
Love Ben and Jerrys ! One of my favs -ice cream is my weakness and this brand and flavor one of my go tos
My favorite ice Cream on earth. I love waffle cone and the mix of ice cream makes this the perfect blend.

column4: Fudge covered waffle cones and fudge?!! Yum!
column5: Most delicious ice cream I've ever eaten. All ingredients are well distributed throughout the ice cream.
My favorite ice cream ever! Has a lot of stuffs in it and i miss eating it alot. Too sweet but worth it
I love finding this in the freezer just sitting there waiting for me to eat it. I RECOMMEND IT TO YOU!!
I love the combination of caramel, chocolate, crunch, and vanilla ice cream. One of my favorite flavors
One of my absolute favorite ice creams! I am very picky on my ice cream and this satisfies me so much!
My favorite ice cream flavor!! So yummy! I always get this flavor when Im choosing an ice cream flavor
This is so yummy. It doesnt have a lot to it like some Ben & Jerrys flavors but it taste really good
Iconic flavor iconic man this is my fave ben and Jerrys flavor and so yummy!! Always worth the money
Tried this on a whim and Im really glad I did. I actually loved the little cone pieces. Super yummy!
I felt the freedom in each bite. Seeing Colbert's beautiful face on the front made it even better!!
My favorite ice cream by far! So good and a lighter flavor, the waffle cone pieces are my favorite.
So delicious. Has little cone pieces and chocolate throughout. Reminds you of the drumstick cones
My favorite flavor. Plus, Im s huge fan of Stephen Colbert. Glad he has an ice cream to match him.
My husband favorite . So good and a classic for@all year round . Great for a great flavored go to
Plenty of mix ins with each bite. Really nice crunchy bits that dont get soggy in the ice cream.
I’m absolutely addicted to this and the waffle cone inside with the caramel too makes it amazing
I really love it, because it is very accessible and it is really delicious , and it is very good
everything about this flavor is fantastic, if ben and jerry's gets rid of it i'll literally cry
This flavor is pretty good, definitely a little bland compared to other flavors but still tasty
This ones really good!! I went on a whim to try it and I really liked it. The chunks were good!
This is one of my favorite flavors. Anything involving waffle cones is my jam. Great ice cream.
This is definitely one of my favorites! I bought as pint slices, but 1 slice isn't enough. LOL
So bomb. I love this flavor. I love the pieces of waffle cone dipped in chocolate in this one
Another good one. I love the waffle cone pieces. This one is a favorite of another daughters.
Not my favorite, ice cream is good but the waffle pieces loose their crunch and can be soggy
This ice cream is delicious! It has a good texture from the cone bits and has caramel in it.
Wish this was sold at the grocery store closest to me. One of my favorite flavors for sure!
Americone is so delicious. I love the pieces of cone in the ice cream. The taste is amazing
Love the creativeness of this flavor. The chucks are always the best scoops. So much flavor
#1 flavoring in my opinion. The waffle cone chunks are definately the best part honestly.
Probably one of my favorite ice cream flavors from Ben & Jerrys. Its definitely a classic!
Love love love this classic! Im totally a vanilla girl and add some crunch ... Im in love!
Great flavor. Love the chocolate and crunch of the waffle cone. I do think its expensive.
I love ice cream and I love this flavor. I also love Ben and Jerrys. The taste is amazing
This is by far my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry's, always my go to when I get ice cream!
Who doesnt love the chocolate nugget in the bottom of an ice cream cone?!? Irresistible!
BEST FLAVOR OF ICE CREAM. Chocolate covered waffle cone pieces?! Are you joking?! Unreal
IS super yummy. and delish!! I bought this yesterday and I am so happy I did buy it pls
I intake a ridiculous amount of ice cream a week hahah. Ben and jerry never disappoints
Ice cream cone ice cream. Droooool. Ben & Jerry’s is the freaking best. Can’t beat it!
love this product and its amazing quality recommend to everyone honestly - love it :).
This is so delicious and one of the best I have ever tried. I cant have enough of it.
This is my second favorite flavor I really enjoy eating this ice cream its delicious.
What more can I say about Ben & Jerrys that hasnt been said? Grab a pint and enjoy!
This is my favorite go to ice cream!! I LOVE it!! I cant get enough of it!! Yummmmm
This one is my favorite its so good and doesnt last long around my house its perfect
You cant go wrong with any flavor. I can down the pint if im not careful. Sooo good
Its very good and I love this ice cream and its sooooo good and I highly recommend
This is the best. Ben & Jerrys is the best. And if you dont like it, youre wrong.
Would be a million times better with fudge swirl with/instead of the caramel.
I've never been much of an ice cream eater but I crave this one all the time!
There are a lot of great flavors, but in my opinion this is the best.
Yummy! Now can you please make a vegan version...pretty please
It’s so good. Thank you Ben. Thank you Jerry. Thank you!

column4: So good, under rated at 4.5, outrageous.
column5: I would eat it everyday if I could, and sometimes I do.
I really love this flavor. It’s simple but really good
Love this ice cream and adore Colbert!! Really tasty!
This is distinctly inferior to Vanilla Caramel Fudge
My husband and I loved this ice cream! The subtle bourbon flavor with the pecan chunks was superb!
This flavor is amazing! I've only found one store in my area that sells it and I stock up. I've never been a huge pecan ice cream fan before, but I really can't get enough of this one.

Being from southwest Louisiana we love our pecan pie and ice cream. This ice cream has all the flavor of the south. Always heartbreaking when the store is out of their limited stock of it. Please ship it to my house all year long lol
I love this ice cream! The first bite always tastes sweet with a hit of bourbon, then add in the nuts, and the short bread, and you have delicious complexity, with a nice crunch.
I love love love this ice cream! It's got a great balance of flavors and textures, and the hints of bourbon are just right. I would eat this all day, every day, if I could get away with it.
Bourbon Pecan Pie Ice Cream can't get enough. The bourbon makes the ice cream.

Excellent ice cream! Whiskey can sometimes overpower all the ingredients--this ice cream has a great balance of flavor and the whiskey is not to overpowering. Here is the problem--I bought this ice cream in an outlet store in California so I fear that Bourbon Pecan Pie will be in the Ben & Jerry flavor grave yard soon. It was a great flavor while it lasted though.

column4: Disappointing bourbon pecan pie ice cream
column5: I absolutely HATE this ice cream I thought they brought bake SOUTHERN PECAN PIE!!!!
