That's why I bought this bourbon mess it's not even close to being as good as the southern pecan pie ice cream I'm from Dallas Tx I know pecan pie when I taste it this ice cream didn't do it for me I will be returning it way too much Carmel in the ice cream it's self I've had better Ben and jerrys ice cream

column4: One of my top two favorites
column5: This is one of my top two favorite flavors from B&J, and the other is long gone (the late, lamented Wavy Gravy).

I love Brewed to Matter! So thing about the coffee ice cream mixed with brownie batter and chocolate chunks does it for me. Although I am worried with it being a exclusive flavor it may be discontinued. Please keep this in the Ben and Jerry’s line up!

I can see that the inspiration for this flavor came from a fancy coffee drink like a frozen mocha or Frappuccino. However the balance of flavors & textures is off for my taste. There's not enough coffee flavor. The coffee flavor would be improved by using the cold brew method instead of coffee extract. The extract brings an unpleasant aftertaste. The chocolate chunks are too big and dominating. There's not enough brownie swirl and it's not as prominent of "brownie" flavor or texture as in other pints. While this flavor idea is good, I think the execution definitely needs to be adjusted. I still love Ben & Jerry's! I'm just not a fan of this pint.
Okay Ben and Jerry's, you can stop making new flavors. This one is perfect.

My girlfriend isn't a fan of this and I think that she is so wrong in every regard that I am writing this review just out of spite and also because this is the perfect ice cream and deserves all of the stars.

This is by far my favorite flavor, of all time. A decade ago, brownie batter was a flavor that was available as pints and I would get that and eat around the fudge brownie chunks because it was worth it. But this flavor is everything. Please never stop making this flavor! It is the end all be all of flavors. Thank you so much for making this ice cream!!

I bought this flavor one time at Target because it was the closest one to a java chip flavor, and it changed my life. It was so good. I searched up and down for it though and couldn't find it for a few months in any other store, and since then had moved. I just found it tonight in another target location and jumped for joy in the store. My favorite ice cream flavor by far! Wish it came in a bigger size...

I absolutely love this flavor. It is beyond perfect and no other flavor can even begin to compare! Unfortunately, it is an exclusive flavor only sold at Target. I’ll buy 2 or 3 when I find them in stock. I will go out of my way to go to target specifically for this flavor and 4 out of 5 times, they are out of the flavor. And the stock guy told me that there isn’t any on order and none coming with the next delivery. Can anybody please help!

column4: Have never love Ice cream so much
column5: I absolutely love this flavor! I have never loved a flavor as much as brewed to matter. My son loves it as well. As someone mentioned before I can only purchase at 1 store and I ask at all the other stores that are closer to order it. I never have seen it at those stores. But we absolutely LOVE THIS ONE!!!!!

column4: So Have a Pint of Ice Cream and Catch Your Breath
column5: I should heed my own advice because this flavour truly took my breath away. Coffee ice cream is my all-time, hands-down favourite type of ice cream that is reliably available. Coffee ice cream with chocolate syrup to be specific. So this pint? It does it all for me man. It does all of the heavy lifting, it unscrews the jar lids that are on too tight, and it even pumps my gas for me when it's raining out. I didn't even need to think about exerting an iota of effort to get the flavour profile of this pint exactly where I wanted it. Didn't even need to turn location services on. A++

Nothing wrong here! Yummy coffee ice cream base and a great tasting fudge swirl. The chocolate chunks are a good addition. Not my favorite flavor (I mean, how many favorites can someone have?) but definitely yummy and satisfying if you’re craving coffee and fudge flavors!

I really liked this coffee flavor! I have tried a few of the other coffee flavors and this one is probably my favorite! There was plenty of brownie swirl and fudge chunks that paired really well with the coffee ice cream! I would definitely try this flavor again!

I love coffee ice cream and I usually by a store brand one called java chunk that is similar but once I tried brewed to matter I'll never go back. I love everything about it and I hope it never goes away please tell me this is going to stick around!!!!!

So my favorite ice cream flavor has always been coffee. But my favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor has always been chocolate fudge brownie. This ice cream brings favorites together! Please make this a permanent fixture in the Ben and Jerry’s line up!

A wonderful coffee and chocolate ice cream with a nice mix of flavors and textures. We shop at Target sometimes just because that's the only place we can get it. Our favorite B&J flavor since Toffee Heath Bar Crunch went away.
I make up reasons to go to Target to get this ice cream. It is simply perfect. I keep thinking it will get old and I will switch to my other favs. But I just.... never.... do.
A coffee and chocolate lovers dream in ice cream form. Coffee flavor infuses your mouth as decadent chocolate chunks deliver a dessert worthy of all your money! Love it!

let me start by saying that i've literally never written an internet review in my life, but this stuff is so good that here i am, pleading ben & jerry's to never discontinue this flavor... i've been loyal to b&j's for many years but never have i been so loyal to a single pint before. this incredible combo of coffee and brownie batter plagiarized straight from my DANG DREAMS. honestly i should take y'all to court for stealing my heart. brewed to matter 4evr.

This flavor is my go to at my local Target. Recently the past 3 times I bought this flavor there is very little brownie batter and an abundance of fudge chucks. Which is disappointing because the brownie batter is the best part!

This is just a really great flavor! Ben and Jerry’s does the best coffee ice cream base flavors of brand available and this is no exception. The fudge flakes taste great and give a textural contrast to the smooth, creamy ice cream. The brownie-fudge is, of course, delicious and completes a perfect pint. If you like coffee and fudge then take a trip over to Target and grab a pint or 4.

Just found this in my local target, and while I already had 3 other pints in my freezer of other flavors at home, I needed to try this one because it has everything I love in it. Needless to say, it did not disappoint and I can't wait to make another trip to target to get more of this delicious flavor.

As a dedicated Ben and Jerry’s customer and ice cream aficionado, this ice cream flavor ranks above all others; supreme. You must, must, try this!
The balance of coffee and chocolate is unparalleled. I will continue to search high and low in the mid-Atlantic region for this flavor.

column4: The BEST Coffee Flavor Ice Cream EVER!
column5: I've only recently been able to find this flavor in the Midwest. It is the absolute best mixture of coffee and chocolate. I'm a little worried because it seems to be disappearing from there shelves at TARGET w/o being restocked, and I hope this isn't so.

I tried this for the first time last night, and I was pleasantly surprised! The coffee taste and the fudge chunks were especially nice and delicious. I would say that this pint is one of my favorite flavors now! Also, sponsor me pls
Yesss!!! Finally a coffee ice cream with delicious mixins!!! I'm giving it 5 stars bc its the best flavor you've got even though it would be better with cookie dough instead of brownie batter!!
I love love love this new flavor! The coffee is perfect and the brownie batter swirl and fudge chunks really take it up to the next level! I really hope this exclusive flavor is staying!
I think this flavor, which was my all time favorite about 25 years ago, use to be Cappacino Commotion. But I'm not certain. But I do know for sure that this stuff is good!
This is now my favorite ice cream to buy a the grocery! The only thing that would make this better would be chocolate sandwhich cookie crumbles :)
Reminds me of the old Vermonty Python flavor sold years ago. Perfect combination of flavors. Definitely a keeper!
My favorite flavor ever! I tell all my friends & family to try it. I've even eaten it for breakfast.
Perfect balance of coffee and chocolate swirl <3 . Please donot discontinue !
Search no more for thE. Best. Ice. Cream. EVER.
Best coffee flavor from Ben & Jerry. Wish they make more coffee flavors
Very tasty! Add some chopped almonds, and we'd have perfection!
this flavor tops all other ben and jerry flavors no doubt

Welp, I finally broke down and bought this flavor that I've often seen mentioned on the site(wasn't quite in my usual buying locales til recently). And figured since a friend of mine told me how awesome she found this flavor or I think another coffee flavor by B&J's to be really great. I figured I would give it a whirl and try it as a "breakfasty" sort of option for a change. I mean it has coffee in it right? Figured it would perk me up a bit more before work. Add in the chocolate and sugar in general, I figured I would be good to go. But unfortunately I was wrong. The coffee flavor wasn't quite as strong(save for on 2/3's of the top of the pint, to the point of me not being able to tell if the fudge pieces were plain fudge flavor or expresso flavored), even appreciated the thinner fudge pieces. But hardly got any of the brownie swirl flavor until I was a 1/4 of the way done with the pint. Not to mention, after consuming a good half of the pint before work, I would have thought I'd have some get up and go(which I tend to get in general off of coffee flavored ice creams). But I had a good 10 to 15 min bit of pep before I crashed and wanted to nap so hard even before I left the house. So in other words, me thinks this flavor is going to be a no can do for me in the future. And would recommend it to folks that like coffee flavored ice creams you can eat at night and still get a good night's rest afterward.

The cheese cake ice creams could be amazing, but for some reason the one thing wrong with the ice cream is the cheesecake balls. The balls taste very chemical and just not right. Overall I scooped around them. While the carmel flavor really lacked in this ice cream, and the chocolate cookie swirl was very little and almost nonexistent. I am very disappointed with how all of the cheesecake truffles have turned out. Overall, the truffles ruin the ice cream and need to be reformulated. While I am disappointed that this ice cream lacked swirl and Carmel. What could be amazing, was ruined by lack of and truffles.

The flavors work for the most part. Ben & Jerry's ice creams with the graham cracker swirl are my personal favorites but this one left much to be desired. My main problem are the truffles, in this flavor in particular. The truffles seem to be frozen until you bite into them and then it's soft. I can't really enjoy the truffles if I'm too worried about the cold shock to my gums from parts of the ice cream being unexpectedly frozen in random places. I'm used to thinks like strawberries in the cheesecake to be frozen, but then something like the truffles that should be soft like the cookie dough is frozen, I can't really enjoy it.

column4: Like everything but the cheesecake truffles
column5: First of all, let me just say that I love this truffle craze that has been going on and made a point to try every option. For this flavor, I love mostly everything about this: the ice cream, the swirls, the exterior of the truffles. However, I do not like the cheesecake interior of the truffles. The cheesecake flavoring is already there through the ice cream, but the cheesecake part of the truffles does not retain the coldness of the ice cream and doesn't fit. I think a chocolate interior would have probably worked better. Would not buy again unless I felt the desire to eat everything but the truffle.

I feel like this remake of the old cheesecake truffle flavor totally snuck in under the radar--and a shame, because it's such an upgrade! Where the truffles were the downfall of the old version (no offense, Ben & Jerry), the new cheesecake pieces are exactly what I look for in a cheesecake ice cream mix-in. They're not liquidy and greasy like the truffles, but actually have a fluffy chew to them, and they taste great! A couple pieces even had a toasty crust on them. On the downside, the cookie crumble swirls were really thin, but I *almost* didn't even mind, because I came for the cheesecake on this one, and I got it!

I bought this tonight for my mom and I. I couldn’t eat it. It’s some of the worst flavored ice cream I have had. The cookie crumbs do taste like cooking crumbs, gritty and all. The caramel flavor is very light barely there. The cheesecake truffle pieces are terrible. I love cheesecake, I bake wonderful cheesecakes, I hate the no bake style of cheesecake but these truffles are worse than that. They taste like someone took ice milk and mixed a dash a cream cheese in it. I was sorely disappointed. My mom did not enjoy it either. I have not idea what I am going to do with the stuff now but I’m certainly not going to eat it.
Wow this ice cream is so delicious .. I will definitely be buying more

First time trying it yesterday.. a little embarrassed to admit i"m definitely going to buy another as soon as I'm out of work today! So much flavor but not too sweet, the truffles covered in gram crackers have to be my favorite part

See, here is my issue: if I’m going to spend 1200 calories in one sitting on ice cream (and we all eat the whole pint) after working hard to burn enough calories to eat it, I want to melt at the first bite and feel the euphoria with every spoonful, and SO many Ben and Jerry’s flavors do that for me. But when a flavor is just ok, there is no way I’m going to eat it. There was nothing wrong really, with this flavor but I found the ice cream grainy and the flavor boring, and the truffles just didn’t do it for me. I LOVE Ben and Jerry’s, the pints are my favorite ways to spend my calories but I can’t justify eating a boring one. My wife liked it well enough but she wasn’t wowed either. I remember my first bites of Phish Food, Half Baked, one sweet world and so many others that just made me melt into a pool of euphoric joy and that’s what I need from my pints.
Soooooo good! Cookie bits are good! Cheesecake bites are good!
This is the best flavor ben and Jerrys has ever come out with.

column4: The best of the truffle lineup.
column5: Fantastic flavor. The caramel addition to the cheesecake base makes it stand out far more than B&J's other cheesecake flavors. That flavor is made even stronger by the cheesecake truffles. The graham cracker and cookie crumbs complement each other perfectly, and the overall flavor is accurate to the real thing. Thank goodness the best cheesecake flavor is not a limited batch.

I don't know HOW anybody could hate on this icecream, it's the best thing that's ever happened! The cheesecake bits are creamy that literally melt in your mouth, the icecream is like no basic flavor that you've ever had, and the cookie bits pull it all together to ensure you never get a boring bite! My absolute FAVORITE flavor, never change Ben & Jerry's

I have been buying this one every single time I get Ben and Jerrys. I have probably bought it a good 20 times. The first time i don't think I liked it because it had a weird flavor but it really grew on me. I don't think it taste like caramel or cheesecake at all I really don't know what it taste like exactly but I love the cookie swirl and those balls I love them theu don't taste like cheesecake either and can't even describe what they do taste like it's like they made a really weird but awesome flavor but put it in the wrong container. Love it though I hope they don't discontinue.

column4: Review Echo - Loved all but the CheeseCake Truffel
column5: I am going to completely echo the review of kuroyuuki below. This ice-cream is lovely, the cookie crumbles are nice and sweet, the caramel is perfectly subtle. The Cheese Cake Truffles, however, are almost sour in contrast. Unlike most ice cream "goodies" that I dig for (i.e. cookie dough chunks, brownie bits), I find myself trying to spoon around the cheese cake.

I purchased this ice cream hoping to find a replacement for Cheesecake Brownie since Ben and Jerry's is discontinuing that flavor. I am famous for finishing their pints in one sitting (I know, I am grossly unhealthy). Anyhow, I got through half the pint and had to throw the rest away. Very disappointing.

column4: Amazing Ben and Jerry never fails me
column5: This is an ice cream I have been waiting to have I always felt I had to choose between strawberry cheesecake, American dream and cookie core, but now I have this! Rich flavor and extremely generous with cheesecake and cookie ratio. It is so smooth! This will forever be my go to ice cream and flavor
The cheesecake bits tasted weird? Almost tasteless. The other truffle flavor is much better. I ended up throwing the rest of this pint away because I didn’t wanna waste the calories on it.

I recently bought this flavor and was most looking forward to the graham cracker/cheesecake truffle. However, I was highly disappointed with the flavor of the truffle. The ice cream itself tastes a lot like cheesecake, but the pieces themselves do not. I’ve had the strawberry cheesecake flavor before, and those cheesecake pieces, from what I remember, tastes how I feel these pieces should as well. Not sure if I would rebuy, but I’m glad I at least tried it.

The cheesecake truffles have a horrible taste, they almost taste like plastic. I had to eat around them! Ben & Jerry’s what happened to your awful tasting cheesecake truffles, everything else was delicious!

The flavor made this a must try for me. I was sorely disappointed. The cookie swirls were the only thing I could taste. The truffles had no flavor and the caramel cheesecake flavor was barely noticeable.

column4: a perfect iced cream flavor for any human
column5: scientists have tried for thousands of years to create the best flavor of ice cream. now, with Ben & Jerry's Caramel Chocolate Truffles ice cream, those scientists can sleep easy. ben or jerry should delete any review that isnt 5/5 stars or higher.

I bought this flavor like 30 minutes ago because ya girl is hungry asf and had just cried for 2 hours. I love the Salty Caramel Core to death but sadly, Publix was out. But a sad attempt to substitute my caramel craving, I bought this piece of garbage. This doesn’t even taste like caramel, cheesecake, or chocolate. It is a hot mess of a flavor and I could do without. I truly expected more and I am still craving caramel, sad to say that every spoonful brought me closer to tears from disappointment.

This ice cream is the best thing I’ve ever spent my money on. It is perfect in every way and each component works beautifully together. I know for a fact I will never find another ice cream better than this one. I buy a pint at least once a month(I would buy more often if the calories weren’t so high)! I often eat the whole thing at once because it’s so good. I also have a tree-nut allergy which makes it extremely difficult if not impossible to find fun ice cream flavors I can eat and this one is safe! It’s definitely a must try!!
This sounds more delicious than it actually is. The cheesecake bites don’t taste anything like cheesecake. I wish I could have my money back.

I had to try this because I love cheesecake ice cream! The flavor of the icecream itself with the cookies is amazing! But honestly, the cheesecake bites ruined it for me. They just taste like balls of butter. They are not good at all. If those were changed this would probably be my favorite. Think about it Ben & Jerrys.

My absolute favorite flavor is the strawberry cheesecake so I was so excited to try the chocolate cheesecake. I was so very disappointed to find that it was really just cookies n cream ice cream with little chunks of lard covered in graham dust.

The ice cream flavor and cookie swirl is phenomenal, but the cheesecake truffles in my pint had no flavor, which was disappointing. There weren’t very many truffles in the pint, however, so I couldn’t even complain much about them.

This flavor WAS the most amazing thing I'd ever put in my mouth. BUT they changed the cheesecake bits and now its just not good anymore. It makes me so sad, I had FINALLY found my emotional crutch! Now, I have nothing again :(

This ice cream is delicious but the truffles are gross kinda...they’re very cheesy and sour in an odd way. make them less cheesy or something and add way more chocolate cookie and this ice cream will be perfect

column4: This is the first new flavor I have really liked!
column5: I thought this ice cream was delicious. I do see how some people wouldn't like the cheesecake bites because they are tart compared to the ice cream. The base tastes more like a rich vanilla than caramel but I found it to be very tasty. If B&J changes the cheesecake bites they will have more satisfied consumers. I'll just keep buying it until they discontinue it. With the exception of Americone Dream, Peanut Butter Cup, and Cherry Garcia every time I love a flavor they discontinue it.
I ALWAYS keep this stocked in my freezer! Please don't ever discontinue it!! Has all of my favorite things all in one ice cream- cheesecake, caramel & chocolate cookie. SO delicious!!

I used to be obsessed with this flavor! I used to buy it 3-4 times a week! Then the stores stopped carrying it for a while and now I recently noticed target has it in stock but the cheesecake pieces are no longer covered in graham cracker and the the flavor just isnt the same. This was the only flavor ice cream I would buy, and it was totally worth every calorie. Unless they change it back to their old version, I unfortunately won’t be buying it. PLEASEEEEEEE MAKE IT THE WAY IT WAS!!

No matter what the day, you will always find Ben & Jerry's pints in my freezer. I am always up for trying the new flavors and was excited to see this one at our grocery store. I mean caramel, chocolate, and cheesecake truffles...Come On! How can you not give the nod to this one? It has become one of my favorite flavors and obviously that of others as well since the quantities are always the most limited in the freezer case. Keep up the great work with the crazy good flavors!

The icecream is nice but gets samey after a while. The “truffles” are not pleasant.
I actually threw away around 1/3 of the tub...
Love love love this flavor. One of my new favorites, my only criticism would be that I wish there was more graham cracker in it.

column4: The only ice cream I will ever eat!!!
column5: I have tried so many different brands and flavors of ice cream and I can honestly say This is hands down the best ice cream I have ever had in my life! The flavors are so perfect in every way and compliment eachother so well! I dont understand why Walmart & target near me stopped carrying it! I have been craving it so bad and refuse to eat anything else. I really liked cinnamon buns before trying this flavor and they dont sell that anymore either!! PLEASE BRING IT BACK!!!
I was a bit concerned there would be to much going on but honestly really solid. The cheesecake bites are very nice
The flavor and texture of the ice cream itself, but the cheesecake pieces are too hard and not up to par.
I ate some of this 2 days ago OMG one of the best ice cream flavors I’ve ever had- IN MY LIFE.
No crazy about cheese cake bites and the rest ok prefer other flavors

column4: Didn't Get What I Was Expecting
column5:
Long story short:
- cheesecake tastes weird, reminds me of some dairy free, coconut based cream cheese substitutes I've had, really needs revision
- graham cracker around the cheesecake is really good and adds good contrast in texture and flavor! wish there was more of it
- the cookie "swirl" I guess is a swirl because the cookie is swirled into the ice cream but its SOOOOOOOOO THIN. I was expecting a thick cookie swirl that I could pick out cookie chunks from. really disappointing because the cookies were so good!
- ice cream i guess slightly reminded me of butterscotch/caramel? if I was blindfolded and tried it I would probably think it's vanilla. it is very tasty though

I usually love Ben and Jerry's, but this ice cream was so bad that I'm writing my first ice cream review. The ice cream itself is not good, but the cheesecake bites are awful. They taste so fake and gross. I'm sad to say all of this because Ben and Jerry's is usually great, but I feel like I owe it to Ben and Jerry to tell the truth.

After One Love stopped restocking, I didn’t think it was possible I would find another flavor to top it. But then I tried this. It is the absolute BEST flavor. Everything in it mixes perfectly together, and the cheesecake bites are melt in your mouth amazing. The only complaint I have is it’s been so hard to find anywhere near me. I’ve traveled to outside towns looking for this flavor with no luck. Please restock this is southwest Missouri!!!

I'm just now dipping into Ben and Jerry's to find a favorite flavor. Based on the package description, I should have loved this. The caramel ice cream was a bit bland and could have been vanilla. The chocolate swirl was nice, and I would have enjoyed even more graham cracker. The "cheesecake" truffles were a real problem for me, tasting mostly of coconut oil. I'm going to continue my sampling, but the cheesecake flavors are out.

column4: I skip all meals for this!
column5: Oh my goodness, I'm so hooked on this flavor that I'd rather eat this than dinner. I'm almost glad it goes so fast at the stores near me so I don't eat it so often... The cheesecake truffles in this are delicious and the caramel is not overwhelming, it's subtle but just the perfect combination!

This is the best icecream flavor I've ever had hands down! My husband has bought me atleast 10 pints because I've never had a icecream I love more and now I cant find it anywhere in my town. Makes me so sad. I'm craving it and I need it back in my life. Best flavor ever Ben & Jerry's, please never take this one away & please make it more available. Gilmer Texas to be exact. This is a winner

column4: My least favorite flavor I have tried
column5: The name sounded like something I would love. There was nothing chocolatey or caramelish about it. The cheesecake bites tasted like rotten milk. Not sweet at all. I definitely do not recommend this flavor.
So I eat a couple pints of Ben and Jerry’s per night usually and I have to say that this is probably my favorite flavor! It’s soooo cheesecakey and amazing. Please make this flavor forever :-)

I've eaten a lot of ice cream in my time and I've never had a favorite until now. This is the best ice cream i have ever had. The cheesecake bites are actually big sized piece and there aren't too many to over power the ratio. The three flavor just mix so perfectly together. I say if you like cheesecake and caramel you better go try this delicious flavor. BEST ICE CREAM EVER!
On the bright side, the ice cream was great. I would try other flavors with the same base.

Enjoyed this flavor. Caramel cheesecake ice cream is smooth, extremely tasty, and both flavors are prominent. The cookie swirls are just as awesome as they are in tonight dough. The truffles were good and the cheesecake flavor was good, but the truffles did not add or take away anything. I didn't deem them necessary in this particular pint, but it is still a great flavor.

I just got this ice cream yesterday and it’s already gone! I really enjoyed the overall flavors. Very creamy and not over powering. It didn’t give me any gas problems(lactose intolerant). The only downer about the ice cream was the little white balls of cheesecake( wish it was a little sweet) but overall super good ice cream. I think it’ll be one of my favorites!
Wish I could say I liked this but the cheesecake bits had such an off flavor did not taste like cheesecake at all. Disappointed.

Hubs brought this home when Americone Dream was out. I was skeptical because I don't love things super sweet. This was PERFECT! Varied textures (although it lacks a CRUNCH but thats ok) with lightly changing flavors. Not over powering sweet, I enjoyed the cheesecake pieces and like others could use a touch more of the graham but I will no doubt get again.

I accidentally bought this at my local cvs one night and saw it was new, so said “I love cheesecake, why not?” WOW Saddened to not find it in the store again but never in my life have I seached online to see where I can find an icecream flavor (lol) and this has inspired me to do just that! Another level delicious, hope this stays around!

The cookie swirl and ice cream base is delicious, the cheesecake, like everyone else has said, is not. Frozen cheesecake barely has any flavour and let’s be honest, cheesecake isn’t that good to begin with. If the cheesecake was replaced with cookie dough and a salted caramel swirl was added this would be the best ice cream... like ever.

Purchased this flavor on a whim last night. Decided to taste it today & just like that I am a fan & will absolutely repurchase! I would like a little more cheesecake bites in the mix (because I enjoyed it so much) but I love the unique combination & how the flavors complement each other nonetheless. This one is definitely a keeper!

This new flavor is amazing. I don't buy ice cream from the grocery store often. My all time favorite has been the turtle sundae from a local place or two, and not much can top it. Occasionally I buy a B&J pint and have found a few I really like, like salted caramel core. This new flavor has possibly risen to the top of the list.

The overwhelming coconut oil flavor in the cheesecake truffles made this flavor unpleasant overall. I enjoyed the cookie swirl but the fake caramel cheesecake flavor of the base ice cream was also not great. If it had been a more simple base flavor & no coconut oil in the truffles this could have been a solid flavor.

I was recommended this ice cream by a friend a few weeks ago and have been obsessed with it! I'm not at all ashamed to admit I have eaten at least 4 or 5 pints since then and its my new favorite flavor. The ice cream is light and sweet and the cookie swirl adds a nice crunch. Would definitely recommend!

I bought one a month ago for the second time and it was cheesecake chocolate swirl after truffle after truffle greatness. Sadly I bought some recently and could hardly find any on the ones I bought but I could deny the cheesecake flavor you guys excel at. Love it!!!

I buy this icecream every saturday as my cheat treat i don’t crave nothing else but this icecream and its just the perfect combination of cheesecake and icecream. I try to buy other flavors they are delicious but this one is hard not to buy and enjoy.

I'm eating it now and I haven't stopped. I do think it could taste more authentically like cheesecake AND also caramel...oh wait...I just bit into a cheesecake bite and now I do think it tastes pretty much just like cheesecake...cool...cool...

Bought this 3 times now. I love the chunkiness. There subtle salty almost sour of the cheesecake. And the chewiness of the larger chunky pieces. For a non peanut butter fan it is one of the only non chocolate based ice creams I like.

Not sure why this flavor doesn’t have better reviews. I love everything about it. The icecream, the cheesecake pieces, the chocolate cookie swirls... amazing! I will continue to buy it for sure. An overall great icecream in my opinion.

column4: Oh man, those cheesecake chunks are real!
column5: Fat cheesecake chunks that haven’t disintegrated into the tasty caramel cheesecake ice cream. Great distribution of cookie crumbs. Went straight to the top of my favorite flavors. I eat it straight from the pint and don’t share!

Hello, this Ice cream was delicious to me and my boyfriend. However, I barely had any cheesecake pieces and the caramel was SUPER light. The formula should be revamped to include more cheesecake and caramel. Still good Though.

I wasn’t very impressed about this ice cream ...
the cookie swirls were barely in there , as well as the cheesecake balls. The ice cream itself tasted a little bland.
I don’t think I will be purchasing this flavor again

The cheesecake pieces are horrible! Doesnt even taste like cheesecake and slightly sour flavor. Dont even know what they used but it wasnt cheesecake and it wasnt good at all. I love ben & jerrys but this was good awful

I was reading the reviews on this, and most of them are for the Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake *Truffle* flavor. This is not the same flavor. It isn't bad, but it isn't as good as it's predecessor. =( I am bummed out.

This used to be my Friday night guilty pleasure when it was truffles and now I feel like I've wasted $4. Why was this changed? The cheesecake pieces are too big and the flavor is different. I won't be buying it again.

This is my absolute favorite flavor of any brand ice cream. My #1. BUT my local Walmart hasn’t had it the last few shopping trips which is really disappointing. I hope you never stop making this. My world would end.

I tried to only eat a little bit and couldn’t help myself. The cheesecake pieces are so delicious with the chocolate and caramel flavor. I love that they are not stingy with the cheesecake pieces. Absolute perfection.

Stopped at the store looking for the cookies and cream cheesecake core, which the store did not have so I decided to give this one a whirl. So glad I did, it was AMAZING! The cookie swirl really drives this one home!

Anyone who reported 3 stars or less is seriously deranged. This flavor is so jam packed full of flavor. You have to read the description several times tonappreciate how much goodness is in this. 5 stars easily

I was so excited to try this flavor, but sadly it falls short of what I hoped I would find. The cookie swirl is tasty, but the cheesecake truffles are weird globs. I don't really get any graham cracker crust

Loved the caramel flavor and the cookie swirl. Wish there was more cookie in it. Agree with other reviewers the chunks of cheesecake are not so good. If I take out the cheesecake chunks...so delicious.

One of the best flavors-the cheesecake is chewy, but melts into your mouth-the graham cracker is delicious-and caramel, well....caramel is delicious no matter what. This entire combination is a winner.
I hope they NEVER stop making this. This is all of my favorite flavors in one. Its not too sweet or too rich. I'm able to eat the whole thing and not blink an eye. I have 2 in my freezer hidden away.

column4: This is a Kiss From God
column5: The ice cream is so good it's ridiculous and the cookie swirl makes me emotional. The cheesecake truffles are not as good as the cheesecake in the 'Core' pint. This is a must try for all humans!
Love this flavor. The cheesecake bits are less creamy than expected but they are frozen so it makes sense. I love the caramel ice cream and wish there was more of the chocolate cookie!!! So good!
I love this new combo, I just discovered it a few days ago, and today I went back to buy another when I thought, how would this taste if instead of the cheesecake pieces it was a cheesecake core.
Tried this new flavor and I love it! The cheesecake flavor of the ice cream base is delicious and is so creamy! The cookie swirl adds a nice crunchy texture while the truffles are nice and soft!
I love cheesecake and carmel so I thought I’d love this pint of Ben and Jerry’s! The truffles were so terrible I had to throw them out. This flavor needs a lot of work. I wouldn’t buy it again.
I was skeptical about this and I am very picky about my cheesecake. This was sooo addicting and I could eat it without feeling heavy after. Definitely my new favorite, sorry "Tonight Dough"!

column4: It won't let me put the title I want -
column5: Yeah, I'm sure it's 3 stars i.e and only 1 other person selected 3 stars, so: 2. Maybe a step high in sodium or sugar. Also seems the things of just 4g protein get to us but thank you
Doesn't taste like caramel or cheesecake or truffles. Big globs of greasy yukky stuff. They've run out of good ideas. Gonna throw this out and stick with the old favorites.
this is now my favorite flavor!! so many layers of flavor and I love all the chunks of truffle covered cheesecake, bits of chocolate and the graham cracker crust yum yum

column4: Used to be good, then they changed it
column5:
I used to eat this ice cream every single day.... they change the cheesecake truffles and now it's awful
Probably good that they did... now I can start my diet! Hahaha
Just tried this ice cream!! The flavors are very good!! The only reason I didn’t give more stars is because I feel like the cheesecake pieces could have more flavor :(
I brought this flavor yesterday and I’m going get another one day. I love that it doesn’t have the chocolate flakes in it. Everything is amazing about this one.
Cheesecake truffles had no flavor. The ice cream itself tasted kind of sugar free/low fat. I love caramel and i love cheesecake but this ice cream was not good.
This is the best! It has the perfect amount of cheesecake pieces and not an overwhelming amount of chocolate. My boyfriend and I finished it in a night!! Lol

column4: So sad that I did not know this flavor exsisted!
column5: I am so happy that I have finally found this flavor! This is wonderful. I can not believe anyone gave this one star. Crunchy and chocolatey and cheesy too.

column4: the most perfect ice cream ever
column5: Hands down, best there ever will be! I shudder thinking about a time when this may no longer be made....please dont make that nightmare a reality
I usually love the cheesecake ice creams but the cheesecakes chunks has a weird taste. I ended up throwing this one away after a few bites.
Just bought this the other day and no complaints what so ever. Lots of flavor and soooo many cheesecake truffles in mine. Love love love.
I have been raving about this flavor to anyone that listens. My go-to favorite strawberry cheesecake, but this is a new favorite! Love!

column4: Didn't just meet expectations. It exceeded them!
column5: This flavor was perfect and probably my new favorite flavor of any ice cream. It's a smooth taste combining all the flavors together.
You have to try, the best ice cream I have had in awhile. I think everything about this combo works. I will be buying again.
This one is not in my top 5, but it's definitely in my top 10. I love the cookies and I love the cheesecake! It's a keeper!
Please Please don't ever get rid of this Flavor it's absolutely amazing. I won't say how many points I have eaten
This is by far my new favorite and I didn’t even know it’s been out for a while now, but I’m so glad I found it!
I love this ice cream but for last 6 months can't find it in stores near me. Why is this not available anymore
This ice cream is really good! All the textures fit really well and I love the cheesecake bites in there.
I purchased a pint last night, and it was one of the best flavor combinations I’ve experienced in years!

I just bought this....I almost cried!!!
It was SO GOOD!!! I LOVED the caramel cheesecake icecream.
I bought this recently when the store ran out of Half Baked and it is my new favorite!!
I haven't really found a flavor that I would not eat, but this one is truly addicting.
This is my new favorite, it’s a perfect balance and the cheesecake pieces are YUM!
This is my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor. Ever. And I love the cheesecake bites.
This is one of the best Ben & Jerry’s iced creams! I hope they keep it for awhile!
NEED MORE IN STOCK. CANT FIND THIS AT WALMART IN WATERVILLE MAINE HALF THE TIME.
I bought this over the weekend. It is now my new favorite flavor. So delicious!
the chocolate cookie swirls play so wonderfully off of this flavor. I love it!
Great flavor combination! Very complimentary with no overpowering "core".
You hit a homerun with this one! I hope this one stands the test of time!
Definitely my favorite out of all the flavors. Ben & jerrys is the best.
This is the best of the best! I am addicted. I can't live without it.
Absolutely yum! Please keep making this heavenly delightful flavor!!!
So delicious! My new favorite. It is the perfect marriage of flavors.
Definitely my new favorite Ice cream. Please keep this flavor around!
Soooooo good! And not overly chocolatey like alot of ben and jerrys.
This flavor is the best thing ever!! Please never stop selling it!!
I got this like 3x a week love this ice cream thanks ben&Jerry's
Hands down... best flavor ever!!! Will purchase again and again!
Love it the cheese cake is yummy and love the chocolate swirls
love all the chunks and pieces, would definitely buy again :)
They really hit the nail on the head with this one! So good!
Great tasting cheesecake with a hint of chocolate & Carmel!
Has the perfect amount of everything! I love love love!
My new favorite of all time. The truffles are amazing!

column4: Best Cheesecake flavor by a mile
column5: If this flavor didnt exist I would quit ice cream!
My husband brought a pint for me last week. I always loved the cherries. At least as st 6 were in a pint. THIS PINT HAD ONLY 2. Very disappionted.

column4: THE BEST ICE CREAM FLAVOR OF. ALL. TIME.
column5: Wow. Just wow. I mean there's nothing better than this flavor. No topping it. Cherry ice cream combined with cherries and chunks of chocolate? Come on. This is the best flavor of all time. I'm not saying there aren't other delicious flavors that fill me with intense, creamy, passionate emotion, but cherry garcia is home. Cherry garcia is the dog that you cuddle up with on the couch after a long day of dragging your feet through the world. Cherry garcia is the mother that rubs your sweet lil head after the local school bully called your shoes "dorky." Cherry garcia is life. Such a wonderful flavor. I'm a life-long fan and I will pass this flavor on to my kids, my kids' kids, and their kids' kids. I love it.

We bought 2 pints of Cherry Garcia yesterday at our local Frys Store in San Tan Valley, AZ. This has been my favorite flavor for more than 23 years. Unfortunately my husband and I are very disappointed. This ice cream does not taste like anything at all. The first thing we noticed was that it had no color at all, it was like eating plain cream. The only taste was the occasional piece of chocolate and a piece of cherry. I only had a quarter of the pint, the rest will go in the garbage. So Sad.

I’ve held off on this flavor for years. It seemed simple and less than exciting. Ben and Jerry’s is my secret soul food, so when I do it, I pick overtly decadent and rich like Phish Food. I got stuck with this when the hubby picked for me and he loves “cherry” anything. So, needless to say, I was so not happy inside to see Cherry Garcia. I even left it in time out in the freezer a whole day! I pulled it out the next day, fully expecting disappointment. Took a bite or two, and couldn’t stop! This is now my favorite ice cream of all time!! There’s a special sweet balance between the chunks of frozen cherries and giant chunks of frozen chocolate all generously dispersed in mellow vanilla. Every single bite was heaven! But don’t tell my husband! Gotta keep him on his toes!

column4: My all time favorite ice cream and flavor!
column5:
This is my all time favorite ice cream and flavor. For many years we lived in an area that had roadside ice cream stands with homemade icecream. They were absolutely delicious and I enjoyed supporting a local shop, but even having had those flavors I still would choose Cherry Garcia over them all. It's kind of like an old friend, good for the soul.
Oh, and the new chocolate cherry Garcia is yummy too!

column4: I don't like cherry, but I love Cherry Garcia.
column5: A co-worker bought me a pint of this a few years back. She didn't know I dislike cherry. I hate cherry soda, cherry pie, cherry ice cream, etc. But I tried it anyway, and fell in love. It's the only cherry-flavored thing I like.

column4: This is the best thing that could possibly exist.
column5: This product is amazing, it is the greatest ice cream flavor to touch my tongue. Anyone that thinks otherwise is wrong. Cherry Garcia is the epitome of ice cream, and that is a fact.

Two years ago, this was the first Ben and Jerry's ice cream I ever had. Since then I have tried many different flavors, but this one is still my favorite by far. I get a pint of Cherry Garcia at least once a week!

This was the first Ben and Jerry flavor I had outside a scoop shop, in a pint at home. It’s got great cherry flavor in the ice cream itself and the cherry chunks themselves are great tasting and very plentiful. The fudge seals the deal and makes this a regular in my freezer!

I've eaten this flavor for a decade or more. It's definitely my go to, but, if I could change anything about it I would change ratio of cherries to chocolate in favor of cherries by at least 8:1. If not more. Honestly I'd say leave the chocolate out period but I know there'd be war. I just can't get enough of the cherries. And sometimes I get a pint that's almost all fudge chips & no cherries. Frustrating. But it's still the best current flavor.
First, I'm not the greater fan of cherries, and I'm really bought this pint only for trying something new.
I’m so bummed. I love Ben and Jerry’s but this pint of Cherry Garcia- is all cherry. I literally scooped the whole pint into a bowl to make sure. I only had 1 small chocolate slice. Not happy

column4: i guess i’m the only one who doesn’t like this.
column5: maybe i had a bad batch. but the “cherry ice cream” had no cherry flavor at all. it tasted like pure milk with just chunks of cherry throughout. and then bits of fudge flakes. they just tasted like pieces off a dark chocolate bar. i guess this flavor is just not for me

Since the takeover of B&J, it has become increasingly difficult to find my favorite Cherry Garcia. So, very happy to find two 500ml containers at Sobeys. $5.49 each. I have opened and eaten the entire first container. NO CHERRY - NONE - NOT A SINGLE BIT OF CHERRY! And it "ain't" pink ice cream any more - whitish/yellowish bland tasting stuff. Why would you want to screw up the best ice cream ever?? I hope you made a good profit on these two containers because I will not be buying any in the future! SAD!

IBe tried multiple flavors of Ben n jerry ice cream but nothing compares to this flavor. It’s so perfect with the right ratio of the creamy vanilla ice cream, chunks of dark chocolate (which I know might make u standoffish but trust me it goes amazing together) and the amazing juicy cherries. Every time I go to my local store I grab a pint because it’s just so delicious you always need to have it near by!

It's not difficult to see why Ben & Jerry's has used this flavor in so many different products, because it is a good, safe flavor and for that reason, it gets a BUY IT rating. If you want a comforting ice cream treat and don't want to have your brain confused by having flavors coming at you from every different direction, this is a great choice for you and you will not regret it.

Such an amazing ice cream unlike any other. The cherries in this are surprisingly fresh. I'm not usually a fan of ice cream with fruit because the fruit is usually very soft and mushy but the cherries in this are firm and fresh. The ice cream itself is very creamy and the chocolate is the perfect amount of cocoa without being too dark.

I really like this ice cream, but I prefer the Cherry Garcia formula in the frozen yogurt option. The frozen yogurt is not on Influenster, so I couldn’t review it. This ice cream is very creamy and rich. The cherries are flavourful and juicy. This flavour of ice cream is so unique. I highly recommend this flavour and brand.

column4: One Of Our All Time Favorites!
column5: We have been purchasing Ben &Jerry's Ice Cream for decades. Have tried many varieties, and have a few we buy regularly, but Cherry Garcia is my husband and son's all time favorite!! We purchase an average of one per week of this flavor. Over the years it's always been pretty consistant in taste and formulation, however the last few pints we purchased had much less chocolate chunks. One pint seemed to have a few chunks only on the bottom of the pint. My husband said "WHERE ARE THE CHOCOLATE CHUNKS'??" Happened to the chocolate"??? We think it must have been a fluke in manufactuing and we caught a bad batch as we purchased both pints in the same store. We had this problem with the lack of chocolate chunks in their Cherry Garcia slices, but untll now, never the pints. In "fairness" I am giving this product a high rating because this issue with the lack of chocolate chunks has only been with the last 2 pints we purchased, and overall it's a good product...

SO I love the Dead and I'm from the bay area & I have so many fond memories on Haight stopping at B & J's for ice cream. I usually get one scoop of CG and one scoop of Phish Food and it really feeds my body and soul. I never am without a lil personal pint of CG in my house. Its the best ice cream in the world :)

These days, I can’t snuggle up on the couch with a container of Ben and Jerry’s and eat as much as I want- but I can have a scoop every once in a while, so I do - and Cherry Garcia is my guilty pleasure ice cream of choice. Just don’t let it thaw too much before re freezing, or it gets all crystallized.

This is one of my favorite flavors of Ben & Jerrys ice cream! The cherry ice cream doesnt taste too artificial and is delicious, I only wish they sold this in a half gallon versus just a pint! I will buy this over and over again without a doubt!

column4: Love it but I vote for vanilla ice cream.
column5: As a kid, my two favorite hand-dipped ice creams were cherry vanilla and chocolate chunk. Imagine my delight when you brought out Cherry Garcia and with a great name. But then...the cherry flavored ice cream. Still good, still recommend, not as great. Please...bring back the vanilla!
Too much of a maraschino cherry flavor for my taste. I would prefer more of a fresh cherry taste. That being said, I can see how others would like it assuming an appreciation for maraschino cherries.

column4: Change back to vanilla ice cream in Cherry Garcia
column5: I prefer the vanilla because of the texture. The cherry ice cream is a little "gummier". The new Chocolate Cherry Garcia is interesting but the chocolate tends to cover up a lot of the cherry flavor. It's all still better than anything else around!
I bought this last week from Publix because I normally love this ice cream. For some reason though, it was very gritty and didn't taste anywhere near as good as normal... :(
TO DIE FOR oh my god I love this ice cream I buy it for my boyfriend all the time and i’m how he found it and also my best friend , I introduced it to her too I love this ice cream :^
Always on my shopping list. Favorite flavor of any brand. large cherries and big chunks of chocolate always make me smile. perfect after breakfast, lunch or dinner snack.
My all time favorite, I love the chocolate chunks with the cherry! It’s too hard for me to try new flavors because my eyes always go back to this flavor!!
I first tried this not very long ago (almost a week ago), and I was very pleased. Love the singing cow on the pint :).
Cherry garcia is my absolute favorite ben and jerry's flavor. The chunks of chocolate and cherry.... mmm so delicious.

column4: What happened to the fudge swirls!!!??
column5: This used to be my all time favorite ice, like out of this world incredible. However, I distinctly remember it used to have BIG FUDGE SWIRLS and not lame chocolate flakes. I raved about this ice cream to all my friends only to be soooo dissappointed to find they changed the recipe to flakes! My friends were not impressed to say the least even though the flavor is the same it was such a downer!! Bring back the THICK FUDGE SWIRLS !!!!!!!!!’
I cannot get enough of Cherry Garcia. Been my go-to since I was a kid.

column4: best if you add banana with it
column5: it is so good and you should buy it because it tastes so good
Cherry Garcia is my go to when I'm feeling down and out.
Long before I discovered the GD I was eating CG! <3

Ordinarily, I would give Cherry Garcia 5+ stars. However, on two occasions (10+ years ago in San Francisco and today in Lewes, DE), the beautiful dark burgundy bing cherries were replaced with supersweet, bright red maraschino cherries that I usually only tolerate as singles atop my sundae whipped cream. What's going on?? I realize the ingredients label just lists “cherries,” but I'm hoping these two occasions were anomalies.
I decided to try the ice cream because I love anything cherry flavored and it surprised me, it's nothing like the other ones I've tried. Everybody should have this ice cream, it's fenomenal

Bought this tonight, cheap at BJ's, two three packs. Figured if Ben & Jerry's, got to be good, and I LOVE Cherries. and they can't mess up Cherry Ice Cream...LOL!
Well, I love the fatty smooth mouth feel, creamy... but the cherries... aggg! No, No, NOT Maraschino Cherries!!
As a side note, the chocolate would be better if it melted in the mouth easier.

I love Ben and Jerry’s Cherry Garcia ice cream. I have had the ice cream bar and the ice cream in the bucket. It taste nice and fresh. It’s so good. It’s one of my favorite ice creams to buy. If I am at a convenient store I looks for the ice cream bar. It’s very fulfilling too. I would recommend this ice cream to anyone.

This is my favorite ice cream of all time. There’s nothing else like it! I love the little cherry pieces with vanilla ice cream and chocolate bars. It’s a treat on any day for me. And I wouldn’t pick any other kind over cherry Garcia. If you haven’t tried it yet you absolutely have to!

My husband and I were in bed and all of a sudden a craving for my favorite Ben and Jerry’s. He took me to our local Walmart and bought me a pint of it. On the way home I had him go through McDonald’s to get a spoon so I could eat my ice cream on the way home because I couldn’t wait!!!

What was once my favorite ice cream no longer holds that place in my heart. I loved the freshness and contrast of the vanilla ice cream with the big chunks of cherries. And the chocolate used to be real chocolate with that lovely chocolate snap. Now it’s fudge and cloying. No snap.

My first two containers were gritty and the second one was crystalized, but would become creamy as the crystals melted. I loved both of them...lol, but I can't wait to get my hands on a creamy batch that hasn't melted and refrozen. I can just imagine how good that one's gonna be!!

Oh Lord, this ice cream is the best! It is quite the indulgence due to the high fat content and I try to purchase the lower fat version, if available. This flavor is a bit difficult to find in my area but it is delicious and does have a high price point. Definitely recommend.

I buy this ice cream pint every time i go to walmart! Its so good, especially because of the size of the chocolate flakes and cherries. I swear, every bite you take has either a cherry or chocolate piece. Not too sweet or too sweet but perfect and I don't even like cherries.
This is a dang good ice cream!

This flavor should not work but it does. I’d seen people rave about Cherry Garcia but, as someone who does not like artificial cherry anything, I was super uninterested... but it’s so good! The cherries are delicious and the chocolate balances it out so nicely.

column4: The GOAT of ice cream flavors!
column5: It's probably been 20 years since I first had Cherry Garcia, and I swear nothing has ever been more delicious. Now, I certainly LIKE other flavors but this one is by far the best. Not overwhelmingly sweet, just enough crunch and the cherry pieces are amazing.

One word YUM. This ice cream has real chunks of cherry in it. The mix of chocolate and cherry is phenomenal. I find this ice cream to be delicious. It was the first Ben & Jerry's I ever tried. It's expensive but it's so worth the price! Get a spoon and try!!

MY FAVORITE ICECREAM OMG I wish I had some right now! There's sooooooo many cherries in this ice cream not like other icecream that doesn't give you any cherries just chocolate I hate that lol. This is my favorite icecream forever and always it's the best

Ben and Jerry's produce quality ice cream and this is a favorite flavor of mine. I've always liked chocolate covered cherries and this is a frozen version! B&J's ice cream is more expensive than other brands, so I tend to purchase it when it is on sale.

this is my absolute favorite flavor! im not much of a chocolate person so im always very happy when we have a pint of this. although i mus say lately i havent been getting as many cherries as i would like. but i still love the flavor and keep it up!

This is THE ice cream for when you have a fight with your best friend or boyfriend. Delicious and totally worth the calories. It's banana with chocolate and it tastes like heaven. This ice cream along with a feel good 90's movie is the bomb dot com.

I was so not excited when my husband picked out this ice cream flavor for me. I mean cherry ice cream? How can that be good? Well, it is! It's one of my favorites. The cherry is so soft and subtle and balances so nicely with the chocolate. Amazing.

This is my guilty pleasure. I could eat this ice cream all day. I love the flavor of the cherry with the chocolate. I get it out of the freezer and let it sit for 5-10 minutes then eat it because it softens so perfectly it just melts in your mouth.

column4: Best tasting ice cream in the entire world
column5: If you don't like Cherry Garcia ice cream, then you'll never be happy with any other ice cream. I've tried hundreds of flavors (including all Ben & Jerry's) and dozens of brands, nothing comes close. I can't help having a serving every day.

This is a Ben and Jerry’s classic flavor and it is so tasty! The ice cream is smooth, creamy and sweet and there are huge chunks of real cherry. There are big chunks of dark chocolate that is a perfect finishing touch. This is a yummy treat.

My son, who has some allergies to raw cherries and apples, could always eat this ice cream. For some reason his recent purchase set off his allergies a good bit. The ice cream is great if you don't have allergies, but take care if you do.

Cherry Garcia is one of my absolute favorite flavors. Like, top 5 flavors of all time. The cherry ice cream with the addition of natural cherry halves is so refreshing and the chocolate chunks are a welcome addition to the flavor profile.

This is the only flavor I’ve tried from Ben and Jerry’s and I love it. It has a great flavor! I love the cherry and chocolate flakes in it! I get it at Walmart for a reasonable price. My favorite flavor of ice cream. 10/10 recommend.

I’m an ice cream fanatic! Obsessed completely. I ate my way through gelato shops in Italy and still Cherry Garcia is my favorite flavor. The unique cherry ice cream is creamy and paired well with chunks of chocolate and cherries.

Cherry Garcia is one of the best ice creams I have ever had. I live the Ben and Jerrys brand and wish tat my local store had more flavors to try. We used to have a local ice cream parlor and when it closed I was sad to see it go.

column4: Cherry Garcia bars has no cherries
column5: I purchased a box of nine bars at BJ’s of the Cherry Garcia and only 3 bars had chocolate chips, cherries, and cherry ice cream. The other 6 bars contained only chocolate chips and vanilla ice cream. I don’t know what happened.

One of my all time favorite ice creams. Has such a nice flavor and it seems like you get a little of everything with every bite. I just wish this ice cream came in bigger containers because these small ones don't last long

Cherries are my favourite fruit and so I've tried a lot of cherry ice creams. A lot of them fall flat. But the flavour of this combined with the consistency and size of fruit chunks is very well put together. I love this

What happen to this Ice Cream. Within the last few months this product has deteriorated few Cherry’s , little chocolate, is just plain ice cream . If I wanted plain Jane ice cream I can find that anywhere. Disappointed

The fruit and chocolate combination is what makes this flavor a winner. The chocolate chunks are very large, and I would rather have a chocolate chip versus a chunk. More cherry, less chocolate chunk would be perfect.

My favorite ice cream is chocolate chip and cherry and this combines the two perfectly! I would eat these every day if I could without any consequences haha. I would recommend not only this flavor but this whole brand
i bought this not realizing it was made with Almond milk. i will never buy this again.
This is not a healthy Cocoa. Please remove the processing of cocoa from your ice creams. Just use cocoa.

As a kid I wasn't a fan of Cherry Garcia. But now as an adult-ish it's one of the best has complex flavored in the base and the cherries are always really good. I think Ben and Jerry's is pretty affordable.

Omg this is the only brand of ice cream I buy! The cherries are cut in half and taste so good ! And I love that the chocolate chunks are big . Literally every spoonful has a piece of cherry or chocolate
I love Ben & Jerry's, they are so creative with their flavors they cone up with and I've never had one i didn't like. I also love everything this company stands for, they are good people.
This is my go to flavor for Ben and Jerry’s. It’s so tasty and creamy and I just love it! It’s such a good combo with the pieces of cherry and chocolate and I overall enjoy this flavor!
When I am craving ice cream, I literally always go for Ben and Jerrys either the cherry garcia or strawberry cheesecake. I like how creamy they are and less sugary than other brands.
BEST flavor of all time. Just the right balance between the cherry taste and the chocolate taste. Even my friends that don't like the taste of cherry's really enjoy this ice cream
literally eaten sooo many of these. it brings me back so many memories with my friends, eating cherry garcia and watching movies. always recommend it. I hope it stays forever.
I don't know what kind of cherries these are, but I could not eat them. I love sour cherries, but these were terrible. I ate the ice cream, but I did not eat the cherries.
I was raised on bluebell, and when I tell you I gave it up so quick when I tasted this ice cream. It’s creamy, and the over all quality of the ingredients are far superior!
This is mine and my moms favorite flavor, in fact she almost named me after it, thanks to my gma I am NOT named after ice cream no matter how delicious it may be
This is so bomb. So chocolatey and cherry at the same time. Very creamy and high quality. Go to but very sweet and High calorie. It’s a rare but delicious treat
What is life without Cherry Garcia? For a long time, I knew this life, but once I had it, that life was a long distant memory. I wish to never see it again.
Well I don’t really like cherries but I decided to take this one home a try it... and wowww amazing I love Ben a Jerry’s ice creams and this one is a YES
Even the Ben & Jerry’s can be a little expensive, it will always be worth the price because it’s always delicious and they use great ingredients inside.
I love Ben&Jerry’s but I didn’t like this flavor it’s just too sweet. They had a cotton candy flavor I loved but they discontinued it I’m disappointed.
I love Ben & Jerry's. I love that they use new fresh ingredients and the fact that there really isn't that artificial flavor taste in the ice cream
I love this flavour so much but I bought one last week from adonis griffintown and I was very disappointed that it only had one cherry in it!!
This is my all time favorite Ben and Jerry’s ice cream! The Cherries and the chocolate chunks are so delicious it’s well worth the money!
Good balance of fruity and chocolatey flavors. Im always a big fam of ben and jerrys but the Cherry Garcia is especially good. So chunky!
By this flavor all the time. For about 3 months this is all I ate with added merichino cherries and it's juice I lost 35lb no kidding.
First time experience With this flavor and the pint slice presentation. Both the flavor and the pint slice get a thumbs up from me.
I normally like chocolate and vanilla but the cherry garcia is excellent. Love it with all the cherries and chocolate. Very good.
I'd you dont like Cherry Garcia, something is wrong with you. I love it. My favorite. Amazing taste. I've been eati.g it for years
My go to ice cream whenever I need a pick me up. This stuff is just so yummy, you can never go wrong with chocolate and cherries.
This is such a delicious and classic flavor, if I cant decide which one I want this along with the cookie dough one is my go to.
My very favorite ice cream. I think Ben and Jerrys is always worth the price to me. The dark chocolate and cherries are perfect
Super yummy one of my most favorite ice creams ever.. If you like chocolates and cherries this is an ice cream you will love
I don’t normally like cherry-flavored ice cream but this is an exception. The chocolate chunks in it are also really good!
Love b n j. Always crave during pregnancy. Lol. The cherries n little chocolate chips are evenly distributed and delicious
I have enjoyed this ice cream so much. Thank you for making it. Jerry Garcia Band compliments this ice cream quite well.
Ben and Jerry's ice cream is delicious very affordable great tasting and the prices for the ice cream is very affordable
This will make cherry and chocolate lovers so happy, since I discovered Ben and Jerry's don't need Cold Stone any more.
I am a been & Jerry's brand,Cherry Garcia is my favorite ice cream I buy this all the time it's the only flavor I buy .
So good rich and creamy. Worth the price. Love all the flavors so far. Lots of chunks of goodness inside each jar.
This icecream is classic cherry and vanilla with chocolate pieces in it, its classic but extremely good and creamy
I never even considered trying cherry ice cream before this flavor came into my life, and now Ill never turn back.
This was a flavor that I went to if I really wanted a sweet but not to sweet cherry ice cream any time of the day.
I love this ice cream & I definitely recommend the only thing is that some may find the price to be a little high
I love cherries but not usually in ice cream. This is amazing and I was so surprised to love it as much as I do!
I only like chocolate everything but I decided to take a chance and buy cherry ice cream and it was a delicious!
Great flavor and texture. Lots of chunks of chocolate and cherries to pick out, save in the lid, and eat last!
tastes so nice and tastes perfect ! perfect amount if sugar and doesnt melt right away wen pout out if fridge
SOOOO good. I love this ice cream more than any other. It’s very rich and creamy and has real cherries!
A childhood favorite, it never lets me down and it has the perfect blend of cherries and chocolate
I don’t know how Cherry Garcia isn’t 5 Stars? It is literally unmatched in the ice cream world...
I absolutely love this flavor .It always perks my mood up. Please start making bigger sizes of it
Always loved this,as a child we had cherry vanilla with Hershey syrup, now it’s all in one place!
Oh my God, what can I say except that I love love love Ben & Jerry’s. This flavor is everything..
First time I got a B&J ice cream and I think I'm in love, creamy and perfectly balanced flavors.
Still one of the best flavors around. Ben & Jerrys is always top quality and great ingredients.
It has such a rich flavor without being packed with 9 other toppings. So subtle and delicious
Love cherries and chocolate. An absolutely delicious flavor. You can’t go wrong with this one
This has always been my favorite Ben & Jerry ice cream! I love the flavor, so delicious!
I've never been addicted to anything else. If my Freezer gets down to 2 pints, I panic.
Best ice cream for PMS or bad days!! Its delicious, the chocolate taste make it greater.
Cherry Garcia is the creamiest, fruitiest flavor of all the Ben and Jerrys ice creams.
This is always my God go to flavor to where it’s not too chocolatey but not too fruity
I love them all, but Cherry Garcia is consistently my favorite. Hands down the best.
Everything about it is delicious and my favorite part is the abundant cherry pieces.
I realy adiccted to cherry garcia, unfortunally I can not buy it in Germany :-(
I bought cherry Garcia today, and it was freezer burnt. Totally disappointed!
Can someone tell me what kind of cherries are in this product. I love them.
I love Cherry Garcia so much. It has been with me since I was 6 years old!
Always my go to ice cream. The cherry and the chocolate mix really well.
This is my favorite - always a treat! Go to when I want to treat myself

column4: I found Jesus in this ice cream
column5: If you love fruit in your ice cream, you've found the right ice cream.
Title says it all, it's a classic, an essential Ben and Jerry's flavor

column4: the best flavour of ice cream ever
column5: i love this ice cream so much i get it whenever i go grocery shopping
I pint of Cherry Garcia will turn any bad day into an amazing day!!!
Cherry Garcia is my favorite ice cream of this or any other brand.
I Tried This One As A Shot In The Dark, I Have Fallen In LOVE!!!!

I ate this and then I wanted more
If it so I hot a full pint
I just tried it a few weeks ago and it totally blew my mind.

column4: I really like the over all flavor it is not too mu
column5: I got this for my birthday but I've had it many time so good
Its so good! The best flavour ever! Its a perfect balance.
One of my favorite flavors. Really yummy. Would eat again.
I love the combination of cherries and chocolate, so good.
My FAV!! From the very first spoonful...I was hooked!
The first time I tasted this I became an instant fan.
The only ice cream flavor that actually ever mattered
I used to love Cherry Garcia but now its disgusting.
i bought this a day a ago and i'm so happy i did...

I was having a really horrible day. Had received some depressing news about a medical procedure I had to have. In a fit of anger and depression I bought this as a comfort food since my usual choices of Karamel Sutra and Urban Bourbon weren't available. And wow. It seriously was so good that it took the edge off the anger and actually made me forget about my stupid health insurance issues for a good 45 minutes. It made those happy brain chemicals kick into gear better than sitting in a room full of puppies. Thank you for making an otherwise crummy day just a little bit better <3

Ben and Jerry, “Chillin the roast Truffles,” THATS WHAT IM TALKING ABOUT! You have been able to make a coffee flavor icecream with actual coffee flavor, and the coffee liqour truffles? are you kidding me?! Deliscious. This flavor ice cream has just bumped into my #2 containered ice cream and i don’t make these decisions lightly. Well done ben and jerry, well done. its not just about the stuff you put in the icecream, the base flavor makes it, and you hit it out of the park with chillin the roast.

I recently bought this a week ago and have already bought 3. I was most surprised at the authenticity of the coffee flavor. The smooth and [satisfyingly] rich chocolate swirls were a perfect combination when mixed with the ice cream. The chocolate covered truffles were just an added bonus to the already delicious product. My 22 y/o girlfriend who does not enjoy drinking coffee itself "too much", also loves this ice cream flavor. 1000/10 (not a typo) would recommend to any coffee lover and non-coffee lover alike.

column4: The truffles are horrid in this flavor
column5: I was super excited to try this new flavor, I've been a big Ben & Jerry's fan for over 25 years. The cold brew coffee ice cream is actually quite tasty and the chocolate fudge swirl is fantastic. But the truffles are absolutely horrific and I'm picking them out as I eat through my pint. They taste like this very bad chemically bourbon flavored ball of nastiness. I don't even know how to describe it they certainly don't have any coffee flavor to them at all it really does taste like a fake chemically flavored alcohol additive. Disappointed and a complete waste of money.

I almost did not buy this flavor in my weekly shopping selection because it had “coffee” in the flavor. Don’t get me wrong, I LOVE coffee. But all the “coffee” flavor ice creams I’ve ever had are an injustice to coffee. They’re not well balanced in the flavor, it’s all the same across the brands. BUT THEN I tried this ice cream with coffee flavor and the liquor, coffee etc, whatever all is in this makes it absolutely delicious. My store is out of it - I’ve checked 3 stores! I hope it’s not gone forever!!! LOVE THIS FLAVOR!

There were things I liked and some I didn't. Firstly, I really did enjoy the cold brew coffee ice cream. It wasn't very sweet and was strong of coffee flavor, which I liked. If you're a fan of sugary coffee, this probably won't be for you. The fudge swirls tasted good as well, but there wasn't enough in my opinion.

This had the usual new label on it so of course I needed to buy it. I opened and tasted it and well it has very nice flavors, however the flavors are rather lingering. I am also one that enjoys "stuff" in the ice cream and this was rather lacking. The swirl was ok, rather thick and sticky also has that liquor flavoring however the wafers were lacking and rather thin for the thickness of the swirl. The ice cream is Ben and Jerry's it's always good, however this flavor wasn't to my liking the flavor had kin of a grit to it. Other than that it was ice cream and I do love Ice cream!! I'd suggest a friend try it to compare it to my views...other than that not so much!

column4: Had high hopes, did not deliver
column5: When my two favorite flavors, Oat of this Swirled and One Sweet World, sadly disappeared from my store, I turned to this flavor. I like Coffee Coffee, Buzz, Buzz, Buzz, but I wanted to try something new from the truffles line. Despite opening this up to a giant air bubble (picture attached), I hoped for a successful flavor. I'm not sure if I can email customer service about this air bubble as I had recently already found one- which would make it look sketchy if I emailed. However, I was very disappointed. The cold brew ice cream is bitter and has a weird aftertaste, and the truffles had a somewhat chalky texture. I would not recommend this flavor, but if you are against wasting ice cream and do not want to throw it out, try eating it with some sort of chocolate or chocolate based ice cream.

I hoped this would be a replacement for my former favorite, the original coffee heath bar. NOPE! The ice cream flavor is horrible. Advertised as cold brewed. Tastes more like a pot of Dunkin that has sat on the burner all day. The rum is unpleasant and I can't even describe the "truffles". I probably would have been more satisfied with something generic and unoriginal. If you insist on trying to be trendy and adding booze to your ice cream, why not start with something safe and unimaginative like an Irish coffee with a local whiskey and maybe a caramel swirl.

column4: Sorry Guys, but it is awful.
column5: I was very excited to see new flavors yesterday while I strolled down my favorite aisle at the supermarket. Besides my usual go to's, I grabbed a pint of "Chillin' the Roast."

column4: My disappointment is immeasurable/my day is ruined
column5: I was craving Ben and Jerry's tonight so made the journey to my closest convenience store to grab a pint. I usually opt for the trusty Tonight Dough, but was delighted to see some new flavors. This one in particular, "Chillin' the Roast Truffles," immediately grabbed my attention. I'm a coffee lover/addict, and I do enjoy a good chocolate truffle. I figured this flavor would be right up my alley. BUT... I was wrong. The coffee ice cream is actually pretty good. But the truffles taste AWFUL. Instead of "chocolate liqueur," the truffles taste like balls filled with a butterscotch that has been soaked in Kahlua for too long (and not in a good way). I love alcohol but these truffles are DISGUSTING. My disappointment is immeasurable and my day is ruined.

Ugh, my heart hurts to even write this but this is by far the worst ice cream I’ve ever had from you guys!!! The fact that I can’t get my $5 makes it worse. I’ve tried a plethora of others flavors and was never disappointed but this is so.darn.disgusting. Take it back Benny, take it back

column4: I expected at least an 8, I got a 4 at best
column5: I really love coffee, particularly cold brew. When I saw this product, I ventured away from my typical ice cream choice of Tonight Dough, and I was downright ecstatic to try it out. Did I think that it would measure up to Tonight Dough or S'more? No. But, I did expect more than what I got. It just did not live up to the quality one would expect from a Ben and Jerry's ice cream. I would not recommend. It tastes like a weird type of coffee ice cream. The truffles are too sweet, and the 'fudge' ribbons in the product do not taste like fudge to me. They are very rich. I am sure some people might enjoy it, I however was disappointed. I came in expecting at least an 8, and left with half a pint of ice cream and a strong 4.

The ice cream itself is really good. Strongest coffee tasting ice cream I've had from Ben and jerry's. The truffle part is disgusting though and there isn't much of a fudge swirl. What I mean by much is nun at all basically.

This is my favorite ice cream. When 711 carried it by my house I was livin’ on easy street but now I live in an ocean of chaos. There seems to be little to no hope in finding it again. But I will carry on. I will not cease to search out the good good. That’s actually why I’m on this site. I couldn’t believe it has a 3 star rating. My mama always said if you don’t have anything nice to say don’t say anything at all. It’s delicious. Strong robust flavour. Creamy good goodness and all the little tasties that they add to the mix, ya dig? Try it for yourself and let’s keep this one on the shelves.
Absolutely delicious l, intense coffee flavor with a nice undertone of the liquor.

I bought this ice cream flavor, because I am a coffee flavor addict. I mean I even eat chocolate covered expresso beans. My favorite Coffee, Coffee, Buzz, Buzz, Buzz flavor has apparently been discontinued in my neck of the woods. The only place I can actually find it is at the little Ben & Jerry's stand in our local mall. The flavor of the ice cream itself is great. I even enjoyed the swirls of fudge. The coffee liqueur was disgusting. It tarnished the whole pint of ice cream for me. I was strong and bitter, just not a pleasant taste. I tried to eat around it, but I ended up throwing the container out. Back to purchasing hand packed pints of my favorite from the local mall. Hopefully they will never stop ordering it.

I have 2 go to flavors when picking B&J, but craved coffee ice cream and decided to branch out.
